atk-s0203a0:3_2: Tattha devadahaṃ nāmāti devā vuccanti rājāno,
atk-s0203a0:3_3: tattha ca sakyarājūnaṃ maṅgalapokkharaṇī ahosi pāsādikā ārakkhasampannā,
atk-s0203a0:3_5: Tadupādāya sopi nigamo devadahantveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:3_6: Bhagavā taṃ nigamaṃ nissāya lumbinivane viharati.
atk-s0203a0:3_8: Iminā kammavedanañca kiriyavedanañca paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vipākavedanameva sampaṭicchantīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:3_11: nigaṇṭhāti iminā pubbe aniyametvā vuttaṃ niyametvā dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:4_0: Ahuvamheva mayanti idaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ ajānanabhāvaṃ jānantova kevalaṃ kalisāsanaṃ āropetukāmo pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:4_2: te kathaṃ kammassa katabhāvaṃ vā akatabhāvaṃ vā jānissanti.
atk-s0203a0:5_1: Evaṃ santeti cūḷadukkhakkhandhe mahānigaṇṭhassa vacane sacce santeti attho,
atk-s0203a0:5_2: idha pana ettakassa ṭhānassa tumhākaṃ ajānanabhāve santeti attho.
atk-s0203a0:6_5: Eseyyāti gambhīraṃ vā uttānaṃ vāti vīmaṃseyya.
atk-s0203a0:6_6: Agadaṅgāranti jhāmaharītakassa vā āmalakassa vā cuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:7_1: sallena viddhassa hi viddhakāle vedanāya pākaṭakālo viya imesaṃ “mayaṃ pubbe ahuvamhā vā no vā,
atk-s0203a0:7_3: evarūpaṃ vā pāpaṃ karamhā”ti jānanakālo siyā.
atk-s0203a0:7_4: Vaṇamukhassa parikantanādīsu catūsu kālesu vedanāya pākaṭakālo viya “ettakaṃ vā no dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:7_5: ettake vā nijjiṇṇe sabbameva dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0203a0:7_6: suddhante patiṭṭhitā nāma bhavissāmā”ti jānanakālo siyā.
atk-s0203a0:7_7: Aparabhāge phāsubhāvajānanakālo viya diṭṭheva dhamme akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya jānanakālo siyā.
atk-s0203a0:8_1: Ime pana tato ekampi na jānanti,
atk-s0203a0:8_2: virajjhitvā gate salle aviddhova “viddhosi mayā”ti paccatthikassa vacanappamāṇeneva “viddhosmī”ti saññaṃ
atk-s0203a0:8_3: uppādetvā dukkhappattapuriso viya kevalaṃ mahānigaṇṭhassa vacanappamāṇena sabbametaṃ saddahantā evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:8_4: sallopamāya bhagavatā niggahitā paccāharituṃ asakkontā yathā nāma dubbalo sunakho migaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā sāmikassa
atk-s0203a0:8_6: evaṃ mahānigaṇṭhassa matthake vādaṃ pakkhipantā nigaṇṭho,
atk-s0203a0:9_1: Atha ne bhagavā sācariyake niggaṇhanto pañca kho imetiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:9_3: Kā atītaṃse satthari saddhāti atītaṃsavādimhi satthari kā saddhā.
atk-s0203a0:9_4: Yā atītavādaṃ saddahantānaṃ tumhākaṃ mahānigaṇṭhassa saddhā,
atk-s0203a0:11_4: Samparāyavedanīyanti dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve vipākadāyakaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:11_12: yaṃ paṭhamavaye kataṃ paṭhamavaye vā majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā vipākaṃ deti,
atk-s0203a0:11_13: majjhimavaye kataṃ majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā vipākaṃ deti,
atk-s0203a0:12_1: puṇṇo nāma kira duggatamanusso rājagahe sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0203a0:12_2: Tamenaṃ ekadivasaṃ nagaramhi nakkhatte saṅghuṭṭhe seṭṭhi āha –
atk-s0203a0:12_12: Taṃ divasaṃ sāriputtatthero nirodhā vuṭṭhāya “kassa saṅgahaṃ karomī”ti?
atk-s0203a0:12_13: Āvajjanto puṇṇaṃ disvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya tassa kasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:12_14: Puṇṇo kasiṃ ṭhapetvā therassa dantakaṭṭhaṃ datvā mukhodakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0203a0:12_15: Thero sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā kammantassa avidūre nisīdi bhattābhihāraṃ olokento.
atk-s0203a0:12_16: Athassa bhariyaṃ bhattaṃ āharantiṃ disvā antarāmaggeyeva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0203a0:13_0: Sā sāmikassa āhaṭabhattaṃ therassa patte pakkhipitvā puna gantvā aññaṃ bhattaṃ sampādetvā divā agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:13_4: antarāmagge pana sāriputtattheraṃ disvā taṃ tassa datvā aññaṃ pacitvā āharantiyā me ussūro jāto,
atk-s0203a0:13_7: mayā therassa pātova dantakaṭṭhañca mukhodakañca dinnaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:13_9: ajja therena katasamaṇadhammassa mayaṃ bhāgino jātāti cittaṃ pasādesi.
atk-s0203a0:13_11: So bhuñjitvā kasitaṭṭhānaṃ olokento vijjotamānaṃ disvā uṭṭhāya yaṭṭhiyā paharitvā rattasuvaṇṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:13_12: jānitvā “rañño akathetvā paribhuñjituṃ na sakkā”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0203a0:13_13: Rājā taṃ sabbaṃ sakaṭehi āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe rāsiṃ kāretvā “kassimasmiṃ nagare ettakaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ atthī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:13_14: Kassaci natthīti ca vutte seṭṭhiṭṭhānamassa adāsi.
atk-s0203a0:14_1: tasmiṃyeva rājagahe kāḷaveḷiyo nāma duggato atthi.
atk-s0203a0:14_3: Mahākassapatthero nirodhā vuṭṭhāya “kassa saṅgahaṃ karomī”ti āvajjanto taṃ disvā gantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:14_4: Sā pattaṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ tattha pakkhipitvā therassa adāsi,
atk-s0203a0:14_8: Kāḷavaḷiyopi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto cūḷakaṃ labhi.
atk-s0203a0:14_10: Satthā “ito sattame divase seṭṭhicchattaṃ labhissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:14_11: Kāḷavaḷiyo taṃ kathaṃ sutvā gantvā bhariyāya ārocesi.
atk-s0203a0:15_0: Tadā ca rājā nagaraṃ anusañcaranto bahinagare jīvasūle nisinnaṃ purisaṃ addasa.
atk-s0203a0:15_1: Puriso rājānaṃ disvā uccāsaddaṃ akāsi “tumhākaṃ me bhuñjanabhattaṃ pahiṇatha devā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:15_2: Rājā “pesessāmī”ti vatvā sāyamāsabhatte upanīte saritvā “imaṃ harituṃ samatthaṃ jānāthā”ti āha,
atk-s0203a0:15_6: sā purisavesaṃ gahetvā pañcāvudhasannaddhā bhattapātiṃ gahetvā nagarā nikkhami.
atk-s0203a0:15_7: Bahinagare tāle adhivattho dīghatālo nāma yakkho taṃ rukkhamūlena gacchantiṃ disvā “tiṭṭha tiṭṭha bhakkhosi me”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:15_14: “Dīghatālassa bhariyā sumanadevarājadhītā kāḷī puttaṃ vijātā”ti āroceyyāsi.
atk-s0203a0:15_17: Sā “dīghatālassa bhariyā sumanadevarājadhītā kāḷī puttaṃ vijātā”ti ugghosentī agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:16_0: Sumanadevo yakkhasamāgame nisinno sutvā “eko manusso amhākaṃ piyapavattiṃ āharati,
atk-s0203a0:16_1: pakkosatha na”nti sāsanaṃ sutvā pasanno “imassa rukkhassa parimaṇḍalacchāyāya pharaṇaṭṭhāne nidhikumbhiyo tuyhaṃ dammī”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:16_2: Jīvasūle nisinnapuriso bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā mukhapuñchanakāle itthiphassoti ñatvā cūḷāya ḍaṃsi,
atk-s0203a0:16_3: sā asinā attano cūḷaṃ chinditvā rañño santikaṃyeva gatā.
atk-s0203a0:16_5: Cūḷasaññāyāti vatvā rañño ācikkhitvā taṃ dhanaṃ āharāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:16_6: Rājā aññassa ettakaṃ dhanaṃ nāma atthīti.
atk-s0203a0:16_8: Rājā tassā patiṃ tasmiṃ nagare dhanaseṭṭhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:17_1: tassa mañcato uṭṭhāya nikkhamitvā gacchantassa mahāpathavī bhijjitvā okāsamadāsi,
atk-s0203a0:17_3: Nandopi goghātako paṇṇāsa vassāni goghātakakammaṃ katvā ekadivasaṃ bhojanakāle maṃsaṃ alabhanto ekassa
atk-s0203a0:17_4: jīvamānakagoṇassa jivhaṃ chinditvā aṅgāresu pacāpetvā khādituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0203a0:17_5: Athassa jivhā mūle chijjitvā bhattapātiyaṃyeva patitā,
atk-s0203a0:17_6: so viravanto kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0203a0:17_7: Nandopi yakkho aññena yakkhena saddhiṃ ākāsena gacchanto sāriputtattheraṃ navoropitehi kesehi rattibhāge
atk-s0203a0:17_8: abbhokāse nisinnaṃ disvā sīse paharitukāmo itarassa yakkhassa ārocetvā tena vāriyamānopi pahāraṃ datvā
atk-s0203a0:17_9: ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmīti viravanto tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bhūmiṃ pavisitvā mahāniraye nibbattoti imāni akusalakamme vatthūni.
atk-s0203a0:18_0: Yaṃ pana antamaso maraṇasantikepi kataṃ kammaṃ bhavantare vipākaṃ deti,
atk-s0203a0:18_2: Tattha yo aparihīnassa jhānassa vipāko nibbattissati,
atk-s0203a0:18_4: Tassa mūlabhūtaṃ kammaṃ neva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ na samparāyavedanīyanti,
atk-s0203a0:19_5: Evaṃ santeti imesaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīnaṃ kammānaṃ upakkamena samparāyavedanīyādi bhāvakāraṇassa alābhe sati.
atk-s0203a0:19_7: Ettāvatā aniyyānikasāsane payogassa aphalataṃ dassetvā padhānacchedakavādo nāma dassitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:19_8: Sahadhammikā vādānuvādāti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇā hutvā nigaṇṭhānaṃ vādā ca anuvādā ca.
atk-s0203a0:19_9: Gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchantīti viññūhi garahitabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:19_12: parehi vuttena kāraṇena sakāraṇā nigaṇṭhānaṃ vādaṃ anuppattā taṃ vādaṃ sosentā milāpentā dukkaṭakammakārinotiādayo dasa gārayhaṭṭhānā āgacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:21_1: Evaṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ upakkamassa aphalataṃ dassetvā idāni niyyānikasāsane upakkamassa vīriyassa ca saphalataṃ dassetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0203a0:21_6: Tampi nānappakārāya dukkarakārikāya payojento dukkhena addhabhāveti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:21_7: Ye pana sāsane pabbajitvā āraññakā vā honti rukkhamūlikādayo vā,
atk-s0203a0:22_1: yo issarakule nibbatto sattavassiko hutvā alaṅkatappaṭiyatto pituaṅke nisinno ghare bhattakiccaṃ katvā
atk-s0203a0:22_2: nisinnena bhikkhusaṅghena anumodanāya kariyamānāya tisso sampattiyo dassetvā saccesu pakāsitesu arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:22_3: mātāpitūhi vā “pabbajissasi tātā”ti vutto “āma pabbajissāmī”ti vatvā nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā vihāraṃ nīto
atk-s0203a0:22_4: tacapañcakaṃ uggaṇhitvā nisinno kesesu ohāriyamānesu khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:22_5: navapabbajito vā pana manosilātelamakkhitena sīsena punadivase mātāpitūhi pesitaṃ kājabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vihāre nisinnova arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:22_6: ayaṃ na dukkhena attānaṃ addhabhāveti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:22_8: Yo dāsikucchiyaṃ nibbatto antamaso rajatamuddikampi piḷandhitvā gorakapiyaṅgumattenāpi sarīraṃ vilimpetvā
atk-s0203a0:22_9: “pabbājetha na”nti nīto khuragge vā punadivase vā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:22_10: ayampi na anaddhabhūtaṃ attānaṃ dukkhena addhabhāveti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:23_0: Dhammikaṃ sukhaṃ nāma saṅghato vā gaṇato vā uppannaṃ catupaccayasukhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:23_2: Dhammikañhi sukhaṃ na pariccajāmīti na tattha gedho kātabbo.
atk-s0203a0:23_3: Saṅghato hi uppannaṃ salākabhattaṃ vā vassāvāsikaṃ vā “idamatthaṃ eta”nti paricchinditvā saṅghamajjhe
atk-s0203a0:23_4: bhikkhūnaṃ antare paribhuñjanto pattantare padumaṃ viya sīlasamādhivipassanāmaggaphalehi vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0203a0:23_10: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “saṅkhārapadhānena me imassa dukkhanidānassa virāgo hotī”ti evaṃ pajānātīti iminā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:23_12: So yassa hi khvāssāti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0203a0:23_13: so puggalo yassa dukkhanidānassa saṅkhārapadhānena virāgo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:23_16: Yassa pana dukkhanidānassa ajjhupekkhato upekkhaṃ bhāventassa virāgo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:25_2: eko hi puriso ekissā itthiyā sāratto ghāsacchādanamālālaṅkārādīni datvā ghare vāseti.
atk-s0203a0:25_4: So “nūna ahaṃ assā anurūpaṃ sakkāraṃ na karomī”ti sakkāraṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0203a0:25_8: nīharāmi na”nti parisamajjhe alaṃvacanīyaṃ katvā “mā puna gehaṃ pāvisī”ti vissajjesi.
atk-s0203a0:25_9: Sā kenaci upāyena tena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ kātuṃ asakkontī naṭanaccakādīhi saddhiṃ vicarati.
atk-s0203a0:25_10: Tassa purisassa taṃ disvā neva uppajjati domanassaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:26_0: Tattha purisassa itthiyā sārattakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno attabhāve ālayo.
atk-s0203a0:26_1: Ghāsacchādanādīni datvā ghare vasāpanakālo viya attabhāvassa paṭijagganakālo.
atk-s0203a0:26_2: Tassā aticaraṇakālo viya jaggiyamānasseva attabhāvassa pittapakopādīnaṃ vasena sābādhatā.
atk-s0203a0:26_3: “Attano anurūpaṃ sakkāraṃ alabhantī aticaratī”ti sallakkhetvā sakkāravaḍḍhanaṃ viya “bhesajjaṃ alabhanto evaṃ hotī”ti sallakkhetvā bhesajjakaraṇakālo.
atk-s0203a0:26_4: Sakkāre vaḍḍhitepi puna aticaraṇaṃ viya pittādīsu ekassa bhesajje kariyamāne sesānaṃ pakopavasena puna sābādhatā.
atk-s0203a0:26_5: Parisamajjhe alaṃvacanīyaṃ katvā gehā nikkaḍḍhanaṃ viya “idāni te nāhaṃ dāso na kammakaro,
atk-s0203a0:26_8: chijja vā bhijja vā”ti tasmiṃ anapekkhataṃ āpajjitvā vīriyaṃ thiraṃ katvā maggena kilesasamugghātanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:26_9: Naṭanaccakādīhi naccamānaṃ vicarantiṃ disvā yathā tassa purisassa domanassaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:26_11: evameva imassa bhikkhuno arahattaṃ pattassa pittapakopādīnaṃ vasena ābādhikaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā domanassaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:26_14: appaṭibaddhacittassa natthetanti ñatvā itthiyā chandarāgaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0203a0:26_15: evamayaṃ bhikkhu saṅkhāraṃ vā padahantassa upekkhaṃ vā bhāventassa dukkhanidānaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0203a0:26_16: no aññathāti ñatvā tadubhayaṃ sampādento dukkhanidānaṃ pajahatī”ti etamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ āgatāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:27_1: Yathā sukhaṃ kho me viharatoti yena sukhena viharituṃ icchāmi tena,
atk-s0203a0:27_4: Ettha ca yassa sukhā paṭipadā asappāyā,
atk-s0203a0:27_5: sukhumacīvarāni dhārentassa pāsādike senāsane vasantassa cittaṃ vikkhipati,
atk-s0203a0:27_7: chinnabhinnāni thūlacīvarāni dhārentassa susānarukkhamūlādīsu vasantassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:28_1: usukāro viya hi jātijarāmaraṇabhīto yogī daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:28_4: tejanaṃ ujuṃ karontassa kañjikatelaṃ viya saddhā,
atk-s0203a0:28_6: ussukārassa vaṅkakuṭilajimhatejanaṃ kañjikatelena sinehetvā alātesu tāpetvā namanadaṇḍakena ujukaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:28_7: viya imassa bhikkhuno vaṅkakuṭilajimhacittaṃ saddhāya sinehetvā kāyikacetasikavīriyena tāpetvā lokuttaramaggena
atk-s0203a0:28_9: usukārasseva evaṃ ujukatena tejanena sapattaṃ vijjhitvā sampattianubhavanaṃ viya imassa yogino tathā
atk-s0203a0:28_10: ujukatena cittena kilesagaṇaṃ vijjhitvā pāsādike senāsane nirodhavaratalagatassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:28_16: Imāsu vā dvīsu kathitāsu itarāpi kathitāva honti,
atk-s0203a0:28_20: adassitaṃ pana ekaṃ buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā ekassa kulaputtassa nikkhamanadesanaṃ arahattena vinivaṭṭessāmīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:32_4: lokena vā samaṇāti ca brāhmaṇāti ca evaṃ sammatā.
atk-s0203a0:32_8: eko anto”tiādīsu viya idha koṭṭhāso adhippeto.
atk-s0203a0:32_10: Vuttampi cetaṃ “kappoti uddānato dve kappā taṇhākappo ca diṭṭhikappo cā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:32_11: Tasmā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena anāgataṃ khandhakoṭṭhāsaṃ kappetvā ṭhitāti aparantakappikāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0203a0:32_12: Tesaṃ evaṃ aparantaṃ kappetvā ṭhitānaṃ punappunaṃ uppajjanavasena aparantameva anugatā diṭṭhīti aparantānudiṭṭhino.
atk-s0203a0:32_13: Te evaṃdiṭṭhino taṃ aparantaṃ ārabbha āgamma paṭicca aññampi janaṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ karontā anekavihitāni adhivuttipadāni abhivadanti.
atk-s0203a0:32_16: Atha vā bhūtamatthaṃ adhibhavitvā yathāsabhāvato aggahetvā vattanato adhivuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo vuccanti,
atk-s0203a0:33_7: sato vā pana sattassāti iminā satta ucchedavādā.
atk-s0203a0:33_13: Diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ vāti iminā pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:33_19: Tīṇi hontīti saññī attātiādīni santaattavasena ekaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:34_1: Rūpiṃ vāti karajarūpena vā kasiṇarūpena vā rūpiṃ.
atk-s0203a0:34_5: ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ sesaarūpadhamme vā attāti paññapentā lābhinopi takkikāpi evaṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0203a0:34_10: tatiyadiṭṭhi suppamattena vā sarāvamattena vā kasiṇaparikammavasena,
atk-s0203a0:35_0: Etaṃ vā panekesaṃ upātivattatanti saññītipadena saṅkhepato vuttaṃ saññāsattakaṃ atikkantānanti attho.
atk-s0203a0:35_4: keci hi etā satta vā aṭṭha vā saññā samatikkamituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0203a0:35_8: Tesaṃ pana ekesaṃ upātivattataṃ atikkamituṃ sakkontānaṃ yathāpi nāma gaṅgaṃ uttiṇṇesu manussesu eko dīghavāpiṃ gantvā tiṭṭheyya,
atk-s0203a0:35_10: evameva eke viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ appamāṇaṃ āneñjanti vatvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0203a0:35_12: Tattha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ tāva dassetuṃ viññāṇakasiṇameketi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:35_14: Tayidanti taṃ idaṃ diṭṭhigatañca diṭṭhipaccayañca diṭṭhārammaṇañca.
atk-s0203a0:35_16: Iminā paccayena idaṃ nāma dassanaṃ gahitanti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:36_0: Idāni tadeva vitthārento ye kho te bhontotiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:36_1: Yā vā pana etāsaṃ saññānanti yā vā pana etāsaṃ “yadi rūpasaññāna”nti evaṃ vuttasaññānaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:36_6: Yadi rūpasaññānanti iminā catasso rūpāvacarasaññā kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:36_8: Itarehi pana dvīhi padehi samāpannakavāro ca asamāpannakavāro ca kathitoti evametā koṭṭhāsato aṭṭha,
atk-s0203a0:36_11: Tayidaṃ saṅkhatanti taṃ idaṃ sabbampi saññāgataṃ saddhiṃ diṭṭhigatena saṅkhataṃ paccayehi samāgantvā kataṃ.
atk-s0203a0:36_13: Atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhoti etesaṃ pana saṅkhatanti vuttānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0203a0:36_14: Atthetanti iti viditvāti taṃ kho pana nibbānaṃ “atthi eta”nti evaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0203a0:36_15: Tassa nissaraṇadassāvīti tassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇadassī nibbānadassī.
atk-s0203a0:36_16: Tathāgato tadupātivattoti taṃ saṅkhataṃ atikkanto samatikkantoti attho.
atk-s0203a0:37_9: Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vātiādīsu paṭisandhivasena āgatiṃ,
atk-s0203a0:37_13: punappunaṃ uppajjitvā aparāparaṃ vaḍḍhanavasena vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:37_14: Kāmañca catuvokārabhave rūpaṃ vināpi viññāṇassa pavatti atthi,
atk-s0203a0:37_15: sese pana tayo khandhe vinā natthi.
atk-s0203a0:37_17: Pañcavokāre hi ettake khandhe vinā viññāṇassa pavatti nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:37_23: āgatiṃ vātiādivacanato taṃ viññāṇaṃ pakkhidvipadacatuppadā viya uppatitvāpi gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:37_26: Ye ca bhagavatā anekasatesu suttesu tayo bhavā vuttā,
atk-s0203a0:38_14: Pañcadvārikasaññāpavattañhi oḷārikasaṅkhārapavattaṃ vā appavattaṃ katvā taṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:38_15: Tassa pana pavattena tato vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:38_17: Saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattipattabbanti saṅkhārānaṃyeva avasesā bhāvanāvasena sabbasukhumabhāvaṃ pattā saṅkhārā,
atk-s0203a0:38_19: Evarūpesu hi saṅkhāresu pavattesu etaṃ pattabbaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:38_20: Tayidanti taṃ idaṃ etaṃ sukhumampi samānaṃ saṅkhataṃ saṅkhatattā ca oḷārikaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:39_7: Iti pecca bhavissāmāti evaṃ pecca bhavissāma.
atk-s0203a0:39_10: Vāṇijūpamā maññeti vāṇijūpamā viya vāṇijapaṭibhāgā vāṇijasadisā mayhaṃ upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0203a0:39_16: bhayā pathaviṃ na khādati ‘mā pathavī khiyī’ti,
atk-s0203a0:39_18: ekapādena tiṭṭhati ‘mā pathavī osīdī’ti, kikī kho, mahārāja,
atk-s0203a0:39_21: brahmacariyaṃ na carati ‘mā loko ucchijjī’ti ime cattāro abhayassa bhāyanti,
atk-s0203a0:39_24: Sā gaddulabaddhoti daṇḍake rajjuṃ pavesetvā baddhasunakho.
atk-s0203a0:39_25: Evamevimeti ettha daḷhatthambho viya khīlo viya ca tebhūmakadhammasaṅkhāto sakkāyo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:39_29: gaddulena bandhitvā thambhe vā khīle vā upanibaddhasunakhassa attano dhammatāya chinditvā gantuṃ asamatthassa
atk-s0203a0:39_30: anuparidhāvanaṃ viya diṭṭhigatikassa diṭṭhidaṇḍake pavesitāya taṇhārajjuyā bandhitvā sakkāye upanibaddhassa
atk-s0203a0:41_1: Evañca catucattālīsa aparantakappike dassetvā idāni aṭṭhārasa pubbantakappike dassetuṃ santi,
atk-s0203a0:41_3: Tattha atītakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ pubbantaṃ kappetvā vikappetvā gaṇhantīti pubbantakappikā.
atk-s0203a0:41_5: Evaṃ sesampi pubbe vuttappakāraṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:41_6: Sassato attā ca loko cāti rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā sassato amaro nicco dhuvoti abhivadanti.
atk-s0203a0:41_7: Yathāha “rūpaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0203a0:41_9: Ettha ca paṭhamavādena cattāro sassatavādā vuttā,
atk-s0203a0:42_2: Heṭṭhā tattha tattha mato tattha tattheva ucchijjatīti dassanatthaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0203a0:42_3: Idha pana pubbenivāsalābhī diṭṭhigatiko atītaṃ passati,
atk-s0203a0:42_5: tassa evaṃ hoti “pubbantato āgato attā idheva ucchijjati,
atk-s0203a0:42_6: ito paraṃ na gacchatī”ti imassatthassa dassanatthaṃ gahitā.
atk-s0203a0:42_10: Avaḍḍhitakasiṇassa taṃ kasiṇaṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:43_2: Lābhino hi pubbenivāsañāṇena khattiyādikule ekantasukhameva attano jātiṃ anussarantassa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:43_3: Tathā jātissarassa paccuppannaṃ sukhamanubhavato atītāsu sattasu jātīsu tādisameva attabhāvaṃ anussarantassa.
atk-s0203a0:43_4: Takkissa pana idha sukhasamaṅgino “atītepāhaṃ evameva ahosi”nti takkeneva uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:44_1: So hi ekanteneva idha jhānasukhena sukhī hoti.
atk-s0203a0:44_2: Idha dukkhena phuṭṭhassa pana jātissarassa takkisseva ca sā uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:44_3: Tatiyā idha vokiṇṇasukhadukkhānaṃ sabbesampi tesaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:44_10: atītepi evaṃ bhavissatīti takkeneva gaṇhantassa esā diṭṭhi uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:45_7: Saddhādayo hi pañca dhammā bāhirasamayasmimpi honti,
atk-s0203a0:45_9: Tattha ñāṇabhāgamattameva pariyodapentīti mayamidaṃ jānāmāti evaṃ tattha ñāṇakoṭṭhāsaṃ otārentiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:45_12: tasmā tadapi tesaṃ bhavantānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ akkhāyatīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:45_14: tathāpi tassa dassanassa anupātivattanato upādānapaccayato ca upādānameva.
atk-s0203a0:45_25: pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti brahmajāle āgatā dvāsaṭṭhipi diṭṭhiyo kathitā honti.
atk-s0203a0:45_26: Brahmajāle pana kathite idaṃ suttaṃ akathitameva hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a0:45_28: Imasmiṃ pana kathite brahmajālaṃ kathitameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:46_1: Idāni imā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo uppajjamānā sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukheneva uppajjantīti dassetuṃ idha,
atk-s0203a0:46_8: Samāpattito pana vuṭṭhitassa niruddhā nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:46_9: Yatheva hi “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:46_10: nirāmisasukhassa nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti ettha na ayamattho hoti –
atk-s0203a0:47_1: Yaṃ chāyā jahatīti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ chāyā jahati.
atk-s0203a0:50_3: Nanu ca maggadassanaṃ nāma sabbattha nikantiyā sukkhāpitāya uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:50_5: sabbattha anupādiyanavasena aggaṇhanavasena upakārapaṭipadā nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:50_9: Upādānamakkhāyatīti ahamasmīti gahaṇassa sakkāyadiṭṭhipariyāpannattā diṭṭhupādānaṃ akkhāyati.
atk-s0203a0:51_1: Channaṃ phassāyatanānanti bhagavatā “yattha cakkhu ca nirujjhati rūpasaññā ca nirujjhati so āyatano veditabbo”ti
atk-s0203a0:51_2: ettha dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ paṭikkhepena nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:52_0: “Yattha āpo ca pathavī, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
atk-s0203a0:53_0: Ato sarā nivattanti, ettha vaṭṭaṃ na vattati;
atk-s0203a0:56_0: “Kattha āpo ca pathavī, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
atk-s0203a0:57_0: Kattha dīghañca rassañca, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ;
atk-s0203a0:65_3: Baliharaṇeti tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe bhūtānaṃ baliṃ āharanti,
atk-s0203a0:65_7: Itibhavābhavahetūti evaṃ imaṃ desanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ nissāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave sukhaṃ vedissāmīti
atk-s0203a0:65_8: dhammaṃ desetīti kiṃ tumhākaṃ evaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:66_1: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānātiādayo sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā lokiyalokuttarāva kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:66_7: Atthato ceva nānaṃ byañjanato cāti ettha “kāyova satipaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāva satipaṭṭhāna”nti vutte atthato nānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:66_8: “satipaṭṭhānā”ti vutte pana byañjanato nānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:66_9: Tadamināpīti taṃ tumhe imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti atthañca byañjanañca samānetvā athassa ca aññathā gahitabhāvo
atk-s0203a0:66_11: Yo dhammo yo vinayoti ettha atthañca byañjanañca viññāpanakāraṇameva dhammo ca vinayo ca.
atk-s0203a0:67_1: Atthato hi kho sametīti satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti gahitā.
atk-s0203a0:67_2: Byañjanato nānanti kevalaṃ byañjanameva satipaṭṭhānoti vā satipaṭṭhānāti vā micchā ropetha.
atk-s0203a0:67_3: Appamattakaṃ khoti suttantaṃ patvā byañjanaṃ appamattakaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:67_4: Parittamattaṃ dhanitaṃ katvā ropitepi hi nibbutiṃ pattuṃ sakkā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:68_1: vijayārāmavihāravāsī kireko khīṇāsavatthero dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento –
atk-s0203a0:68_4: assutavā puthujjano bhāsatī”ti dhanitaṃ katvā āha.
atk-s0203a0:68_7: samuddhoti vuttepi samuddoti vuttepi mayaṃ loṇasāgarameva jānāma,
atk-s0203a0:68_10: gacchatha mahāvihāre paguṇabyañjanānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike byañjanaṃ sodhāpethāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ akathetvāva uṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:68_11: So aparabhāge mahāvihāre bheriṃ paharāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa catūsu maggesu pañhaṃ kathetvāva parinibbuto.
atk-s0203a0:68_12: Evaṃ suttantaṃ patvā byañjanaṃ appamattakaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:70_4: ayaṃ ‘kāyo satipaṭṭhāna’nti vadatī”ti hi nesaṃ saññā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:71_1: Na codanāya taritabbanti na codanatthāya vegāyitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:71_2: Ekacco hi puggalo “nalāṭe te sāsapamattā piḷakā”ti vutto “mayhaṃ nalāṭe sāsapamattaṃ piḷakaṃ passasi,
atk-s0203a0:71_3: attano nalāṭe tālapakkamattaṃ mahāgaṇḍaṃ na passasī”ti vadati.
atk-s0203a0:71_5: Adaḷhadiṭṭhīti anādānadiṭṭhī suṃsumāraṃ hadaye pakkhipanto viya daḷhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0203a0:72_3: tava upajjhāyo āpanno”ti vā ekaṃ dve vāre vatvāpi “asukaṃ nāma asukadivase nāma, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:72_6: Vihesāti bahuṃ atthañca kāraṇañca āharantassa kāyacittakilamatho.
atk-s0203a0:72_7: Sakkomīti evarūpo hi puggalo okāsaṃ kāretvā “āpattiṃ āpannattha,
atk-s0203a0:72_8: bhante”ti vutto “kadā kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti vatvā “asukadivase asukasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti vutte “na sarāmi,
atk-s0203a0:72_11: sarathā”ti bahuṃ vatvā sārito saritvā vissajjeti.
atk-s0203a0:73_2: Yo hi evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ ṭhitakaṃyeva passāvaṃ karontaṃ disvāpi “nanu, āvuso,
atk-s0203a0:74_3: tumhe imehi idañcidañca vuttāti amūhi kathitaṃ imesaṃ antaraṃ paveseyyāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:74_5: Taṃ jānamāno samāno garaheyyāti taṃ satthā jānamāno samāno nindeyya amheti.
atk-s0203a0:75_1: Evaṃ byākareyyāti mayā ete suddhante patiṭṭhāpitāti avatvā yena kāraṇena saññatti katā,
atk-s0203a0:75_3: Tāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāti ettha dhammoti sāraṇīyadhammo adhippeto.
atk-s0203a0:75_4: Na ceva attānantiādīsu “brahmalokappamāṇo hesa aggi uṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0203a0:75_5: ko etamaññatra mayā nibbāpetuṃ samattho”ti hi vadanto attānaṃ ukkaṃseti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:75_8: ekopi ettakamattaṃ nibbāpetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti vadamāno paraṃ vambheti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:75_13: Na ca koci sahadhammikoti añño cassa koci sahetuko parehi vutto vādo vā anuvādo vā garahitabbabhāvaṃ āgacchanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:79_2: Tattha sāmagāmeti sāmākānaṃ ussannattā evaṃladdhanāme gāme.
atk-s0203a0:79_6: taṃ daṇḍādānādivasena paṇṇattivītikkamavasena ca vaddhitaṃ kalaho,
atk-s0203a0:79_7: “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī”tiādikaṃ viruddhavacanaṃ vivādo.
atk-s0203a0:79_10: Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ tava adhiciṇṇaṃ cirakālasevanavasena paguṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:79_12: Āropito te vādoti tuyhaṃ upari mayā doso āropito.
atk-s0203a0:79_13: Cara vādappamokkhāyāti bhattapuṭaṃ ādāya taṃ taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vādappamokkhatthāya uttari pariyesamāno cara.
atk-s0203a0:79_14: Nibbeṭhehi vāti atha mayā āropitavādato attānaṃ mocehi.
atk-s0203a0:80_5: Yathā tanti yathā ca durakkhātādisabhāve dhammavinaye nibbinnavirattapaṭivānarūpehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:80_11: Ettha hi nāṭaputtova nesaṃ patiṭṭhena thūpo,
atk-s0203a0:81_2: So kira upālinā gahapatinā paṭividdhasaccena dasahi gāthāhi bhāsite buddhaguṇe sutvā uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0203a0:81_3: Atha naṃ aphāsukaṃ gahetvā pāvaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0203a0:81_5: Kālaṃ kurumāno ca “mama laddhi aniyyānikā sārarahitā,
atk-s0203a0:81_10: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dvepi jane na ekanīhārena uggaṇhāpeyyaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:81_12: Satthā taṃ vivādaṃ paṭicca ekaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathessati,
atk-s0203a0:82_0: Atha naṃ eko antevāsiko upasaṅkamitvā āha “bhante,
atk-s0203a0:82_2: mayhaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme sāraṃ ācikkhatha ācariyappamāṇa”nti. Āvuso,
atk-s0203a0:82_6: Evaṃ dvepi jane ekaladdhike akatvā bahū nānānīhārena uggaṇhāpetvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0203a0:82_7: Te tassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā sannipatitvā aññamaññaṃ pucchiṃsu “kassāvuso,
atk-s0203a0:82_12: Aparo taṃ paṭibāhitvā mayhaṃ sāraṃ ācikkhīti āha.
atk-s0203a0:82_14: ahaṃ jeṭṭhako”ti aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ vaḍḍhetvā akkose ceva paribhāse ca hatthapādapahārādīni ca pavattetvā
atk-s0203a0:83_0: Bhagavato pana dharamānakālepi bhikkhusaṅghe vivādo na uppajji.
atk-s0203a0:83_1: Satthā hi tesaṃ vivādakāraṇe uppannamatteyeva sayaṃ vā gantvā te vā bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā khanti mettā
atk-s0203a0:83_2: paṭisaṅkhā avihiṃsā sāraṇīyadhammesu ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathetvā vivādaṃ vūpasameti.
atk-s0203a0:83_5: Bhagavatā hi sutte desitā cattāro mahāpadesā yāvajjadivasā bhikkhūnaṃ patiṭṭhā ca avassayo ca.
atk-s0203a0:83_6: Tathā khandhake desitā cattāro mahāpadesā sutte vuttāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni ca.
atk-s0203a0:83_9: dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
atk-s0203a0:84_1: Atha kho cundo samaṇuddesoti ayaṃ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko.
atk-s0203a0:84_2: Taṃ bhikkhū anupasampannakāle cundo samaṇuddesoti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva samudācariṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:84_5: Nāṭaputte kira kālaṃkate jambudīpe manussā tattha tattha kathaṃ pavattayiṃsu –
atk-s0203a0:84_7: tassa kālakiriyāya sāvakānaṃ evarūpo vivādo jāto,
atk-s0203a0:84_8: samaṇo pana gotamo jambudīpe cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭoyeva,
atk-s0203a0:84_9: kīdiso nu kho samaṇe gotame parinibbute sāvakānaṃ vivādo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:84_12: satthā ca etaṃ atthuppattiṃ katvā ekaṃ desanaṃ kathessatī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:84_15: Ujumeva bhagavato santikaṃ agantvā yenassa upajjhāyo āyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:87_3: ayañhi āyasmā divā nava vāre rattiṃ nava vāreti ekāhaṃ aṭṭhārasa vāre upaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:87_4: Divasassa pana satakkhattuṃ vā sahassakkhattuṃ vā gantukāmo samānopi na akāraṇā gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:88_0: Ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānanti ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghamajjhe uppanno vivādo kathaṃ devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati?
atk-s0203a0:88_1: Kosambakakkhandhake viya hi dvīsu bhikkhūsu vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre tesaṃ antevāsikā vivadanti,
atk-s0203a0:88_4: atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0203a0:88_7: Tato tāsaṃ ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummadevatā bhijjanti.
atk-s0203a0:88_8: Evaṃ paramparāya yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0203a0:88_13: Te adhammaṃ pūretvā viharantā apāye nibbattanti.
atk-s0203a0:88_14: Evaṃ ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghamajjhe uppanno vivādo bahūnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
atk-s0203a0:89_1: Abhiññā desitāti mahābodhimūle nisinnena paccakkhaṃ katvā paveditā.
atk-s0203a0:89_3: Bhagavato accayenāti etarahi bhagavantaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā sagāravā viharanti, tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:89_4: uggatejatāya durāsadatāya vivādaṃ janetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0203a0:89_5: bhagavato pana accayena vivādaṃ janeyyunti vadati.
atk-s0203a0:89_7: taṃ dassento ajjhājīve vā adhipātimokkhe vāti āha.
atk-s0203a0:89_9: “bhikkhu uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena parivāre paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni,
atk-s0203a0:89_10: tāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbasikkhāpadāni adhipātimokkhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:89_11: Appamattako so ānandāti ajjhājīvaṃ adhipātimokkhañca ārabbha uppannavivādo nāma yasmā parassa kathāyapi
atk-s0203a0:90_1: idhekacco “na sakkā uttarimanussadhammaṃ anullapantena kiñci laddhu”ntiādīni cintetvā ājīvahetu uttarimanussadhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:90_4: so bhikkhu arahātiādinā nayena sāmantajappanaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0203a0:90_5: agilāno vā attano atthāya paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
atk-s0203a0:90_6: bhikkhunī vā pana tāni viññāpetvā pāṭidesanīyaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0203a0:90_7: yo koci dukkaṭavatthukaṃ yaṃkiñci sūpodanaviññattimeva vā karoti,
atk-s0203a0:90_8: aññataraṃ vā pana paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karonto viharati,
atk-s0203a0:90_11: yo sāsane pabbajitvā micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0203a0:90_15: yvāhaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappemi,
atk-s0203a0:90_17: Evaṃ parassa kathāyapi attano dhammatāyapi sallakkhetvā suppajaho hoti.
atk-s0203a0:91_1: paṭipadāya vāti lokuttaramaggaṃ patvā vivādo nāma sabbaso vūpasammati,
atk-s0203a0:92_2: So saddhivihārikādayo āgantvā vanditvā ṭhite pucchati “kiṃ āgatatthā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:92_5: khaṇeneva arahattaṃ pāpetuṃ samatthakammaṭṭhānakathaṃ ācikkhissāmīti vatvā vadati –
atk-s0203a0:92_6: “idha bhikkhu attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinno mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0203a0:92_12: Ettāvatā maggappatto ceva phalappatto ca hotī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:92_13: Atha te bhikkhū “akhīṇāsavo nāma evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:93_1: Samantā bhikkhācāragāmehi manussā āgantvā pucchanti “kenaci, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:93_3: Upāsakā pubbeva therena pañho kathito amhākanti.
atk-s0203a0:93_4: Te pupphamaṇḍapaṃ pupphakūṭāgāraṃ sajjetvā suvaṇṇena akkhipidhānamukhapidhānādiṃ karitvā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0203a0:93_5: pūjetvā sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷikaṃ kīḷetvā jhāpetvā aṭṭhīni ādāya cetiyaṃ karonti.
atk-s0203a0:93_6: Aññe āgantukā vihāraṃ āgantvā pāde dhovitvā “mahātheraṃ passissāma, kahaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0203a0:93_11: Bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento iminā niyāmena kathesi, bhanteti. Na eso, āvuso, maggo,
atk-s0203a0:93_15: Te kalahaṃ karontā uṭṭhahitvā “sakalavihāre bhikkhū ca bhikkhācāragāmesu manussā ca na jānanti,
atk-s0203a0:93_18: kiṃ vo vihāradvāre cetiyaṃ na diṭṭha”nti.
atk-s0203a0:94_0: Aparopi tādisova kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento evaṃ katheti –
atk-s0203a0:94_1: citteneva tīsu uddhanesu tīṇi kapallāni āropetvā heṭṭhā aggiṃ katvā citteneva attano dvattiṃsākāraṃ uppāṭetvā
atk-s0203a0:94_2: kapallesu pakkhipitvā citteneva daṇḍakena parivattetvā parivattetvā bhajjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:95_1: citteneva mahācāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā matthuṃ yojetvā citteneva attano dvattiṃsākāraṃ uppāṭetvā tattha pakkhipitvā matthuṃ otāretvā manthitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:95_5: Ettāvatā vo amataṃ paribhuttaṃ nāma bhavissati.
atk-s0203a0:95_6: Ito paraṃ “atha te bhikkhū”tiādi sabbaṃ purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:96_5: Ettha pana yo bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti,
atk-s0203a0:96_7: nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamati,
atk-s0203a0:96_12: nhānatitthe uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0203a0:96_13: parinibbute vā pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:96_14: cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:96_17: sammāsabuddhassa nāma lajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “tūṇhī hoti,
atk-s0203a0:97_0: Yo pana dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:98_0: Yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0203a0:98_12: Ekabhikkhusmimpi hi agārave kate saṅghe katoyeva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:98_13: Tisso sikkhā pana aparipūrayamānova sikkhāya na paripūrakārī nāma.
atk-s0203a0:99_0: Ajjhattaṃ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā. Bāhiddhāti parasmiṃ vā parassa parisāya vā.
atk-s0203a0:100_1: Idāni ayaṃ cha ṭhānāni nissāya uppannavivādo vaḍḍhanto yāni adhikaraṇāni pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:100_3: Tattha vūpasamanatthāya pavattamānehi samathehi adhikātabbānīti adhikaraṇāni.
atk-s0203a0:101_0: Idāni imānipi cattāri adhikaraṇāni patvā upari vaḍḍhento so vivādo yehi samathehi vūpasammati,
atk-s0203a0:102_1: adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vāti aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
atk-s0203a0:102_3: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
atk-s0203a0:102_5: Mātikāyaṃ āgatā pañca vibhaṅge dveti satta āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:102_6: Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:103_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca.
atk-s0203a0:103_5: tattha saṅghena vā gaṇena vā vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati.
atk-s0203a0:103_6: Evaṃ sammamāne pana tasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā,
atk-s0203a0:104_0: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa sāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo saṅghasammukhatā.
atk-s0203a0:105_1: atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti.
atk-s0203a0:105_2: Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhakaṃ sammannitvā tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu
atk-s0203a0:105_3: tīsu salākaggāhesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhetvā sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā
atk-s0203a0:105_5: evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:106_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
atk-s0203a0:106_7: ayaṃ nāmettha āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati.
atk-s0203a0:107_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti,
atk-s0203a0:107_1: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:107_2: Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0203a0:108_0: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi vuccamāno –
atk-s0203a0:108_3: nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati,
atk-s0203a0:108_4: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti,
atk-s0203a0:108_5: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:108_6: Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0203a0:109_0: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenāññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa –
atk-s0203a0:109_4: ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:109_5: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassa pāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:110_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
atk-s0203a0:110_2: Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti,
atk-s0203a0:110_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
atk-s0203a0:110_4: Tattha sammukhāvinayo tāva yo ca deseti,
atk-s0203a0:110_8: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati.
atk-s0203a0:111_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne
atk-s0203a0:111_2: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0203a0:111_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
atk-s0203a0:111_4: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsupagatā “na me taṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā “dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti,
atk-s0203a0:111_6: sabbesampi ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0203a0:112_0: Imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti.
atk-s0203a0:112_1: Tena vuttaṃ “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe…
atk-s0203a0:113_3: so etena nayena saṅkhepatova vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:113_4: Tattha dhammotiādīsu suttantapariyāyena tāva dasa kusalakammapathā dhammo,
atk-s0203a0:113_6: Tathā “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti heṭṭhā āgatā sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā,
atk-s0203a0:113_7: tayo satipaṭṭhānā tayo sammappadhānā tayo iddhipādā cha indriyāni cha balāni aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā navaṅgiko maggo cāti,
atk-s0203a0:113_8: cattāro upādānā pañca nīvaraṇānītiādayo saṅkaliṭṭhadhammā cāti ayaṃ adhammo.
atk-s0203a0:114_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci ekaṃ adhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā “imaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti karissāma,
atk-s0203a0:114_2: mayañca loke pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti taṃ adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathentā dhammoti vivadanti.
atk-s0203a0:114_3: Tattheva dhammakoṭṭhāsesu ekaṃ gahetvā “adhammo aya”nti kathentā adhammoti vivadanti.
atk-s0203a0:115_0: Vinayapariyāyena pana bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā yathāpaṭiññāya kātabbakammaṃ dhammo nāma,
atk-s0203a0:115_1: abhūtena pana vatthunā acodetvā asāretvā apaṭiññāya katabbakammaṃ adhammo nāma.
atk-s0203a0:115_2: Tesupi adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathentā dhammoti vivadanti,
atk-s0203a0:116_0: Suttantapariyāyena pana rāgavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo saṃvaro pahānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ vinayo nāma,
atk-s0203a0:116_1: rāgādīnaṃ avinayo asaṃvaro appahānaṃ appaṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ avinayo nāma.
atk-s0203a0:116_2: Vinayapariyāyena vatthusampatti ñattisampatti anusāvanasampatti sīmasampati parisasampattīti ayaṃ vinayo nāma,
atk-s0203a0:116_5: Tesupi yaṃkiñci avinayaṃ “vinayo aya”nti kathentā vinayoti vivadanti,
atk-s0203a0:117_0: Dhammanetti samanumajjitabbāti dhammarajju anumajjitabbā ñāṇena ghaṃsitabbā upaparikkhitabbā.
atk-s0203a0:117_1: Sā panesā dhammanetti “iti kho vaccha ime dasa dhammā akusalā dasa dhammā kusalā”ti evaṃ mahāvacchagottasutte āgatāti vuttā.
atk-s0203a0:117_3: yo vā idha dhammoti ca vinayo ca vutto.
atk-s0203a0:117_4: Yathā tattha sametīti yathā tāya dhammanettiyā sameti,
atk-s0203a0:117_9: Tathā tanti evaṃ taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:117_11: sammukhāvinayo pana na kismiñci adhikaraṇe na labbhati.
atk-s0203a0:118_1: Taṃ panetaṃ yasmā dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca,
atk-s0203a0:118_2: tasmā heṭṭhā mātikāya ṭhapitānukkamena idāni sativinayassa vāre pattepi taṃ avatvā vivādādhikaraṇayeva tāva dutiyasamathaṃ dassento kathañcānanda,
atk-s0203a0:118_4: Tattha bahutarāti antamaso dvīhi tīhipi atirekatarā.
atk-s0203a0:119_1: Idāni heṭṭhā avitthāritaṃ sativinayaṃ ādiṃ katvā vitthāritāvasesasamathe paṭipāṭiyā vitthāretuṃ kathañcānanda,
atk-s0203a0:119_3: Tattha pārājikasāmantena vāti dve sāmantāni khandhasāmantañca āpattisāmantañca.
atk-s0203a0:119_7: dubbhāsitāpattikkhandhoti evaṃ purimassa pacchimakhandhaṃ khandhasāmantaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:119_10: Tattha khandhasāmante pārājikasāmantaṃ garukāpatti nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:120_1: Bhāsitaparikkantanti vācāya bhāsitaṃ kāyena ca parikkantaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:121_2: Ravāti aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmena aññaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ kho, ānanda,
atk-s0203a0:121_3: tassapāpiyasikā hotīti tassapuggalassa pāpussannatā pāpiyasikā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:122_2: tiṇavatthārakoti ettha idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā tiṇavatthārakoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:122_3: Yathā hi gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ duggandhatāya bādhati,
atk-s0203a0:122_4: tiṇehi avattharitvā suppaṭicchāditassa panassa so gandho na bādhati,
atk-s0203a0:122_5: evameva yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ mūlānumūlaṃ gantvā vūpasamiyamānaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0203a0:122_6: taṃ iminā kammena vūpasantaṃ gūthaṃ viya tiṇavatthārakena paṭicchannaṃ vūpasantaṃ hotīti idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā tiṇavatthārakoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:122_11: Ettha pana thullavajjanti thūllavajjaṃ pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca.
atk-s0203a0:122_12: Gihipaṭisaṃyuttanti gihīnaṃ hīnena khuṃsanavambhanadhammikapaṭissavesu āpannā āpatti.
atk-s0203a0:122_14: Kiccādhikaraṇassa pana vasena idha na kiñci vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:123_1: dhammā sāraṇīyāti heṭṭhā kalahavasena suttaṃ āraddhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:127_3: Byākatāti khīṇā jātītiādīhi catūhi padehi kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:127_5: anadhigate adhigatasaññino hutvā adhigataṃ amhehīti mānena byākariṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:128_1: Evañcettha sunakkhatta tathāgatassa hotīti sunakkhatta ettha etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañhabyākaraṇe –
atk-s0203a0:128_4: handa nesaṃ visodhetvā pākaṭaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desemī”ti,
atk-s0203a0:128_7: tassapi hoti aññathattanti bhagavā paṭipannakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0203a0:128_8: Yattha pana icchācāre ṭhitā ekacce moghapurisā honti,
atk-s0203a0:128_10: “ime imaṃ pañhaṃ uggahetvā ajānitvāva jānantā viya appatte pattasaññino hutvā gāmanigamādīsu visevamānā vicarissanti,
atk-s0203a0:128_11: taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti evamassāyaṃ icchācāre ṭhitānaṃ kāraṇā paṭipannakānampi
atk-s0203a0:128_12: atthāya “dhammaṃ desissāmī”ti uppannassa cittassa aññathābhāvo hoti.
atk-s0203a0:129_2: lokāmisabhūtesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu adhimutto tanninno taggaruko tappabbhāro.
atk-s0203a0:129_6: Āneñjasaṃyojanena hi kho visaṃyuttoti āneñjasamāpattisaṃyojanena visaṃsaṭṭho.
atk-s0203a0:129_7: Lokāmisādhimuttoti evarūpo hi lūkhacīvaradharo mattikāpattaṃ ādāya attano sadisehi katipayehi saddhiṃ paccantajanapadaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:129_8: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhakāle manussā disvā “mahāpaṃsukulikā āgatā”ti yāgubhattādīni sampādetvā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0203a0:129_12: ajjāpi vo bahūnaṃ dinnanti. Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:129_13: antovassaṃ idha vaseyyāthāti adhivāsetvā vihāramaggaṃ pucchitvā vihāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:129_15: Sāyaṃ eko āvāsiko te bhikkhū pucchati “kattha piṇḍāya caritthā”ti?
atk-s0203a0:129_18: Āma evarūpā nāma manussānaṃ saddhā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:129_23: Tato te paṃsukulikā punappunaṃ tesaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0203a0:129_25: Ettāvatā icchācāre ṭhitassa sīsaṃ nikkhantaṃ hoti udaraṃ phālitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:130_1: Idāni āneñjasamāpattilābhiṃ adhimānikaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panetantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:130_2: Āneñjādhimuttassāti kilesasiñcanavirahitāsu heṭṭhimāsu chasu samāpattīsu adhimuttassa tanninnassa taggaruno tappabbhārassa.
atk-s0203a0:130_4: Cha samāpattilābhino hi adhimānikassa pañcakāmaguṇāmisabandhanā patitapaṇḍupalāso viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:131_1: Idāni ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti lābhino adhimānikassa nighaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ ṭhānaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:131_3: Appaṭisandhikāti khuddakā muṭṭhipāsāṇamattā jatunā vā silesena vā allīyāpetvā paṭisandhātuṃ sakkā.
atk-s0203a0:131_6: Upari samāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpatti dvedhābhinnā selā viya hoti,
atk-s0203a0:132_1: Idāni nevasaññānāsaññāyatanalābhino adhimānikassa ca nighaṃsaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:132_3: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpattiyo vantasadisā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0203a0:133_1: Idāni khīṇāsavassa nighaṃsaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:133_3: Upari samāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpatti mūlacchinnatālo viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0203a0:134_2: Heṭṭhā hi samāpattilābhino adhimānikassapi khīṇāsavassapi nighaṃso kathito,
atk-s0203a0:134_3: sukkhavipassakassa pana adhimānikassapi khīṇāsavassapi na kathito.
atk-s0203a0:134_4: Tesaṃ dvinnampi nighaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:134_6: Samāpattilābhino hi adhimānikassa nighaṃse kathite sukkhavipassakassapi adhimānikassa kathitova hoti,
atk-s0203a0:134_7: samāpattilābhino ca khīṇāsavassa kathite sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavassa kathitova hoti.
atk-s0203a0:134_8: Etesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyāsappāyaṃ kathetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:135_5: Visaṃ nāma jānitvā khāditampi ajānitvā khāditampi visameva.
atk-s0203a0:135_6: Na hi khīṇāsavenapi “ahaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti asaṃvutena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:136_2: Chandarāgabyāpādenāti so avijjāsaṅkhāto visadoso chandarāgena ca byāpādena ca ruppati kuppati.
atk-s0203a0:136_7: Analañca te antarāyāyāti jīvitantarāyaṃ te kātuṃ asamatthaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:136_8: Rajosūkanti rajo ca vīhisukādi ca sūkaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:136_9: Asu ca visadosoti so ca visadoso.
atk-s0203a0:136_10: Tadubhayenāti yā sā asappāyakiriyā ca yo visadoso ca,
atk-s0203a0:137_0: Evameva khoti ettha saupādānasalluddhāro viya appahīno avijjāvisadoso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:137_1: asappāyakiriyāya ṭhitabhāvo viya chasu dvāresu asaṃvutakālo,
atk-s0203a0:137_2: tadubhayena vaṇe puthuttaṃ gate maraṇaṃ viya sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattanaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:137_3: maraṇamattaṃ dukkhaṃ viya aññatarāya garukāya saṃkiliṭṭhāya āpattiyā āpajjanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:139_0: Idāni khīṇāsavassa balaṃ dassento so vatātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:139_2: Iti viditvā nirupadhīti evaṃ jānitvā kilesupadhipahānā nirupadhi hoti,
atk-s0203a0:139_4: Upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttoti upadhīnaṃ saṅkhayabhūte nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto.
atk-s0203a0:139_8: taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto khīṇāsavo pañca kāmaguṇe sevituṃ,
atk-s0203a0:139_9: kāyaṃ vā upasaṃharissati cittaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0203a0:143_6: Na hi tucchamuṭṭhīti vutte muṭṭhi nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:143_11: khettaṃ viya vatthu viya hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ca na paññāyittha,
atk-s0203a0:143_12: katipāheneva supinake diṭṭhā viya nassanti na paññāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:143_14: māyākatametanti yathā māyāya udakaṃ maṇīti katvā dassitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:143_16: aññaṃ vā pana evarūpaṃ dassanūpacāre ṭhitasseva tathā paññāyati,
atk-s0203a0:143_19: Yathā ca māyākāro udakādīni maṇiādīnaṃ vasena dassento vañceti,
atk-s0203a0:143_20: evaṃ kāmāpi aniccādīni niccādisabhāvaṃ dassentā vañcentīti vañcanakaṭṭhenapi “māyākata”nti vuttā.
atk-s0203a0:143_23: mayhaṃ hiraññaṃ mayhaṃ suvaṇṇanti evaṃ bālānaṃ lāpanato bālalāpanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:143_28: Ubhayametaṃ māradheyyanti ete kāmā ca kāmasaññā ca ubhayampi māradheyyaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:144_0: Mārassesa visayotiādīsupi yathā coḷassa visayo coḷavisayo,
atk-s0203a0:144_2: saṃvarānaṃ visayo saṃvaravisayoti pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ visayoti vuccati,
atk-s0203a0:144_6: Pañca pana kāmaguṇe nivāpabījaṃ viya vippakiranto māro gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:144_10: Yathā ca yattha hatthiādayo vasaṃ vattenti,
atk-s0203a0:145_3: duvidhe tāva kāme ārabbha abhijjhānalakkhaṇā abhijjhā,
atk-s0203a0:145_9: yo evarūpo cittassa āghātoti evaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:145_12: Idha manusikkhatoti imasmiṃ sāsane sikkhantassa te tayopi kilesā antarāyakarā honti.
atk-s0203a0:145_19: Subhāvitanti pana etaṃ kāmāvacarādīnaṃ nāmaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:145_21: Tasmā etassa vasena aparittaṃ appamāṇaṃ subhāvitanti sabbaṃ lokuttarameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:146_0: Tabbahulavihārinoti kāmapaṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:146_1: Āyatane cittaṃ pasīdatīti kāraṇe cittaṃ pasīdati.
atk-s0203a0:146_7: Sampasāde satīti ettha duvidho sampasādo adhimokkhasampasādo ca paṭilābhasampasādo ca.
atk-s0203a0:146_8: Arahattassa hi vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā viharato mahābhūtādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yenime nīhārena mahābhūtā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0203a0:146_12: ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmīti appaṭiladdheyeva āsā santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a0:146_14: Tatiyajjhānaṃ vā pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānatthāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontassa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādīni
atk-s0203a0:146_18: saṅkhāragataṃ vā vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā dibbacakkhukassa paraloko viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0203a0:146_19: cittuppādo lepapiṇḍe laggamāno viya upacārena samādhiyati,
atk-s0203a0:146_20: ajjeva catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattessāmīti apaṭiladdheyeva āsā santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a0:146_24: Yo pana arahattaṃ vā paṭilabhati catutthajjhānaṃ vā,
atk-s0203a0:146_26: Idha pana “āyatane cittaṃ pasīdatī”ti vacanato arahattavipassanāya ceva catutthajjhānūpacārassa ca paṭilābho paṭilābhasampasādoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:147_1: Paññāya vā adhimuccatīti ettha etarahi vā paññāya adhimuccati,
atk-s0203a0:147_2: āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatīti evaṃ padaparivattanaṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:147_4: tasmiṃ sampasāde sati etarahi vā paññāya adhimuccati,
atk-s0203a0:147_7: atha vā paññāya vā adhimuccatīti arahattamaggaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0203a0:147_9: Arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetuṃ asakkonto etarahi catusaccaṃ vā sacchikaroti.
atk-s0203a0:148_1: idha bhikkhu tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānassa kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0203a0:148_11: nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ naṃ karissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti.
atk-s0203a0:148_13: Arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkonto pana tato osakkitamānaso antarā na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a0:148_16: Yathā puriso “vanamahiṃsaṃ ghātessāmī”ti sattiṃ gahetvā anubandhanto sace taṃ ghāteti,
atk-s0203a0:148_18: asakkonto pana antarāmagge sasagodhādayo khuddakamige ghātetvā kājaṃ pūretvā etiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:149_0: Tattha purisassa sattiṃ gahetvā vanamahiṃsānubandhanaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānassa parikammakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:149_4: nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ naṃ karissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattassa sacchikaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:149_5: mahiṃsaṃ ghātetuṃ asakkontassa antarāmagge sasagodhādayo khuddakamige ghātetvā kājaṃ pūretvā gamanaṃ viya arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkontassa,
atk-s0203a0:150_0: Idāni arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkontassa nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ dassento kāyassa bhedātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:150_1: Tattha yanti yena kāraṇena taṃ saṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa āneñjūpagaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:150_3: Ettha ca taṃsaṃvattanikanti tassa bhikkhuno saṃvattanikaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:150_4: Yena vipākaviññāṇena so bhikkhu saṃvattati nibbattati,
atk-s0203a0:150_9: Yaṃ tassa bhikkhuno saṃvattanikaṃ upapattihetubhūtaṃ kusalaviññāṇaṃ āneñjūpagataṃ assa,
atk-s0203a0:150_17: āneñjūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti iminā nayena veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:150_21: Iti imasmiṃ paṭhamakaāneñje samādhivasena osakkanā kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:151_1: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti catutthajjhānaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:151_2: Ayañhi bhikkhu heṭṭhimena bhikkhunā paññavantataro tassa ca bhikkhuno attano cāti dvinnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a0:151_3: Tabbahulavihārinoti rūpapaṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:151_8: Iti imasmiṃ dutiyaāneñje vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a0:151_9: “yaṃkiñci rūpa”nti evaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ dassentena kathitāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:152_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:152_1: Ayañhi heṭṭhā dvīhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti tiṇṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a0:152_2: Ubhayametaṃ aniccanti ettha aṭṭha ekekakoṭṭhāsā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikavasena pana saṅkhipitvā ubhayanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:152_3: Nālaṃ abhinanditunti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinandituṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:152_5: Tabbahulavihārinoti kāmapaṭibāhanena ca rūpapaṭibāhanena ca tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:153_1: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:153_2: Ayañhi heṭṭhā tīhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti catunnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a0:153_3: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā etā heṭṭhā vuttā sabbasaññā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0203a0:153_4: Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti etaṃ aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya ca santaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:153_6: Tabbahulavihārinoti tāsaṃ saññānaṃ paṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:154_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanameva patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:154_1: Ayañhi heṭṭhā catūhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti pañcannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a0:154_2: Attena vā attaniyena vāti ahaṃ mamāti gahetabbena suññaṃ tucchaṃ rittaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:154_4: Tabbahulavihārinoti heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipadañca imañca suññatapaṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:155_1: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanameva patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:155_2: Ayañhi heṭṭhā pañcahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti channampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a0:155_4: na ca mama kvacani kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthīti ettha pana catukoṭikā suññatā kathitā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a0:155_5: Ayañhi nāhaṃ kvacanīti kvaci attānaṃ na passati,
atk-s0203a0:155_6: kassaci kiñcanatasminti attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ na passati,
atk-s0203a0:155_7: attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upagantvā upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:155_8: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama –
atk-s0203a0:155_9: saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā na ca kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatīti ayamattho.
atk-s0203a0:155_11: saddaṃ āharitvā mama kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthīti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti na passati.
atk-s0203a0:155_12: Attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa
atk-s0203a0:155_13: attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:155_14: Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati,
atk-s0203a0:155_15: na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
atk-s0203a0:155_17: na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
atk-s0203a0:155_19: Tabbahulavihārinoti heṭṭhā vuttappaṭipadaṃ imaṃ catukoṭisuññatañca bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:156_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:156_1: Ayañhi heṭṭhā chahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti sattannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a0:156_2: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ patvā ettha etā heṭṭhā vuttā sabbasaññā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0203a0:156_3: Tabbahulavihārinoti tāsaṃ saññānaṃ paṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:157_1: No cassa no ca me siyāti sace mayhaṃ pubbe pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ na āyūhitaṃ assa,
atk-s0203a0:157_2: yaṃ me idaṃ etarahi evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ etaṃ me na siyā nappavatteyyāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:157_3: Na bhavissatīti sace etarahi pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ āyūhitaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0203a0:157_4: Na me bhavissatīti tasmiṃ asati anāgate me pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0203a0:157_5: Yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ pajahāmīti yaṃ atthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ etarahi khandhapañcakaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:157_7: Evaṃ upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatīti so bhikkhu evaṃ vipassanupekkhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:158_1: bhikkhu na vā parinibbāyeyyāti kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati,
atk-s0203a0:158_2: tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa arahattampi osakkanāpi paṭipadāpi paṭisandhipi kathitā,
atk-s0203a0:158_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa na kiñci kathitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:158_7: So taṃ upekkhaṃ abhinandatīti so taṃ vipassanupekkhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinandanāhi abhinandati.
atk-s0203a0:158_9: Tannissitaṃ hoti viññāṇanti viññāṇaṃ vipassanānissitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:158_11: taṃ tassa upādānaṃ nāma gahaṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:158_13: Na parinibbāyatīti vipassanāya sālayo bhikkhu mama sāsane na parinibbāyati.
atk-s0203a0:158_20: so kira bhikkhu gahetabbaṭṭhānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ bhavaṃ upādiyati,
atk-s0203a0:159_1: Nissāya nissāyāti taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ nissāya.
atk-s0203a0:159_3: tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitabhikkhuno oghanittharaṇā kathitā…pe…
atk-s0203a0:159_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitabhikkhuno oghanittharaṇā kathitāti vadati.
atk-s0203a0:160_2: Samāpattiṃ tāva padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhanto bhikkhu nāvaṃ vā uḷumpādīni
atk-s0203a0:160_3: vā nissāya mahoghaṃ taritvā pāraṃ gacchanto viya na kilamati.
atk-s0203a0:160_4: Sukkhavipassako pana pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ gaṇhanto bāhubalena sotaṃ chinditvā pāraṃ gacchanto viya kilamati.
atk-s0203a0:160_5: Iti imassa sukkhavipassakassa arahattaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:160_7: Ayañhi heṭṭhā aṭṭhahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti navannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati.
atk-s0203a0:160_8: Esa sakkāyo yāvatā sakkāyoti yattako tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhāto sakkāyo nāma atthi,
atk-s0203a0:160_10: na ito paraṃ sakkāyo atthīti paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:161_0: Etaṃ amataṃ yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkhoti yo panesa cittassa anupādāvimokkho nāma,
atk-s0203a0:161_1: etaṃ amataṃ etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti paṭisañcikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:161_2: Aññattha ca “anupādā cittassa vimokkho”ti nibbānaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0203a0:161_3: Imasmiṃ pana sutte sukkhavipassakassa arahattaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:162_0: Kevalaṃ pana imasmiṃ sutte sattasu ṭhānesu osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a0:162_2: navasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a0:162_3: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ tāva pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a0:162_8: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pana padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā ṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a0:162_11: Tathā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno.
atk-s0203a0:162_12: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa pana osakkanā natthi,
atk-s0203a0:162_18: Imañca pana sattasu ṭhānesu osakkanaṃ aṭṭhasu paṭisandhiṃ navasu arahattaṃ samodhānetvā kathentena imaṃ āneñjasappāyasuttaṃ sukathitaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-s0203a0:166_2: Tattha yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarāti yāva paṭhamasopānaphalakā ekadivaseneva sattabhūmiko pāsādo na sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:166_3: vatthuṃ sodhetvā thambhussāpanato paṭṭhāya pana yāva cittakammakaraṇā anupubbakiriyā cettha paññāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:166_4: Yadidaṃ ajjheneti tayopi vedā na sakkā ekadivaseneva adhīyituṃ,
atk-s0203a0:166_5: etesaṃ ajjhenepi pana anupubbakiriyāva paññāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:166_6: Issattheti āvudhavijjāyapi ekadivaseneva vālavedhi nāma na sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:166_7: ṭhānasampādanamuṭṭhikaraṇādīhi pana etthāpi anupubbakiriyā paññāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:166_9: Tattha anupubbakiriyaṃ attanāva dassento evaṃ gaṇāpemātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:167_1: Seyyathāpi brāhmaṇāti idha bhagavā yasmā bāhirasamaye yathā yathā sippaṃ uggaṇhanti,
atk-s0203a0:167_3: tasmā attano sāsanaṃ bāhirasamayena anupametvā bhadraassājānīyena upamento seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:167_4: Bhadro hi assājānīyo yasmiṃ kāraṇe damito hoti,
atk-s0203a0:167_6: Evameva sāsane sammāpaṭipanno kulaputto sīlavelaṃ nātikkamati.
atk-s0203a0:168_2: Dve hi khīṇāsavā satatavihārī ca nosatatavihārī ca.
atk-s0203a0:168_3: Tattha satatavihārī yaṃkiñci kammaṃ katvāpi phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:168_4: no satatavihārī pana appamattakepi kicce kiccappasuto hutvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0203a0:169_1: eko kira khīṇāsavatthero khīṇāsavasāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā araññavāsaṃ gato,
atk-s0203a0:169_4: taṃ vitakkento thero ekadivasampi phalasamāpattiṃ appetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0203a0:169_5: Sāmaṇero pana temāsaṃ phalasamāpattiratiyā vītināmetvā “sappāyo, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:169_10: so ime dhamme ādito paṭṭhāya āvajjitvāva samāpajjituṃ sakkhissatīti dassento “satisampajaññāya cā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:170_1: bho gotamāti tathāgate kira kathayanteva brāhmaṇassa “ime puggalā na ārādhenti,
atk-s0203a0:175_3: dhātubhājanīyaṃ katvā dhammasaṅgītiṃ kātuṃ rājagahaṃ āgatakāle.
atk-s0203a0:175_4: Rañño pajjotassa āsaṅkamānoti caṇḍapajjoto nāmesa rājā bimbisāramahārājassa sahāyo ahosi,
atk-s0203a0:175_5: jīvakaṃ pesetvā bhesajjakāritakālato paṭṭhāya pana daḷhamittova jāto,
atk-s0203a0:175_6: so “ajātasattunā devadattassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitā ghātito”ti sutvā “mama piyamittaṃ ghātetvā esa rajjaṃ karissāmīti maññati,
atk-s0203a0:175_7: mayhaṃ sahāyassa sahāyānaṃ atthikabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti parisati vācaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:176_1: ayañca mahesakkho rājavallabho saṅgahe kate veḷuvanassa ārakkhaṃ kareyyāti maññamāno upasaṅkami.
atk-s0203a0:176_6: Cha hi satthāro paṭhamataraṃ appaññātakulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā,
atk-s0203a0:176_11: tassa accayena sāvakānaṃ mahāvivādo bhavissatīti ayaṃ kathā sakalajambudīpaṃ pattharamānā udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:176_12: Sammāsambuddhe ca dharante bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo nāhosi.
atk-s0203a0:176_16: “aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ apavāhituṃ samatthassa vātassa purato purāṇapaṇṇaṃ kiṃ ṭhassati,
atk-s0203a0:176_17: dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattassa satthu alajjamāno maccurājā kassa lajjissatī”ti mahāsaṃvegaṃ
atk-s0203a0:176_18: janetvā bhiyyosomattāya bhikkhū samaggā jātā ativiya upasantupasantā,
atk-s0203a0:176_19: kiṃ nu kho etanti idaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:177_1: Atthi nu khoti ayampi heṭṭhimapucchameva pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:177_3: Ko hetu sāmaggiyāti tumhākaṃ samaggabhāvassa ko hetu ko paccayo.
atk-s0203a0:178_2: Āpatti hoti vītikkamoti ubhayametaṃ buddhassa āṇātikkamanameva.
atk-s0203a0:178_3: Yathādhammaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ kāremāti yathā dhammo ca anusiṭṭhi ca ṭhitā,
atk-s0203a0:179_0: Na kira no bhavanto kārenti dhammo no kāretīti padadvayepi no kāro nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:179_1: Evaṃ sante na kira bhavanto kārenti,
atk-s0203a0:180_2: Kahaṃ pana bhavaṃ ānandoti kiṃ therassa veḷuvane vasanabhāvaṃ na jānātīti? Jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:180_5: Kasmā pana tena tattha ārakkhā dinnā?
atk-s0203a0:180_6: So kira ekadivasaṃ mahākaccāyanattheraṃ gijjhakūṭā otarantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0203a0:180_15: pacchā me makkaṭabhūtakāle gocaraṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti veḷuvane nānāvidhe rukkhe ropetvā ārakkhaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0203a0:180_16: Aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā makkaṭo hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0203a0:180_19: bho ānandāti evaṃ therena parisamajjhe attano ukkaṃsitabhāvaṃ ñatvā ahampi theraṃ ukkaṃsissāmīti evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:181_2: brāhmaṇāti thero kira cintesi “sammāsambuddhena vaṇṇitajjhānampi atthi,
atk-s0203a0:181_4: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo sabbameva vaṇṇetīti pañhaṃ visaṃvādeti,
atk-s0203a0:181_5: na kho pana sakkā imassa mukhaṃ ulloketuṃ na piṇḍapātaṃ rakkhituṃ,
atk-s0203a0:181_6: pañhaṃ ujuṃ katvā kathessāmī”ti idaṃ vattuṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:181_9: so bhagavā jhānaṃ vaṇṇesīti idha sabbasaṅgāhakajjhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:182_0: Yaṃ no mayanti ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇo vassakārabrāhmaṇaṃ usūyati,
atk-s0203a0:182_1: tena pucchitapañhassa akathanaṃ paccāsīsamāno kathitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “vassakārena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ punappunaṃ tassa nāmaṃ gaṇhanto vitthāretvā kathesi,
atk-s0203a0:182_2: mayā pucchitapañhaṃ pana yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva kathesī”ti anattamano ahosi,
atk-s0203a0:186_5: Upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:186_21: Evaṃ puṇṇāya puṇṇamāyāti imasmiṃ padadvaye attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:187_1: Tena hi tvaṃ bhikkhu sake āsane nisīditvā pucchāti kasmā bhagavā ṭhitassa akathetvā nisīdāpesīti.
atk-s0203a0:187_2: Ayaṃ kira bhikkhu saṭṭhimattānaṃ padhāniyabhikkhūnaṃ saṅghatthero saṭṭhi bhikkhū gahetvā araññe vasati,
atk-s0203a0:187_3: te tassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭenti vāyamanti.
atk-s0203a0:187_6: Atha ne ācariyupaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisinne thero mahābhūtapariggahādīni pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:187_8: maggaphalapañhaṃ pucchitā pana kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0203a0:187_13: Evaṃ santepi maggaphalāni nibbattetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0203a0:187_17: atha nesaṃ satthā cariyavasena dhammaṃ desessatī”ti,
atk-s0203a0:187_18: te bhikkhū gahetvā satthu santikaṃ āgato.
atk-s0203a0:188_0: Satthāpi sāyanhasamaye ānandattherena upanītaṃ udakaṃ ādāya sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpetvā migāramātupāsādapariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi,
atk-s0203a0:189_5: candimasūriyānaṃ pabhaṃ makkhetvā chabbaṇṇā yamakabuddharasmiyo vijjotamānā puñjā puñjā hutvā disāvidisāsu
atk-s0203a0:189_12: Evaṃ sannisinnāya parisāya thero uṭṭhahitvā satthāraṃ pañhassa okāsaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0203a0:189_14: “sace imasmiṃ ṭhitake pucchante ‘ācariyo no uṭṭhito’ti sesabhikkhū uṭṭhahissanti,
atk-s0203a0:189_18: ekaggā hutvā dhammadesanaṃ paṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇissanti.
atk-s0203a0:189_20: Tato ekaggā dhammadesanaṃ paṭicchituṃ sakkuṇissantī”ti iminā kāraṇena bhagavā ṭhitassa akathetvā nisīdāpetīti.
atk-s0203a0:190_2: Thero pana pañcakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ patto mahākhīṇāsavo,
atk-s0203a0:190_4: Jānantenapi pana ajānantena viya hutvā pucchituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:190_6: “jānāti aya”nti tassa tassa vissajjento ekadesameva katheti.
atk-s0203a0:190_7: Ajānantena viya pucchite pana kathento ito ca etto ca kāraṇaṃ āharitvā pākaṭaṃ katvā katheti.
atk-s0203a0:190_8: Koci pana ajānantopi jānanto viya pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:190_10: jānantoyeva pana ajānanto viya pucchatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:191_2: haritālavaṇṇo vā manosilāvaṇṇo vā siyanti pattheti.
atk-s0203a0:191_4: nīluppalavaṇṇo vā añjanavaṇṇo vā atasīpupphavaṇṇo vā siyanti pattheti.
atk-s0203a0:191_5: Evaṃvedanoti kusalavedano vā sukhavedano vā siyanti pattheti.
atk-s0203a0:191_7: Yasmā pana atīte patthanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:191_8: patthentenāpi ca na sakkā taṃ laddhuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:191_10: na hi odāto kāḷabhāvaṃ patthetvā paccuppanne kāḷo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:191_14: dānaṃ pana datvā sīlaṃ vā samādiyitvā “anāgate khattiyo vā homi brāhmaṇo vā”ti patthentassa patthanā samijjhati.
atk-s0203a0:192_0: Khandhādhivacananti khandhānaṃ khandhapaṇṇatti kittakena hotīti pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:193_0: Mahābhūtā hetūti “tayo kusalahetū”tiādīsu hi hetuhetu vutto.
atk-s0203a0:193_4: Tattha pathavīdhātu mahābhūtaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhūtānaṃ upādārūpassa ca paññāpanāya dassanatthāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a0:194_3: phuṭṭho cetetī”ti vacanato phasso tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a0:194_4: Viññāṇakkhandhassāti ettha paṭisandhiviññāṇena tāva saddhiṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ uparimaparicchedena samatiṃsa
atk-s0203a0:194_5: rūpāni sampayuttā ca tayo khandhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0203a0:194_6: taṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a0:194_9: Taṃ nāmarūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0203a0:195_2: bhanteti idaṃ kittakena nu khoti vaṭṭaṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:195_3: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti idaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:196_1: Ayaṃ rūpe assādoti iminā pariññāpaṭivedho ceva dukkhasaccañca kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:196_2: Ayaṃ rūpe ādīnavoti iminā pahānapaṭivedho ceva samudayasaccañca.
atk-s0203a0:196_3: Idaṃ rūpe nissaraṇanti iminā sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho ceva nirodhasaccañca.
atk-s0203a0:196_4: Ye imesu tīsu ṭhānesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo dhammā,
atk-s0203a0:197_3: “Saviññāṇake kāye”ti vacanena vā attano ca parassa ca kāyo gahitova,
atk-s0203a0:198_2: Kamattānaṃ phusissantīti katarasmiṃ attani ṭhatvā vipākaṃ dassentīti sassatadassanaṃ okkamanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:198_5: Saṭṭhimattānanti ime bhikkhū pakatikammaṭṭhānaṃ jahitvā aññaṃ navakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasantā pallaṅkaṃ abhinditvā tasmiṃyeva āsane arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:202_2: Tattha tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ anuviloketi,
atk-s0203a0:202_4: Anuviloketvāti pañcapasādapaṭimaṇḍitāni akkhīni ummīletvā tato tato viloketvā antamaso hatthakukkuccapādakukkuccānampi abhāvaṃ disvā.
atk-s0203a0:202_6: bhanteti yasmā andho andhaṃ viya so taṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:202_8: Eteneva nayena ito paresupi vāresu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:202_21: dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti evaṃ attano dukkhatthāya cinteti.
atk-s0203a0:202_22: Parabyābādhāyāti yathā asuko asukaṃ pāṇaṃ hanti,
atk-s0203a0:202_25: evaṃ naṃ āṇāpessāmīti evaṃ parassa dukkhatthāya cinteti.
atk-s0203a0:202_26: Ubhayabyābādhāyāti ahaṃ asukañca asukañca gahetvā dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti evaṃ ubhayadukkhatthāya cintetīti.
atk-s0203a0:203_0: Attabyābādhāyapi mantetītiādīsu ahaṃ dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti mantento attabyābādhāya manteti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:203_1: Asukaṃ dasa akusalakammapathe samādapessāmīti mantento parabyābādhāya manteti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:203_3: “mayaṃ ubhopi ekato hutvā dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmā”ti mantento ubhayabyābādhāya manteti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:204_0: Asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ detīti deyyadhammampi puggalampi na sakkaroti.
atk-s0203a0:204_1: Deyyadhammaṃ na sakkaroti nāma uttaṇḍulādidosasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ deti,
atk-s0203a0:204_3: Puggalaṃ na sakkaroti nāma nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ asammajjitvā yattha vā tattha vā nisīdāpetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā dānaṃ deti.
atk-s0203a0:204_6: Acittikatvāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena deyyadhammepi puggalepi na cittīkāraṃ katvā deti.
atk-s0203a0:204_7: Apaviddhanti chaḍḍetukāmo hutvā vammike uragaṃ pakkhipanto viya deti.
atk-s0203a0:205_0: Tattha upapajjatīti na dānaṃ datvā niraye upapajjati.
atk-s0203a0:205_1: Yaṃ pana tena pāpaladdhikāya micchādassanaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:210_2: Tattha etadavocāti etaṃ “paṇḍito”tiādinā nayena dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa guṇakathaṃ avoca. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a0:210_3: Avasesattheresu hi mahāmoggallānattherassa iddhimāti guṇo pākaṭo,
atk-s0203a0:210_9: Evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ te te guṇā pākaṭā,
atk-s0203a0:210_11: Paññavato hi guṇā na sakkā akathitā jānituṃ.
atk-s0203a0:210_12: Iti bhagavā “sāriputtassa guṇe kathessāmī”ti sabhāgaparisāya sannipātaṃ āgamesi.
atk-s0203a0:210_13: Visabhāgapuggalānañhi santike vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0203a0:210_15: Imasmiṃ pana divase therassa sabhāgaparisā sannipati,
atk-s0203a0:210_16: tassā sannipatitabhāvaṃ disvā satthā vaṇṇaṃ kathento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:211_0: Tattha paṇḍitoti dhātukusalatā āyatanakusalatā paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalatāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito.
atk-s0203a0:213_24: puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.
atk-s0203a0:214_1: idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0203a0:214_21: hāsabahulo vedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulo paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:215_3: sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:215_8: sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:215_10: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:215_13: anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:215_16: vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:215_19: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:215_20: nirodhadhammanti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti
atk-s0203a0:216_6: uppannaṃ rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:216_13: sabbe bhavagāmikamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:216_17: cha ca abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā passitā paññāyāti tikkhapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:217_1: idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu,
atk-s0203a0:217_2: anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:218_0: Anupadadhammavipassananti samāpattivasena vā jhānaṅgavasena vā anupaṭipāṭiyā dhammavipassanaṃ vipassati,
atk-s0203a0:218_4: Mahāmoggallānatthero hi sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto satta divase vāyamitvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0203a0:218_5: Sāriputtatthero ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca sammasanacāraṃ sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ nippadesaṃ sammasi.
atk-s0203a0:218_8: “ṭhapetvā buddhe ca paccekabuddhe ca añño sāvako nāma paññāya mayā pattabbaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma na bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:218_9: Yathā hi puriso veḷuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmīti mahājaṭaṃ veḷuṃ disvā jaṭaṃ chindantassa papañco bhavissatīti
atk-s0203a0:218_10: antarena hatthaṃ pavesetvā sampattameva yaṭṭhiṃ mūle ca agge ca chinditvā ādāya pakkameyya,
atk-s0203a0:218_12: yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati.
atk-s0203a0:218_13: Aparo ca tathārūpameva veṇuṃ disvā “sace sampattaṃ yaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0203a0:218_14: sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhissāmī”ti kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahantena satthena veṇujaṭaṃ chinditvā sārā ceva ujū ca yaṭṭhiyo uccinitvā ādāya pakkameyya.
atk-s0203a0:218_16: yaṭṭhiyo pana sārā ceva ujū ca labhati.
atk-s0203a0:218_17: Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ therānaṃ padhānaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:219_0: Evaṃ pana addhamāsaṃ vāyamitvā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero sūkarakhataleṇadvāre bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa
atk-s0203a0:219_1: vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne dasabalaṃ bījayamāno ṭhito desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0203a0:219_2: pannarasame divase sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patvā sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni paṭivijjhitvā soḷasavidhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:220_2: sāriputtassa anupadadhammavipassanāyāti yā anupadadhammavipassanaṃ vipassatīti anupadadhammavipassanā vuttā,
atk-s0203a0:220_4: Idāni vattabbaṃ taṃ taṃ vipassanākoṭṭhāsaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:221_1: Paṭhame jhāneti ye paṭhame jhāne antosamāpattiyaṃ dhammā.
atk-s0203a0:221_3: Anupadavavatthitā hontīti anupaṭipāṭiyā vavatthitā paricchinnā ñātā viditā honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a0:221_4: Thero hi te dhamme olokento abhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakko vattatīti jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:221_18: Evaṃ jānaṃ abhiniropanaṭṭhena vitakkaṃ sabhāvato vavatthapeti…pe…
atk-s0203a0:222_0: Viditā uppajjantīti uppajjamānā viditā pākaṭāva hutvā uppajjanti.
atk-s0203a0:222_1: Viditā upaṭṭhahantīti tiṭṭhamānāpi viditā pākaṭāva hutvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0203a0:222_2: Viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantīti nirujjhamānāpi viditā pākaṭāva hutvā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0203a0:222_3: Ettha pana taṃñāṇatā ceva ñāṇabahutā ca mocetabbā.
atk-s0203a0:222_4: Yathā hi teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ na sakkā phusituṃ,
atk-s0203a0:222_5: evameva teneva cittena tassa cittassa uppādo vā ṭhiti vā bhaṅgo vā na sakkā jānitunti.
atk-s0203a0:222_7: Yadi pana dve cittāni ekato uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:222_8: ekena cittena ekassa uppādo vā ṭhiti vā bhaṅgo vā sakkā bhaveyya jānituṃ.
atk-s0203a0:222_9: Dve pana phassā vā vedanā vā saññā vā cetanā vā cittāni vā ekato uppajjanakāni nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:222_13: Mahātherassa antosamāpattiyaṃ soḷasa dhammā viditā pākaṭā hontīti.
atk-s0203a0:222_15: Therena hi vatthu ceva ārammaṇañca pariggahitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:222_16: tenassa tesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādaṃ āvajjantassa uppādo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:222_19: Tena vuttaṃ “viditā uppajjanti viditā upaṭṭhahanti viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:223_5: Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi vā visaṃyutto.
atk-s0203a0:224_0: Tattha dve mariyādā kilesamariyādā ca ārammaṇamariyādā ca.
atk-s0203a0:224_1: Sace hissa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte soḷasa dhamme ārabbha rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:224_3: tesu panassa ekopi na uppannoti kilesamariyādā natthi.
atk-s0203a0:224_4: Sace panassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte soḷasa dhamme āvajjantassa ekacce āpāthaṃ nāgaccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:224_6: Te panassa soḷasa dhamme āvajjantassa āpāthaṃ anāgatadhammo nāma natthīti ārammaṇamariyādāpi natthi.
atk-s0203a0:225_0: Aparāpi dve mariyādā vikkhambhanamariyādā ca samucchedamariyādā ca.
atk-s0203a0:225_3: Tassa vikkhambhitapaccanīkattā natthīti vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati.
atk-s0203a0:226_1: Aññesu ca suttesu “uttari nissaraṇa”nti nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:226_2: idha pana anantaro viseso adhippetoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:226_4: Atthitvevassa hotīti tassa therassa atthītiyeva daḷhataraṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:227_0: Dutiyavāre pana sampasādanaṭṭhena sampasādo. Sabhāvato vavatthapeti.
atk-s0203a0:228_1: Passaddhattā cetaso anābhogoti yo so “yadeva tattha sukha”nti cetaso ābhogo,
atk-s0203a0:228_2: etenetaṃ oḷārikamakkhāyatīti evaṃ passaddhattā cetaso anābhogo vutto,
atk-s0203a0:229_1: Sato vuṭṭhahatīti satiyā samannāgato ñāṇena sampajāno hutvā vuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:229_2: Te dhamme samanupassatīti yasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatane buddhānaṃyeva anupadadhammavipassanā hoti,
atk-s0203a0:230_0: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni disvā cattāro āsavā khīṇā honti.
atk-s0203a0:230_1: Sāriputtattherassa samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā arahattaṃ pattavāropi atthi,
atk-s0203a0:230_4: nirodhaṃ pana ciṇṇavasitāya aparāparaṃ samāpajjissatīti vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:231_0: Tatthassa yasmiṃ kāle nirodhasamāpatti sīsaṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:231_6: Jambudīpavāsino therā pana vadanti “sāriputtatthero samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikatvā nirodhaṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0203a0:231_11: tasmā te vā vipassatīti dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:232_3: Orasotiādīsu thero bhagavato ure nibbattasaddaṃ sutvā jātoti oraso,
atk-s0203a0:232_4: mukhena pabhāvitaṃ saddaṃ sutvā jātoti mukhato jāto,
atk-s0203a0:232_5: dhammena pana jātattā nimmitattā dhammajo dhammanimmito,
atk-s0203a0:236_2: Tattha khīṇā jātītiādīsu ekenāpi padena aññā byākatāva hoti, dvīhipi.
atk-s0203a0:236_3: Idha pana catūhi padehi aññabyākaraṇaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0203a0:236_4: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhavāditātiādīsu yāya cetanāya diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ meti vadati,
atk-s0203a0:236_9: parinibbutassa panassa sabbopi khīṇāsavassa sakkāro kātabbo.
atk-s0203a0:236_10: Uttariṃ pañhoti sace panassa veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭhā hotha,
atk-s0203a0:236_12: Ito paresupi tīsu vāresu ayameva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:237_8: Cittañhi taṇhādiṭṭhīhi sakkāyadhammesu tiṭṭhati adhitiṭṭhatīti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo cetaso adhiṭṭhānā,
atk-s0203a0:238_7: Na anattato upagacchinti ahaṃ attāti attakoṭṭhāsena na upagamiṃ.
atk-s0203a0:238_8: Na ca pathavīdhātunissitanti pathavīdhātunissitā sesadhātuyo ca upādārūpañca arūpakkhandhā ca.
atk-s0203a0:238_9: Tepi hi nissitavatthurūpānaṃ pathavīdhātunissitattā ekena pariyāyena pathavīdhātunissitāva.
atk-s0203a0:238_10: Tasmā “na ca pathavīdhātunissita”nti vadanto sesarūpārūpadhammepi attato na upagacchinti vadati.
atk-s0203a0:238_11: Ākāsadhātunissitapade pana avinibbhogavasena sabbampi bhūtupādārūpaṃ ākāsadhātunissitaṃ nāma,
atk-s0203a0:238_14: Viññāṇadhātunissitapade pana sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañca viññāṇadhātunissitanti rūpārūpaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:239_1: Rūpe cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesūti ettha yaṃ atīte cakkhudvārassa āpāthaṃ āgantvā niruddhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:239_5: Yaṃ pana atītepi āpāthaṃ anāgantvā niruddhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:239_8: taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbadhammesu saṅgahitanti vutte tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero āha –
atk-s0203a0:239_12: Tasmā tīsu kālesu āpāthaṃ āgataṃ vā anāgataṃ vā sabbampi taṃ rūpameva,
atk-s0203a0:239_13: cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā pana tayo khandhā cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbadhammāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:240_4: Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti idaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ dibbacakkhuñca avatvā kasmā vuttaṃ?
atk-s0203a0:240_10: Ettha hi cattāro vohārā pañca khandhā cha dhātuyo cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni attano saviññāṇakakāyo
atk-s0203a0:240_11: paresaṃ saviññāṇakakāyoti ime cha koṭṭhāsā visuddhā,
atk-s0203a0:240_13: Parasamuddavāsittherā pana attano ca parassa ca viññāṇakakāyaṃ ekameva katvā catūhi āhārehi saddhinti cha koṭṭhāse vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:241_0: Ime pana cha koṭṭhāsā “kiṃ te adhigataṃ,
atk-s0203a0:241_5: katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti evaṃ vinayaniddesapariyāyena sodhetabbā.
atk-s0203a0:242_0: Ettha hi kiṃ te adhigatanti adhigamapucchā,
atk-s0203a0:242_1: jhānavimokkhādīsu sotāpattimaggādīsu vā kiṃ tayā adhigataṃ.
atk-s0203a0:242_4: kiṃ tayā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dhuraṃ katvā adhigataṃ,
atk-s0203a0:243_2: kiṃ rattiṭṭhāne divāṭṭhāne rukkhamūle maṇḍape katarasmiṃ vā vihāreti vuttaṃ hoti.
