atk-s0203a0:575_7: Tattha tatthevāti sappimadhuphāṇitādīnaṃ sulabhaṭṭhānato loṇapūtimacchādīnaṃ ussannaṭṭhānaṃ nītā “pubbe amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ phāsukaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:575_9: idha loṇaṃ vā no bādhati pūtimacchagandho vā sīsarogaṃ uppādetī”ti evaṃ cittaṃ anuppādetvā tattha tattheva ramanti.
atk-s0203a0:576_4: Idāni taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchanto ko nu kho,
atk-s0203a0:578_1: Dīgharattaṃ kho meti thero kira pāramiyo pūrento isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā nirantaraṃ tīṇi attabhāvasatāni brahmaloke paṭilabhi,
atk-s0203a0:585_2: Tattha etadavocāti neva bhedādhippāyena na piyakamyatāya,
atk-s0203a0:585_4: “ime bhikkhū mama vacanaṃ gahetvā na oramissanti,
atk-s0203a0:585_6: addhā nesaṃ bhagavā ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathessati,
atk-s0203a0:585_11: Mā bhaṇḍanantiādīsu “akatthā”ti pāṭhasesaṃ gahetvā “mā bhaṇḍanaṃ akatthā”ti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0203a0:585_12: Aññataroti so kira bhikkhu bhagavato atthakāmo,
atk-s0203a0:585_14: “ime bhikkhū kodhābhibhūtā satthu vacanaṃ na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0203a0:586_5: Bhagavā hi tadā piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto “puthusaddo samajano”tiādigāthā bhāsitvā kosambito bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:586_7: tato pālileyyakavanasaṇḍaṃ gantvā pālileyyahatthināgena upaṭṭhahiyamāno temāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0203a0:586_10: gacchāma dhammassavanāyā”ti gandhapupphahatthā vihāraṃ gantvā “kahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:586_15: “Mayaṃ satampi sahassampi datvā satthāraṃ ānetuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0203a0:586_17: mayaṃ ime bhikkhū nissāya satthu sammukhā dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ na labhimhā.
atk-s0203a0:586_19: tasmimpi sāmaggiṃ karonte samaggā na jātā,
atk-s0203a0:586_21: Alaṃ na imesaṃ bhikkhā dātabbā”ti sakalanagare daṇḍaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:586_22: Te punadivase sakalanagaraṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kaṭacchumattampi bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā vihāraṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:586_26: Te “satthāraṃ khamāpessāmā”ti bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ anuppatte tattha agamaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:586_27: Satthā tesaṃ aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni desesīti ayamettha pāḷimuttakakathā.
atk-s0203a0:587_1: Idāni puthusaddotiādigāthāsu puthu mahāsaddo assāti puthusaddo.
atk-s0203a0:587_3: sabbovāyaṃ bhaṇḍanakārakajano samantato saddaniccharaṇena puthusaddo ceva sadiso cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:587_4: Na bālo koci maññathāti tatra koci ekopi ahaṃ bāloti na maññati,
atk-s0203a0:587_6: Nāññaṃ bhiyyo amaññarunti koci ekopi ahaṃ bāloti na ca maññi,
atk-s0203a0:587_7: bhiyyo ca saṅghasmiṃ bhijjamāne aññampi ekaṃ “mayhaṃ kāraṇā saṅgho bhijjatī”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ na maññīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:588_9: ekopi saṅghagāravena mukhasaṅkocanaṃ na karotīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:588_10: Yena nītāti yena kalahena imaṃ nillajjabhāvaṃ nītā.
atk-s0203a0:588_11: Na taṃ vidū na taṃ jānanti “evaṃ sādīnavo aya”nti.
atk-s0203a0:589_0: Ye ca taṃ upanayhantīti taṃ akkocchi mantiādikaṃ ākāraṃ ye upanayhanti. Sanantanoti porāṇo.
atk-s0203a0:590_0: Pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe bhaṇḍanakārakā pare nāma.
atk-s0203a0:590_1: Te ettha saṅghamajjhe kalahaṃ karontā “mayaṃ yamāmase upayamāma nassāma satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā”ti na jānanti.
atk-s0203a0:590_2: Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye ca tattha paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccuno samīpaṃ gacchāmā”ti vijānanti.
atk-s0203a0:590_3: Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0203a0:591_5: yesaṃ vo neva mātāpitūnaṃ aṭṭhīni chinnāni,
atk-s0203a0:591_6: na pāṇā haṭā na gavāssadhanāni haṭānīti.
atk-s0203a0:592_0: Sace labhethātiādigāthā paṇḍitasahāyassa ca bālasahāyassa ca vaṇṇāvaṇṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0203a0:592_1: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayānīti pākaṭaparissaye ca paṭicchannaparissaye ca abhibhavitvā tena saddhiṃ attamano satimā careyyāti.
atk-s0203a0:593_0: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitanti yathā attano vijitaraṭṭhaṃ mahājanakarājā ca arindamamahārājā ca pahāya ekakā vicariṃsu,
atk-s0203a0:593_5: Yathā hi mātuposako mātaṅganāgo araññe eko cari,
atk-s0203a0:593_9: na ca pāpāni kayirāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:594_3: Gaṇe kirassa ādīnavaṃ disvā ekavihāriṃ bhikkhuṃ passitukāmatā udapādi,
atk-s0203a0:594_4: tasmā sītādīhi pīḷito uṇhādīni patthayamāno viya upasaṅkami.
atk-s0203a0:594_8: Kalahakārake kirassa diṭṭhādīnavattā samaggavāsino bhikkhū passitukāmatā udapādi,
atk-s0203a0:594_9: tasmā sītādīhi pīḷito uṇhādīni patthayamāno viya tattha upasaṅkami.
atk-s0203a0:595_1: Atthi pana voti pacchimapucchāya lokuttaradhammaṃ puccheyya.
atk-s0203a0:595_3: tasmā taṃ pucchituṃ na yuttanti parikammobhāsaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:595_6: Tañca nimittaṃ nappaṭivijjhāmāti tañca kāraṇaṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0203a0:595_7: yena no obhāso ca rūpadassanañca antaradhāyati.
atk-s0203a0:596_0: Taṃ kho pana vo anuruddhā nimittaṃ paṭivijjhitabbanti taṃ vo kāraṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:596_1: Ahampi sudanti anuruddhā tumhe kiṃ na āḷulessanti,
atk-s0203a0:596_2: ahampi imehi ekādasahi upakkilesehi āḷulitapubboti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:596_3: Vicikicchā kho metiādīsu mahāsattassa ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā nānāvidhāni rūpāni disvā “idaṃ kho ki”nti vicikicchā udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:596_8: idāni kiñci na manasikarissāmīti amanasikāro udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:598_0: Chambhitattanti himavantābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dānavarakkhasaajagarādayo addasa,
atk-s0203a0:599_1: Adiṭṭhe kiṃ nāma bhaya”nti cintayato uppilāvitattaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:600_1: tena me uppilaṃ uppannanti vīriyaṃ sithilamakāsi,
atk-s0203a0:601_0: Accāraddhavīriyanti mama vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karoto duṭṭhullaṃ uppannanti puna vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato accāraddhavīriyaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:602_0: Atilīnavīriyanti mama vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato evaṃ jātanti puna vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karoto atilīnavīriyaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:603_0: Abhijappāti devalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devasaṅghaṃ passato taṇhā udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:604_0: Nānattasaññāti mayhaṃ ekajātikaṃ rūpaṃ manasikarontassa abhijappā uppannā,
atk-s0203a0:604_1: nānāvidharūpaṃ manasi karissāmīti kālena devalokābhimukhaṃ kālena manussalokābhimukhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nānāvidhāni rūpāni manasikaroto nānattasaññā udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:605_0: Atinijjhāyitattanti mayhaṃ nānāvidhāni rūpāni manasikarontassa nānattasaññā udapādi,
atk-s0203a0:605_1: iṭṭhaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ vā ekajātikameva manasi karissāmīti tathā manasikaroto atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:606_1: Obhāsanimittaṃ manasi karomīti parikammobhāsameva manasi karomi.
atk-s0203a0:606_2: Na ca rūpāni passāmīti dibbacakkhunā rūpāni na passāmi.
atk-s0203a0:606_3: Rūpanimittaṃ manasi karomīti dibbacakkhunā visayarūpameva manasi karomi.
atk-s0203a0:607_5: Parittaṃ me tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ samaye dibbacakkhupi parittakaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:609_0: Kadā pana bhagavā imaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ bhāveti?
atk-s0203a0:609_4: Pañcakanaye pañcamajjhānassa maggo natthīti so lokiyo ahosīti lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:613_2: Tattha bālalakkhaṇānīti bālo ayanti etehi lakkhiyati ñāyatīti bālalakkhaṇāni.
atk-s0203a0:614_9: bālassāti tasmiṃ upaṭṭhānākāre āpāthagate bālassa evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:615_1: Etadavocāti anusandhikusalo bhikkhu “nirayassa upamā kātuṃ na sakkā”ti na bhagavā vadati,
atk-s0203a0:615_3: na sukaraṃ pana sakkā hoti kātuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:615_4: handāhaṃ dasabalaṃ upamaṃ kārāpemīti cintetvā etaṃ “sakkā,
atk-s0203a0:615_6: Haneyyunti vinivijjhitvā gamanavasena yathā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dve pahārā nipatanti,
atk-s0203a0:616_2: Saṅkhampi na upetīti gaṇanamattampi na gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:616_3: Kalabhāgampīti satimaṃ kalaṃ sahassimaṃ kalaṃ satasahassimaṃ vā kalaṃ upagacchatītipi vattabbataṃ na upeti.
atk-s0203a0:616_6: Tattaṃ ayokhilanti tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ sampajjalitāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā tassa dakkhiṇahatthe tālappamāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pavesenti,
atk-s0203a0:616_9: evaṃ urenapi dakkhiṇapassenapi vāmapassenapi nipajjāpetvā taṃ kammakāraṇaṃ karontiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:616_10: Saṃvesetvāti sampajjalitāya lohapathaviyā tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ nipajjāpetvā.
atk-s0203a0:616_11: Kuṭhārīhīti mahatīhi gehassa ekapakkhachadanamattāhi kuṭhārīhi tacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:616_15: tacchantā pana suttāhataṃ karitvā dārū viya aṭṭhaṃsampi chaḷaṃsampi karonti.
atk-s0203a0:616_17: Tāhi tacchantā tacato yāva aṭṭhīni saṇikaṃ tacchanti,
atk-s0203a0:616_19: Rathe yojetvāti saddhiṃ yugayottapañcaracakkakubbarapācanehi sabbato sampajjalite rathe yojetvā.
atk-s0203a0:616_22: Sakimpi uddhanti supakkuthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhittataṇḍulā viya uddhaṃ adho tiriyañca gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:617_0: Bhāgaso mitoti bhāge ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā vibhatto.
atk-s0203a0:618_0: Samantā yojanasataṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhatīti evaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a0:618_1: yathā samantā yojanasate ṭhāne ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā viya nikkhamanti.
atk-s0203a0:619_0: Na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇitunti nirayo nāma evampi dukkho evampi dukkhoti vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ kathentenāpi
atk-s0203a0:619_1: matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathetuṃ na sukarāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:620_0: 251. Dantullehakanti dantehi ullehitvā, luñcitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rasādoti rasagedhena paribhuttaraso.
atk-s0203a0:622_1: Duddasikoti dārakānaṃ bhayāpanatthaṃ katayakkho viya duddaso.
atk-s0203a0:623_1: Adhibandhaṃ nigaccheyyāti yasmā bahuṃ jito sabbasāpateyyampissa nappahoti,
atk-s0203a0:623_3: Kevalā paripūrā bālabhūmīti bālo tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattati,
atk-s0203a0:623_4: tattha pakkāvasesena manussattaṃ āgato pañcasu nīcakulesu nibbattitvā puna tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye
atk-s0203a0:626_1: Sīsaṃ nhātassāti sīsena saddhiṃ gandhodakena nhātassa.
atk-s0203a0:626_3: Uparipāsādavaragatassāti pāsādavarassa upari gatassa subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā pāsādavarassa upari mahātale sirīgabbhaṃ pavisitvā sīlāni āvajjantassa.
atk-s0203a0:626_4: Tadā kira rājā pātova satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ datvā punapi soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi sīsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:626_5: nhāyitvā katapātarāso suddhaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā uparipāsādassa sirīsayane pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0203a0:627_0: Tesaṃ taṃ āvajjantānaṃyeva vuttappakārapuññakammapaccayaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ nīlamaṇisaṅghāṭasadisaṃ pācīnasamuddajalatalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:627_1: chindamānaṃ viya ākāsaṃ alaṅkurumānaṃ viya dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0203a0:627_4: Saha nemiyā saha nābhiyā cāti sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:628_0: Tattha cakkañca taṃ ratijananaṭṭhena ratanañcāti cakkaratanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:628_5: Majjhe chiddena viya candamaṇḍalena ubhosupi bāhirantesu rajatapaṭṭena kataparikkhepo hoti.
atk-s0203a0:628_6: Tesu panassā nābhipanāḷi parikkhepapaṭṭesu yuttaṭṭhāne paricchedalekhā suvibhattāva hutvā paññāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:629_1: te sattaratanamayā sūriyarasmiyo viya pabhāsampannā honti.
atk-s0203a0:630_0: Yāya pana taṃ nemiyā saha “sanemika”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:630_1: sā bālasūriyarasmikalāpasiriṃ avahasamānā viya surattasuddhasiniddhapavāḷamayā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:630_2: Sandhīsu panassā sañjhārāgasassirikarattajambonadapaṭṭā vaṭṭaparicchedalekhā ca suvibhattā paññāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:631_0: Nemimaṇḍalapiṭṭhiyaṃ panassa dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānamantare dhamanavaṃso viya antosusiro chiddamaṇḍalacitto vātagāhī pavāḷadaṇḍo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:631_1: yassa vātena paharitassa sukusalasamannāhatassa pañcaṅgikatūriyassa viya saddo vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca hoti.
atk-s0203a0:631_2: Tassa kho pana pavāḷadaṇḍassa upari setacchattaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:631_4: pavāḷadaṇḍasatena samupasobhitanemiparikkhepassa dvinnampi nābhipanāḷīnaṃ anto dve sīhamukhāni honti,
atk-s0203a0:631_6: ākāsagaṅgāgatisobhaṃ abhibhavamānā viya dve muttakalāpā olambanti,
atk-s0203a0:631_7: yehi cakkaratanena saddhiṃ ākāse samparivattamānehi tīṇi cakkāni ekato parivattantāni viya khāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:632_0: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ pakatiyā sāyamāsabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā attano attano gharadvāre paññattāsanesu
atk-s0203a0:632_1: nisīditvā pavattakathāsallāpesu manussesu vīthicatukkādīsu kīḷamāne dārakajane nātiuccena nātinīcena
atk-s0203a0:632_3: dvādasayojanato paṭṭhāya suyyamānena madhurassarena sattānaṃ sotāni odhāpayamānaṃ yojanato paṭṭhāya nānappabhāsamudayasamujjalena
atk-s0203a0:632_4: vaṇṇena nayanāni samākaḍḍhantaṃ rañño cakkavattissa puññānubhāvaṃ ugghosayantaṃ viya rājadhāniabhimukhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:633_0: Atha tassa cakkaratanassa saddassavaneneva “kuto nu kho,
atk-s0203a0:633_1: kassa nu kho ayaṃ saddo”ti āvajjitahadayānaṃ puratthimadisaṃ olokayamānānaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ aññataro aññataraṃ evamāha –
atk-s0203a0:633_5: etañhi rājahaṃsamithunaṃ viya puṇṇacandamithunaṃ pubbāpariyena gaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghatī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:633_7: “kiṃ kathesi samma kahaṃ nāma tayā dve puṇṇacandā ekato uggacchantā diṭṭhapubbā,
atk-s0203a0:633_8: nanu esa tapanīyaraṃsidhāro piñcharakiraṇo divākaro uggato”ti.
atk-s0203a0:633_12: so kathaṃ imaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ anubandhamāno uggacchissati,
atk-s0203a0:633_13: addhā panetaṃ anekaratanappabhāsamujjalaṃ ekassa puññavato vimānaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:634_0: Evaṃ pavattasallāpasseva tassa janassa candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya taṃ cakkaratanaṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:634_1: Tato tehi “kassa nu kho idaṃ nibbatta”nti vutte bhavanti vattāro –
atk-s0203a0:634_8: Tampi cakkaratanaṃ raññoyeva atthāya attano āgatabhāvaṃ ñāpetukāmaṃ viya sattakkhattuṃ pākāramatthakeneva
atk-s0203a0:634_9: nagaraṃ anusaṃyāyitvā rañño antepuraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā antepurassa uttarasīhapañjaraāsanne ṭhāne yathā
atk-s0203a0:635_0: Evaṃ ṭhitassa panassa vātapānacchiddādīhi pavisitvā nānāvirāgaratanappabhāsamujjalaṃ anto pāsādaṃ alaṅkurumānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:635_1: pabhāsamūhaṃ disvā dassanatthāya sañjātābhilāso rājā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:635_3: Atha rājā balavapītipāmojjaphuṭasarīro pallaṅkaṃ mocetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā sīhapañjarasamīpaṃ gantvā taṃ cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:635_4: disvā “sutaṃ kho pana meta”ntiādikaṃ cintanaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0203a0:635_7: assaṃ nu kho ahaṃ rājā cakkavattī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:635_8: Tattha so hoti rājā cakkavattīti kittāvatā cakkavattī hoti?
atk-s0203a0:636_0: Idāni tassa pavattāpanatthaṃ yaṃ kātabbaṃ taṃ dassento atha kho,
atk-s0203a0:636_2: Tattha uṭṭhāyāsanāti nisinnāsanato uṭṭhahitvā cakkaratanasamīpaṃ āgantvā.
atk-s0203a0:636_3: Bhiṅkāraṃ gahetvāti hatthisoṇḍasadisapanāḷiṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ ukkhipitvā vāmahatthena udakaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0203a0:636_6: Anvadeva rājā cakkavattī saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāyāti sabbacakkavattīnañhi udakena abhisiñcitvā “abhivijānātu
atk-s0203a0:636_7: bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti vacanasamanantarameva vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā cakkaratanaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0203a0:636_8: yassa pavattisamakālameva so rājā cakkavattī nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:637_0: Pavatte pana cakkaratane taṃ anubandhamānova rājā cakkavattī yānavaraṃ āruyha vehāsaṃ abbhuggacchati,
atk-s0203a0:637_1: athassa chattacāmarādihattho parijano ceva antepurajano ca.
atk-s0203a0:637_3: attano attano balakāyena saddhiṃ uparājasenāpati pabhūtayopi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rājānameva parivārenti.
atk-s0203a0:637_4: Rājayuttā pana janasaṅgahatthaṃ nagaravīthīsu bheriyo carāpenti “tātā amhākaṃ rañño cakkaratanaṃ nibbattaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:637_6: Mahājano pana pakatiyā cakkaratanasaddeneva sabbakiccāni pahāya gandhapupphādīni ādāya sannipatitova,
atk-s0203a0:637_7: sopi sabbo vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rājānameva parivāreti.
atk-s0203a0:637_8: Yassa yassa hi raññā saddhiṃ gantukāmatā uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:637_11: Tattha ekapurisopi chinnabhinnasarīro vā kiliṭṭhavattho vā natthi.
atk-s0203a0:637_13: Cakkavattiparisā nāma vijjādharaparisā viya ākāse gacchamānā indanīlamaṇitale vippakiṇṇaratanasadisā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:637_14: Tena vuttaṃ “anvadeva rājā cakkavattī saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāyā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:638_0: Tampi cakkaratanaṃ rukkhaggānaṃ uparūpari nātiuccena gaganapadesena pavattati,
atk-s0203a0:638_1: yathā rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalapallavehi atthikā tāni sukhena gahetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0203a0:638_7: Cittakammādisippapasutā cettha attano attano kiccaṃ karontāyeva gacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:638_10: Evaṃ cakkavattiparisaṃ gahetvā taṃ cakkaratanaṃ vāmapassena sineruṃ pahāya samuddassa uparibhāgena aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ pubbavidehaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:639_0: Tattha yo vinibbedhena dvādasayojanāya parikkhepato chattiṃsayojanaparisāya sannivesakkhamo sulabhāhārūpakaraṇo
atk-s0203a0:639_2: tassa uparibhāge taṃ cakkaratanaṃ ākāse akkhāhataṃ viya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:639_3: Atha tena saññāṇena so mahājano otaritvā yathāruci nhānabhojanādīni sabbakiccāni karonto vāsaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0203a0:639_7: tattha rājā cakkavattī vāsaṃ upeti saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāyā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:640_0: Evaṃ vāsaṃ upagate cakkavattimhi ye tattha rājāno,
atk-s0203a0:640_1: te “paracakkaṃ āgata”nti sutvāpi na balakāyaṃ sannipātetvā yuddhasajjā honti.
atk-s0203a0:640_2: Cakkaratanassa uppattisamanantarameva natthi so satto nāma,
atk-s0203a0:640_3: yo paccatthikasaññāya rājānaṃ ārabbha āvudhaṃ ukkhipituṃ visaheyya.
atk-s0203a0:645_0: Tasmā sabbepi te rājāno attano attano rajjasirivibhavānurūpaṃ pābhataṃ gahetvā taṃ rājānaṃ upagamma onatasirā
atk-s0203a0:645_1: attano moḷiyamaṇippabhābhisekenassa pādapūjaṃ karonto “ehi kho mahārājā”tiādīhi vacanehi tassa kiṅkārappaṭissāvitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:646_6: tasmā tava āgamanaṃ suāgamananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:646_7: Evaṃ vutte pana cakkavattī nāpi “ettakaṃ nāma me anuvassaṃ baliṃ upakappethā”ti vadati,
atk-s0203a0:646_8: nāpi aññassa bhogaṃ acchinditvā aññassa deti.
atk-s0203a0:646_9: Attano pana dhammarājabhāvassa anurūpāya paññāya pāṇātipātādīni upaparikkhitvā pemanīyena mañjunā sarena “passatha tātā,
atk-s0203a0:646_10: pāṇātipāto nāmesa āsevito bhāvito bahulīkato nirayasaṃvattaniko hotī”tiādinā nayena dhammaṃ desetvā “pāṇo na hantabbo”tiādikaṃ ovādaṃ deti.
atk-s0203a0:646_11: Tena vuttaṃ rājā cakkavattī evamāha pāṇo na hantabbo…pe…
atk-s0203a0:647_0: Kiṃ pana sabbepi rañño imaṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhantīti.
atk-s0203a0:648_0: Atha taṃ cakkaratanaṃ evaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ ovāde dinne katapātarāse cakkavattībalena vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhati.
atk-s0203a0:648_2: tathā tathā agadagandhaṃ ghāyitvā saṃkhittaphaṇo nāgarājā viya saṃkhittaūmivipphāraṃ hutvā ogacchamānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:648_3: mahāsamuddasalilaṃ yojanamattaṃ ogantvā antosamudde veḷuriyabhitti viya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:648_4: Taṅkhaṇaññeva ca tassa rañño puññasiriṃ daṭṭhukāmāni viya mahāsamuddatale vippakiṇṇāni nānāratanāni tato tato āgantvā taṃ padesaṃ pūrayanti.
atk-s0203a0:648_5: Atha sā rājaparisā taṃ nānāratanaparipūraṃ mahāsamuddatalaṃ disvā yathāruci ucchaṅgādīhi ādiyati,
atk-s0203a0:648_6: yathāruci ādinnaratanāya pana parisāya taṃ cakkaratanaṃ paṭinivattati.
atk-s0203a0:648_7: Paṭinivattamāne ca tasmiṃ parisā aggato hoti,
atk-s0203a0:649_1: Evaṃ rājā cakkavattī puratthimasamuddapariyantaṃ pubbavidehaṃ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddapariyantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:649_2: jambudīpaṃ vijetukāmo cakkaratanadesitena maggena dakkhiṇasamuddābhimukho gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:649_5: cakkaratanaṃ puratthimasamuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā paccuttaritvā dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ pavattatīti.
atk-s0203a0:649_6: Evaṃ pavattamānassa pana tassa pavattanavidhānaṃ senāsanniveso paṭirājagamanaṃ tesaṃ anusāsanippadānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:649_7: dakkhiṇasamuddaṃ ajjhogāhanaṃ samuddasalilassa ogacchanaṃ ratanādānanti sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:650_0: Vijinitvā pana taṃ dasasahassayojanappamāṇaṃ jambudīpaṃ dakkhiṇasamuddatopi paccuttaritvā sattayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:650_1: aparagoyānaṃ vijetuṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva gantvā tampi samuddapariyantaṃ tatheva abhivijinitvā pacchimasamuddatopi
atk-s0203a0:650_2: paccuttaritvā aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ uttarakuruṃ vijetuṃ tatheva gantvā tampi samuddapariyantaṃ tatheva
atk-s0203a0:651_0: Ettāvatā raññā cakkavattinā cāturantāya pathaviyā ādhipaccaṃ adhigataṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:651_1: So evaṃ vijitavijayo attano rajjasirisampattidassanatthaṃ sapariso uddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghitvā suvikasitapadumuppalapuṇḍarīkavanavicitte
atk-s0203a0:651_2: cattāro jātassare viya pañcasatapañcasataparittadīpaparivāre cattāro mahādīpe oloketvā cakkaratanadesiteneva
atk-s0203a0:651_4: Atha taṃ cakkaratanaṃ antepuradvāraṃ sobhayamānaṃ viya hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:652_0: Evaṃ patiṭṭhite pana tasmiṃ cakkaratane rājantepure ukkāhi vā dīpikāhi vā kiñci karaṇīyaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:652_2: Ye ca pana rattiṃ andhakāratthikā honti,
atk-s0203a0:654_1: Evaṃ pātubhūtacakkaratanassa panassa cakkavattino amaccā pakatimaṅgalahatthiṭṭhānaṃ sucibhūmibhāgaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0203a0:654_2: haricandanādīhi surabhigandhehi upalimpāpetvā heṭṭhā vicittavaṇṇasurabhikusumasamākiṇṇaṃ upari suvaṇṇatārakānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:654_4: kusumadāmappaṭimaṇḍitavitānaṃ devavimānaṃ viya abhisaṅkharitvā “evarūpassa nāma deva hatthiratanassa āgamanaṃ cintethā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:654_5: So pubbe vuttanayeneva mahādānaṃ datvā sīlāni samādāya taṃ puññasampattiṃ āvajjanto nisīdati,
atk-s0203a0:654_6: athassa puññānubhāvacodito chaddantakulā vā uposathakulā vā taṃ sakkāravisesaṃ anubhavitukāmo taruṇaravimaṇḍalābhirattacaraṇa-
atk-s0203a0:654_8: padumacārupokkharo iddhimā yogī viya vehāsaṃ gamanasamattho manosilācuṇṇarañjitapariyanto viya rajatapabbato hatthiseṭṭho tasmiṃ padese patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:654_12: Svāyaṃ pūritacakkavattivattānaṃ cakkavattīnaṃ sutte vuttanayeneva cintayantānaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0203a0:654_14: Sayameva pakatimaṅgalahatthiṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā maṅgalahatthiṃ apanetvā tattha tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:655_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtaṃ pana taṃ hatthiratanaṃ disvā hatthigopakādayo haṭṭhatuṭṭhā vegena gantvā rañño ārocenti.
atk-s0203a0:655_1: Rājā turitaturitaṃ āgantvā taṃ disvā pasannacitto “bhaddakaṃ vata bho hatthiyānaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:655_2: sace damathaṃ upeyyā”ti cintayanto hatthaṃ pasāreti.
atk-s0203a0:655_3: Atha so gharadhenuvacchako viya kaṇṇe olambetvā sūratabhāvaṃ dassento rājānaṃ upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0203a0:655_5: Athassa parijanā adhippāyaṃ ñatvā taṃ hatthiratanaṃ sovaṇṇaddhajaṃ sovaṇṇālaṅkāraṃ hemajālapaṭicchannaṃ katvā upanenti.
atk-s0203a0:655_6: Rājā taṃ anisīdāpetvāva sattaratanamayāya nisseṇiyā abhiruyha ākāsaṃ gamananinnacitto hoti.
atk-s0203a0:655_7: Tassa saha cittuppādeneva so hatthirājā rājahaṃso viya indanīlamaṇippabhājālanīlagaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghati,
atk-s0203a0:655_9: Iti sapariso rājā antopātarāseyeva sakalapathaviṃ anusaṃyāyitvā rājadhāniṃ paccāgacchati,
atk-s0203a0:657_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtahatthiratanassa pana cakkavattino parisā pakatimaṅgalaassaṭṭhānaṃ sucisamatalaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0203a0:657_1: alaṅkaritvā ca purimanayeneva rañño tassa āgamanacintanatthaṃ ussāhaṃ janenti.
atk-s0203a0:657_2: So purimanayeneva katadānasakkāro samādinnasīlova pāsādatale nisinno puññasampattiṃ samanussarati,
atk-s0203a0:657_4: rattatuṇḍo candappabhāpuñjasadisasuddhasiniddhaghanasaṅghātasarīro kākagīvā viya indanīlamaṇi viya ca
atk-s0203a0:657_5: kāḷavaṇṇena sīsena samannāgatattā kāḷasīso suṭṭhu kappetvā ṭhapitehi viya muñjasadisehi saṇhavaṭṭaujugatigatehi
atk-s0203a0:657_6: kesehi samannāgatattā muñjakeso vehāsaṅgamo valāhako nāma assarājā āgantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:657_8: Evarūpaṃ assaratanaṃ sandhāya bhagavā puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:659_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtaassaratanassa pana rañño cakkavattissa catuhatthāyāmaṃ sakaṭanābhisamappamāṇaṃ ubhosu antesu
atk-s0203a0:659_1: kaṇṇikapariyantato viniggatasuparisuddhamuttākalāpehi dvīhi kañcanapadumehi alaṅkataṃ caturāsītimaṇisahassaparivāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:659_2: tārāgaṇaparivutassa puṇṇacandassa siriṃ paṭippharamānaṃ viya vepullapabbatato maṇiratanaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0203a0:659_3: Tassevaṃ āgatassa muttājālake ṭhapetvā veḷuparamparāya saṭṭhihatthappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ āropitassa rattibhāge samantā yojanappamāṇaṃ okāsaṃ ābhā pharati,
atk-s0203a0:659_4: yāya sabbo so okāso aruṇuggamanavelā viya sañjātāloko hoti.
atk-s0203a0:659_7: te te ca sippino taṃ taṃ kammantaṃ payojenti divāti maññamānā.
atk-s0203a0:661_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtamaṇiratanassa pana cakkavattissa visayasukhavisesakāraṇaṃ itthiratanaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0203a0:661_5: rañño cakkavattissa itthiratanaṃ pātubhavati abhirūpā dassanīyā”tiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatā.
atk-s0203a0:662_0: Tattha saṇṭhānapāripūriyā adhikaṃ rūpaṃ assāti abhirūpā.
atk-s0203a0:662_2: tasmā aññaṃ kiccavikkhepaṃ hitvāpi daṭṭhabbāti dassanīyā.
atk-s0203a0:662_3: Dissamānā ca somanassavasena cittaṃ pasādetīti pāsādikā.
atk-s0203a0:662_7: Abhirūpā vā yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā dassanīyā yasmā nātikisā nātithūlā,
atk-s0203a0:662_9: Paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā yasmā atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇaṃ appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:662_12: tassā pana dvādasahatthappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ sarīrābhā obhāseti.
atk-s0203a0:663_4: atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇanti iminā kāyasampatti vuttā.
atk-s0203a0:664_0: Tūlapicuno vā kappāsapicuno vāti sappimaṇḍe pakkhipitvā ṭhapitassa satavihatassa tūlapicuno vā satavihatassa kappāsapicuno vā kāyasamphasso hoti.
atk-s0203a0:664_3: Candanagandhoti niccakālameva supisitassa abhinavassa catujjātisamāyojitassa haricandanassa gandho kāyato vāyati.
atk-s0203a0:664_4: Uppalagandhoti hasitakathitakālesu mukhato nikkhanto taṅkhaṇaṃ vikasitasseva nīluppalassa atisurabhigandho vāyati.
atk-s0203a0:665_0: Evaṃ rūpasamphassagandhasampattiyuttāya panassā sarīrasampattiyā anurūpaṃ ācāraṃ dassetuṃ taṃ kho panātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:665_1: Tattha rājānaṃ disvā nisinnāsanato aggidaḍḍhā viya paṭhamameva uṭṭhātīti pubbuṭṭhāyinī.
atk-s0203a0:665_2: Tasmiṃ nisinne tassa rañño tālavaṇṭena bījanādikiccaṃ katvā pacchā nipatati nisīdatīti pacchānipātinī.
atk-s0203a0:665_3: Kiṃ karomi devāti tassa kiṃkāraṃ paṭissāvetīti kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī.
atk-s0203a0:666_1: na sāṭheyyenāti dassetuṃ taṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:666_2: Tattha no aticaratīti na atikkamitvā carati,
atk-s0203a0:666_3: aññaṃ purisaṃ cittenapi na patthetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:666_4: Tattha ye tassā ādimhi “abhirūpā”tiādayo ante “pubbuṭṭhāyinī”tiādayo guṇā vuttā,
atk-s0203a0:666_5: te pakatiguṇā eva “atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇa”ntiādayo pana cakkavattino puññaṃ upanissāya cakkaratanapātubhāvato
atk-s0203a0:666_7: Abhirūpatādikāpi vā cakkaratanapātubhāvato paṭṭhāya sabbākārapāripūrā jātā.
atk-s0203a0:668_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtaitthiratanassa pana rañño cakkavattissa dhanakaraṇīyānaṃ kiccānaṃ yathāsukhappavattanatthaṃ gahapatiratanaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0203a0:668_1: So pakatiyāva mahābhogo mahābhogakule jāto rañño dhanarāsivaḍḍhako seṭṭhi gahapati hoti,
atk-s0203a0:668_4: So taṃ sampattiṃ disvā tuṭṭhahadayo gantvā rājānaṃ dhanena pavāretvā sabbāni dhanakaraṇīyāni sampādeti.
atk-s0203a0:670_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtagahapatiratanassa pana rañño cakkavattissa sabbakiccasaṃvidhānasamatthaṃ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0203a0:670_3: rañño puññānubhāvaṃ nissāya panassa attano kammānubhāvena paracittañāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:670_4: Yena dvādasayojanāya rājaparisāya cittācāraṃ ñatvā rañño ahite hite ca vavatthapetuṃ samattho hoti.
atk-s0203a0:670_5: Sopi taṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ disvā tuṭṭhahadayo rājānaṃ sabbakiccānusāsanena pavāreti.
atk-s0203a0:670_8: Tattha ṭhapetabbaṃ ṭhapetunti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapetabbaṃ ṭhapetuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:672_2: Mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhanti ekappahāreneva dve vā tīṇi vā satasahassāni.
atk-s0203a0:672_3: Kevalā paripūrā paṇḍitabhūmīti paṇḍito tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā sagge nibbattati,
atk-s0203a0:672_5: tattha ṭhito tīṇi ca sucaritāni pūretvā puna sagge nibbattatīti ayaṃ sakalā paripuṇṇā paṇḍitabhūmi.
atk-s0203a0:676_0: 261. Evaṃ me sutanti devadūtasuttaṃ. Tattha dve agārātiādi assapurasutte vitthāritameva.
atk-s0203a0:677_1: Nirayaṃ upapannāti bhagavā katthaci nirayato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ devalokena osāpeti,
atk-s0203a0:677_8: devalokamanussalokesu sampattiṃ tiracchānayonipettivisayesu ca dukkhaṃ ekadesato katheti,
atk-s0203a0:677_11: tasmā devalokato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ nirayena osāpeti.
atk-s0203a0:677_12: Devalokamanussalokasampattiyo tiracchānayonipettivisayadukkhāni ca ekadesato kathetvā nirayadukkhameva vitthārena kathetuṃ tamenaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:678_1: yantarūpaṃ viya kammameva kāraṇaṃ kāretī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:678_3: atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva.
atk-s0203a0:678_11: catūsu pana dvāresu cattāro janā honti.
atk-s0203a0:678_12: Nāddasanti attano santike pesitassa kassaci devadūtassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0203a0:678_13: Atha naṃ yamo “nāyaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ sallakkhetī”ti ñatvā sallakkhāpetukāmo ambhotiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:680_1: Paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvāti ettha daharakumāro atthato evaṃ vadati nāma “passatha, bho,
atk-s0203a0:680_4: attano dhammatāya uṭṭhahitvā nhāyituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0203a0:680_12: iti tassā pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:681_0: Dutiyaṃ devadūtanti etthāpi jarājiṇṇasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0203a0:681_2: ahampi tumhe viya taruṇo ahosiṃ ūrubalabāhubalajavanasampanno,
atk-s0203a0:681_4: vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0203a0:681_10: iti tassā pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:682_0: Tatiyaṃ devadūtanti etthāpi gilānasatto atthato eva vadati nāma –
atk-s0203a0:682_3: somhi etarahi byādhinā abhihato sake muttakarīse palipanno,
atk-s0203a0:682_5: vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0203a0:682_11: iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:683_1: Catutthaṃ devadūtanti ettha pana kammakāraṇā vā devadūtāti kātabbā kammakāraṇikā vā.
atk-s0203a0:683_2: Tattha pana kammakāraṇapakkhe bāttiṃsa tāva kammakāraṇā atthato evaṃ vadanti nāma –
atk-s0203a0:683_3: “mayaṃ nibbattamānā na rukkhe vā pāsāṇe vā nibbattāma,
atk-s0203a0:683_5: iti amhākaṃ pure nibbattitova kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:683_8: “mayaṃ dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇā karontā na rukkhādīsu karoma,
atk-s0203a0:683_10: iti amhākaṃ tumhesu pure kammakāraṇākaraṇatova kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:684_1: Pañcamaṃ devadūtanti ettha matakasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0203a0:684_2: “passatha bho maṃ āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ uddhumātakādibhāvaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:684_8: iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:685_6: Yathā hi sabhaṇḍaṃ coraṃ gahetvā kattabbameva karonti,
atk-s0203a0:686_0: Tattha dīghajayantadamiḷo nāma attano dhammatāya sari.
atk-s0203a0:686_1: So kira damiḷo sumanagirivihāre ākāsacetiyaṃ rattapaṭena pūjesi.
atk-s0203a0:686_2: Atha niraye ussadasāmante nibbatto aggijālasaddaṃ sutvāva attano pūjitapaṭaṃ anussari,
atk-s0203a0:686_4: Aparopi puttassa daharabhikkhuno khalisāṭakaṃ dento pādamūle ṭhapesi,
atk-s0203a0:686_6: sopi ussadasāmante nibbatto jālasaddena taṃ sāṭakaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatto.
atk-s0203a0:686_7: Evaṃ tāva attano dhammatāya kusalaṃ kammaṃ saritvā sagge nibbattatīti.
atk-s0203a0:687_0: Attano dhammatāya asarante pana pañca devadūte pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:687_5: Eko kira amacco sumanapupphakumbhena mahācetiyaṃ pūjetvā yamassa pattiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0203a0:687_6: taṃ akusalakammena niraye nibbattaṃ yamassa santikaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:687_7: Tasmiṃ pañcahipi devadūtehi kusale asarante yamo sayaṃ olokento disvā –
atk-s0203a0:687_8: “nanu tvaṃ mahācetiyaṃ sumanapupphakumbhena pūjetvā mayhaṃ pattiṃ adāsī”ti sāresi,
atk-s0203a0:687_9: so tasmiṃ kāle saritvā devalokaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:687_11: “mahādukkhaṃ nāma anubhavissati ayaṃ satto”ti tuṇhī hoti.
atk-s0203a0:688_3: Abbhantaraṃ āyāmena ca vitthārena ca yojanasataṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:688_4: Lohapathavī lohachadanaṃ ekekā ca bhitti navanavayojanikā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:688_5: Puratthimāya bhittiyā acci uṭṭhitā pacchimaṃ bhittiṃ gahetvā taṃ vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:688_7: Iti jālapariyantavasena āyāmavitthārato aṭṭhārasayojanādhikāni tīṇi yojanasatāni,
atk-s0203a0:688_9: samantā pana ussadehi saddhiṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:689_1: Ubbhataṃ tādisameva hotīti ettha akkantapadaṃ yāva aṭṭhito daḷhaṃ uddharitumeva na sakkā.
atk-s0203a0:690_0: Kasmā panesa narako avīcīti saṅkhaṃ gatoti.
atk-s0203a0:690_2: tattha ca aggijālānaṃ vā sattānaṃ vā dukkhassa vā antaraṃ natthi.
atk-s0203a0:690_4: Tassa hi puratthimabhittito jālā uṭṭhitā saṃsibbamānā yojanasataṃ gantvā pacchimabhittiṃ vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:691_0: Imesaṃ channaṃ jālānaṃ majjhe nibbatto devadatto,
atk-s0203a0:691_2: dve pādā yāva gopphakā lohapathaviṃ paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0203a0:691_3: dve hatthā yāva maṇibandhā lohabhittiyo paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0203a0:691_5: adhobhāgena ekaṃ lohasūlaṃ pavisitvā kāyaṃ vinivijjhantaṃ chadane paviṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:691_6: pācīnabhittito nikkhantasūlaṃ hadayaṃ vinivijjhitvā pacchimabhittiṃ paviṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:691_7: uttarabhittito nikkhantasūlaṃ phāsukā vinivijjhitvā dakkhiṇabhittiṃ paviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:691_8: Niccale tathāgatamhi aparaddhattā niccalova hutvā paccatīti kammasarikkhatāya ediso jāto.
atk-s0203a0:692_0: Abbhantare panassa yojanasatike ṭhāne nāḷiyaṃ koṭṭetvā pūritapiṭṭhaṃ viya sattā nirantarā,
atk-s0203a0:692_3: gacchantānaṃ ṭhitānaṃ nisinnānaṃ nipannānaṃ anto natthi,
atk-s0203a0:692_4: gacchante vā ṭhite vā nisinne vā nipanne vā aññamaññaṃ na bādhanti.
atk-s0203a0:693_0: Kāyadvāre pana cha upekkhāsahagatāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0203a0:693_2: Evaṃ santepi yathā jivhagge cha madhubindūni ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ tambalohabindumhi ṭhapite anudahanabalavatāya tadeva paññāyati,
atk-s0203a0:694_2: So tattha patatīti eko pādo mahāniraye hoti,
atk-s0203a0:695_1: yattha patitapatitā kudrūsakarāsimhi khittaphālavāsisilādīni viya heṭṭhimatalameva gaṇhanti.
atk-s0203a0:696_1: Tesaṃ ārohanakāle te kaṇṭakā adhomukhā honti,
atk-s0203a0:697_1: Hatthampi chindantīti phalake maṃsaṃ viya koṭṭayamānāni chindanti.
atk-s0203a0:698_3: heṭṭhā khuradhārā ubhosu tīresu vettalatā ca kusatiṇāni ca.
atk-s0203a0:698_4: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kharāti so tattha uddhañca adho ca vuyhamāno pokkharapattesu chijjati.
atk-s0203a0:699_1: Tattena ayosaṅkunāti tena jigacchitomhīti vutte mahantaṃ lohapacchiṃ lohaguḷānaṃ pūretvā taṃ upagacchanti,
atk-s0203a0:699_3: athassa te tattena ayosaṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaranti,
atk-s0203a0:699_4: tambalohadhārehi mahantena lohakaṭāhena tambalohaṃ upanetvā evamevaṃ karonti.
atk-s0203a0:699_5: Puna mahānirayeti evaṃ pañcavidhabandhanato paṭṭhāya yāva tambalohapānā tambalohapānato paṭṭhāya puna
atk-s0203a0:699_11: kamme pana aparikkhīṇe puna mahāniraye pakkhipanti.
atk-s0203a0:700_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ gaṇhanto eko daharabhikkhu, – “bhante,
atk-s0203a0:700_1: ettakaṃ dukkhamanubhavitasattaṃ punapi mahāniraye pakkhipantī”ti āha. Āma, āvuso,
atk-s0203a0:700_2: kamme aparikkhīṇe punappunaṃ evaṃ karontīti. Tiṭṭhatu, bhante, uddeso,
atk-s0203a0:700_3: kammaṭṭhānameva kathethāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā sotāpanno hutvā āgamma uddesaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0203a0:700_4: Aññesampi imasmiṃ padese uddesaṃ ṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi.
atk-s0203a0:701_3: Jātimaraṇasambhaveti jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca kāraṇabhūte.
atk-s0203a0:702_0: Diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutāti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sabbakilesanibbānena nibbutā.
atk-s0203a0:709_0: Tattha tatthāti paccuppannampi dhammaṃ yattha yattheva uppanno,
atk-s0203a0:709_1: tattha tattheva ca naṃ aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi anupassanāhi yo vipassati araññādīsu vā tattha tattheva vipassati.
atk-s0203a0:709_3: Vipassanā hi rāgādīhi na saṃhīrati na saṃkuppatīti asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:709_6: Atha vā nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi na saṃhīrati na saṃkuppatīti asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:709_8: punappunaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ taṃ taṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appento vaḍḍheyyāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:710_1: ajjeva kiccamātappanti kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanena ātappanti laddhanāmaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:710_2: Ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suveti sve jīvitaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā ko jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:710_5: aññataraṃ vā pana kusalaṃ karissāmīti hi “ajja tāva papañco atthi,
atk-s0203a0:710_6: sve vā punadivase vā karissāmī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā ajjeva karissāmīti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:710_7: Mahāsenenāti aggivisasatthādīni anekāni maraṇakāraṇāni tassa senā,
atk-s0203a0:710_8: tāya mahatiyā senāya vasena mahāsenena evarūpena maccunā saddhiṃ “katipāhaṃ tāva āgamehi yāvāhaṃ buddhapūjādiṃ attano avassayakammaṃ karomī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:710_10: “idaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā gahetvā katipāhaṃ āgamehī”ti evaṃ lañjānuppadānasaṅkhāto vā,
atk-s0203a0:710_11: “imināhaṃ balarāsinā paṭibāhissāmī”ti evaṃ balarāsisaṅkhāto vā saṅgaro natthi.
atk-s0203a0:711_1: Evaṃ paṭipannattā bhaddo ekaratto assāti bhaddekaratto.
atk-s0203a0:712_1: Evaṃrūpotiādīsu kāḷopi samāno indanīlamaṇivaṇṇo ahosinti evaṃ manuññarūpavaseneva evaṃrūpo ahosiṃ.
atk-s0203a0:712_3: Taṃsampayuttānaṃyeva saññādīnaṃ vasena evaṃsañño evaṃsaṅkhāro evaṃviññāṇo ahosiṃ atītamaddhānanti.
atk-s0203a0:713_0: Tattha nandiṃ samanvānetīti tesu rūpādīsu taṇhaṃ samanvāneti anupavatteti.
atk-s0203a0:714_0: Nandiṃ na samanvānetīti taṇhaṃ vā taṇhāsampayuttadiṭṭhiṃ vā nānupavattayati.
atk-s0203a0:715_1: Evaṃrūpo siyantiādīsupi taṃmanuññarūpādivaseneva taṇhādiṭṭhipavattasaṅkhātā nandisamanvānayanāva veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:716_2: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratīti idaṃ “paccuppannañca yo dhammaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:716_7: paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ na vipassatī”tiādi vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0203a0:716_8: yasmā pana asaṃhīrāti ca asaṃkuppāti ca vipassanā vuttā,
atk-s0203a0:716_9: tasmā tassā eva abhāvañca bhāvañca dassetuṃ saṃhīratīti mātikaṃ uddharitvā vitthāro vutto.
atk-s0203a0:716_10: Tattha saṃhīratīti vipassanāya abhāvato taṇhādiṭṭhīhi ākaḍḍhiyati.
atk-s0203a0:716_11: Na saṃhīratīti vipassanāya bhāvena taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nākaḍḍhiyati.
atk-s0203a0:721_2: Sādhu kho tvanti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi parisuddhehi kathitattā desanaṃ pasaṃsanto āha.
atk-s0203a0:725_2: Tattha tapodārāmeti tattodakassa rahadassa vasena evaṃladdhanāme ārāme.
atk-s0203a0:725_3: Vebhārapabbatassa kira heṭṭhā bhūmaṭṭhakanāgānaṃ pañcayojanasatikaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ devalokasadisaṃ maṇimayena talena ārāmauyyānehi ca samannāgataṃ,
atk-s0203a0:725_5: tato tapodā nāma nadī sandati kuthitā uṇhodakā.
atk-s0203a0:725_8: tattha dvinnaṃ mahālohakumbhinirayānaṃ antarena ayaṃ tapodā āgacchati,
atk-s0203a0:725_13: so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setodako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo,
atk-s0203a0:725_18: Imassa pana ārāmassa abhisammukhaṭṭhāne tato mahāudakarahado jāto,
atk-s0203a0:726_1: Samiddhīti tassa kira therassa attabhāvo samiddho abhirūpo pāsādiko,
atk-s0203a0:726_4: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanāti madhupiṇḍikasutte vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:727_1: Iti me cakkhunti imasmiṃ kira sutte bhagavā dvādasāyatanavaseneva mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:727_3: upari catutthe cāti imesu tīsu suttesu pañcakkhandhavasena mātikā ca vibhaṅgo ca kato,
atk-s0203a0:727_4: idha pana dvādasāyatanavaseneva vibhajanatthaṃ mātikā ṭhapitā”ti nayaṃ paṭilabhitvā evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:727_5: Imaṃ pana nayaṃ labhantena therena bhāriyaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0203a0:727_8: tena naṃ bhagavā imameva suttaṃ sandhāya –
atk-s0203a0:727_11: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:727_16: Tadabhinandatīti taṃ cakkhuñceva rūpañca taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinandati.
atk-s0203a0:728_0: Iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti ettha pana manoti bhavaṅgacittaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:733_3: kāyassa pana īsakalomasākāratāya lomasakaṅgiyoti pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0203a0:733_4: Candano devaputtoti kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kiresa candano nāma upāsako aḍḍho mahaddhano tīṇi ratanāni catūhi paccayehi pūjetvā devaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0203a0:733_7: Tassā kira rattakambalasseva jayasumanapuppharāsi viya vaṇṇo,
atk-s0203a0:734_1: Bodhipattito sattame saṃvacchare sāvatthiyaṃ āsāḷhīmāsapuṇṇamāya dvādasayojanāya parisāya majjhe yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:734_2: katvā oruyha kaṇḍambamūle paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīditvā dhammadesanāya mahājanaṃ mahāviduggato uddharitvā
atk-s0203a0:734_3: buddhā nāma yasmā pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā manussapathe na vasanti,
atk-s0203a0:734_4: tasmā passamānasseva tassa janassa padavīkkamaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagato,
atk-s0203a0:735_0: Tatra bhagavāti tatra viharanto bhagavā yebhuyyena dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi sannipatitāhi devatāhi parivuto
atk-s0203a0:735_1: mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ kathento gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ rūpārūpaparicchedakathaṃ
atk-s0203a0:735_2: paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontānaṃ devānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ antarantarā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:735_3: Tatrāyaṃ devaputto uggaṇhanto imā gāthā saddhiṃ vibhaṅgena uggaṇhi,
atk-s0203a0:735_4: devattassa pana pamādādhiṭṭhānattā dibbehi ārammaṇehi nippīḷiyamāno anupubbena suttaṃ sammuṭṭho gāthāmattameva dhāresi.
atk-s0203a0:735_5: Tenāha “evaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhu dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:736_0: Uggaṇhāhi tvantiādīsu tuṇhībhūto nisīditvā suṇanto uggaṇhāti nāma,
atk-s0203a0:740_2: Tattha subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi pāsādiko,
atk-s0203a0:740_6: Todeyyaputtoti todeyyassa nāma pasenadirañño purohitabrāhmaṇassa putto.
atk-s0203a0:740_7: So kira sāvatthiyā avidūre tudigāmo nāma atthi,
atk-s0203a0:740_10: “dadato bhogānaṃ aparikkhayo nāma natthī”ti cintetvā kassaci kiñci na deti.
atk-s0203a0:743_1: Dhuravihāre vasato sammāsambuddhassa yāguuḷuṅgamattaṃ vā bhattakaṭacchumattaṃ vā adatvā dhanalobhena
atk-s0203a0:743_2: kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0203a0:743_6: Atha bhagavā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento taṃ sunakhaṃ disvā –
atk-s0203a0:743_7: “todeyyabrāhmaṇo dhanalobhena attanova ghare sunakho hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0203a0:743_8: ajja mayi subhassa gharaṃ gate maṃ disvā sunakho bhukkāraṃ karissati,
atk-s0203a0:743_10: so ‘jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo’ti gantvā uddhanaṭṭhāne nipajjissati.
atk-s0203a0:743_11: Tatonidānaṃ subhassa mayā saddhiṃ eko kathāsallāpo bhavissati,
atk-s0203a0:743_13: sunakho pana kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbattissatī”ti imaṃ māṇavassa saraṇesu patiṭṭhānabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:743_14: taṃ divasaṃ sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā ekakova gāmaṃ pavisitvā nikkhante māṇave taṃ gharaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0203a0:744_0: Sunakho bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkāraṃ karonto bhagavato samīpaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:744_2: “todeyya tvaṃ pubbepi maṃ bho bhoti paribhavitvā sunakho jāto,
atk-s0203a0:744_5: “jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti vippaṭisārī hutvā gīvaṃ onāmetvā uddhanantare chārikāyaṃ nipanno.
atk-s0203a0:744_9: Manussā na kenacīti vatvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:744_13: Samaṇo pana gotamo pitaraṃ sunakhaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:744_14: yaṃkiñci esa mukhāruḷhaṃ bhāsatī”ti kujjhitvā bhagavantaṃ musāvādena niggahetukāmo vihāraṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:745_0: Bhagavāpi tassa tatheva vatvā avisaṃvādanatthaṃ āha –
atk-s0203a0:745_1: “atthi pana te māṇava pitarā anakkhātaṃ dhana”nti. Atthi,
atk-s0203a0:745_3: satasahassagghanikā suvaṇṇamālā satasahassagghanikā suvaṇṇapādukā satasahassagghanikā suvaṇṇapāti satasahassañca kahāpaṇanti.
atk-s0203a0:745_4: Gaccha taṃ sunakhaṃ appodakapāyāsaṃ bhojāpetvā sayane āropetvā īsakaṃ niddaṃ okkantakāle puccha,
atk-s0203a0:745_6: Atha naṃ jāneyyāsi “pitā me eso”ti. Māṇavo –
atk-s0203a0:745_9: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ musāvādena niggaṇhissāmī”ti dvīhipi kāraṇehi tuṭṭho gantvā tathā akāsi. Sunakho –
atk-s0203a0:745_10: “ñātomhi iminā”ti roditvā huṃ hunti karonto dhananidhānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pādena pathaviṃ khaṇitvā saññaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0203a0:745_12: “bhavapaṭicchannaṃ nāma evaṃ sukhumaṃ paṭisandhiantaraṃ pākaṭaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa,
atk-s0203a0:745_13: addhā esa sabbaññū”ti bhagavati pasannacitto cuddasa pañhe abhisaṅkhari.
atk-s0203a0:745_16: “idaṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhe pucchissāmī”ti dutiyagamanena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0203a0:745_17: tena puṭṭhapañhe pana bhagavā ekappahāreneva vissajjento kammassakātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:746_0: Tattha kammaṃ etesaṃ sakaṃ attano bhaṇḍakanti kammassakā.
atk-s0203a0:746_7: Yadidaṃ hīnappaṇītatāyāti yaṃ idaṃ “tvaṃ hīno bhava,
atk-s0203a0:746_16: ghanadussapaṭṭenassa mukhaṃ bandhitvā madhuraṃ purato ṭhapitaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:746_21: tadeva kathetīti ayaṃ māno mā ahosī”ti mānabhañjanatthaṃ bhagavā “āditova duppaṭivijjhaṃ katvā kathessāmi,
atk-s0203a0:746_23: vitthārena me pākaṭaṃ katvā kathethā’ti maṃ yācissati,
atk-s0203a0:746_25: evañcassa sātthakaṃ bhavissatī”ti duppaṭivijjhaṃ katvā kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:747_0: Idāni so attano appaṭividdhabhāvaṃ pakāsento na kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:748_4: paṭipadā yadidaṃ pāṇātipātīti yaṃ idaṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:749_1: Cattāri hi kammāni upapīḷakaṃ upacchedakaṃ janakaṃ upatthambhakanti.
atk-s0203a0:749_2: Balavakammena hi nibbattaṃ pavatte upapīḷakaṃ āgantvā atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0203a0:749_7: ahaṃ upapīḷakakammaṃ nāma taṃ pīḷetvā nirojaṃ niyūsaṃ kasaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:750_0: Tattha dārakassa mātukucchiyaṃ nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya mātu assādo vā sukhaṃ vā na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:750_3: Dārakassa pana mātukucchimhi nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya gehe bhogā udakaṃ patvā loṇaṃ viya rājādīnaṃ vasena nassanti,
atk-s0203a0:750_16: dārako parihāraṃ alabhanto pīḷito nirojo niyūso kasaṭo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:751_0: Dīghāyukakammena pana nibbattassa upacchedakakammaṃ āgantvā āyuṃ chindati.
atk-s0203a0:751_1: Yathā hi puriso aṭṭhusabhagamanaṃ katvā saraṃ khipeyya tamañño dhanuto vimuttamattaṃ muggarena paharitvā tattheva pāteyya,
atk-s0203a0:751_2: evaṃ dīghāyukakammena nibbattassa upacchedakakammaṃ āyuṃ chindati.
atk-s0203a0:752_1: Appabhogakulādīsu nibbattassa bhogasampadādikaraṇena upatthambhakakammaṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:753_4: Pāṇātipātinā vā kataṃ kusalakammaṃ uḷāraṃ na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:754_0: Dīghāyukasaṃvattanikā esā māṇava paṭipadāti ettha parittakammenapi nibbattaṃ pavatte etaṃ pāṇātipātā viratikammaṃ āgantvā atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0203a0:754_5: ahaṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ nāma thambhaṃ te karissāmī”ti upatthambhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0203a0:755_0: Tattha dārakassa mātukucchiyaṃ nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya mātāpitūnaṃ sukhameva sātameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:755_4: Dārakassa pana mātukucchimhi nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya gehe bhogānaṃ pamāṇaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:755_5: nidhikumbhiyo puratopi pacchatopi gehaṃ pavaṭṭamānā pavisanti.
atk-s0203a0:755_11: tāvakālikaṃ vā dinnaṃ dhanaṃ acoditā sayameva āharitvā denti,
atk-s0203a0:756_0: Apāṇātipātinā vā kataṃ aññampi kusalaṃ uḷāraṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:757_0: Viheṭhanakammādīnipi hi pavatte āgantvā atthato tatheva vadamānāni viya upapīḷanena nibbhogataṃ āpādetvā
atk-s0203a0:758_3: Issaṃ bandhatīti yavakalāpaṃ bandhanto viya yathā na nassati evaṃ bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti.
atk-s0203a0:758_5: rattiṃ khitto viya saro na paññāyati,
atk-s0203a0:759_0: 294. Na dātā hotīti macchariyavasena na dātā hoti. Tena kammenāti tena macchariyakammena.
atk-s0203a0:760_1: Abhivādetabbanti abhivādanārahaṃ buddhaṃ vā paccekabuddhaṃ vā ariyasāvakaṃ vā.
atk-s0203a0:760_3: Imasmiṃ pana pañhavissajjane upapīḷakaupatthambhakakammāni na gahetabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:760_4: Na hi pavatte nīcakulinaṃ vā uccākulinaṃ vā sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:760_5: paṭisandhimeva pana niyāmetvā nīcakuliyaṃ kammaṃ nīcakule nibbatteti,
atk-s0203a0:761_1: Na paripucchitā hotīti ettha pana aparipucchanena niraye na nibbattati.
atk-s0203a0:761_9: yadidaṃ hīnappaṇītatāyāti satthā desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:766_6: “manokammaṃ mahāsāvajjataraṃ paññapemi pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā,
atk-s0203a0:766_7: no tathā kāyakammaṃ no tathā vacīkamma”nti bhagavatā vuttaṃ atthi,
atk-s0203a0:766_8: sā kathā titthiyānaṃ antare pākaṭā jātā,
atk-s0203a0:766_12: abhisaññānirodho hotī”ti poṭṭhapādasutte uppannaṃ abhisaññānirodhakathaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0203a0:766_13: Na kiñci vediyatīti ekavedanampi na vediyati.
atk-s0203a0:766_14: Atthi ca khoti thero nirodhasamāpattiṃ sandhāya anujānāti.
atk-s0203a0:766_18: Dukkhaṃ soti thero “akusalameva sandhāya paribbājako pucchatī”ti saññāya evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0203a0:767_0: Dassanampi kho ahanti bhagavā caturaṅgepi andhakāre samantā yojanaṭṭhāne tilamattampi saṅkhāraṃ maṃsacakkhunāva passati,
atk-s0203a0:767_1: ayañca paribbājako na dūre gāvutamattabbhantare vasati,
atk-s0203a0:768_3: Iti imaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kilesadukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṃ sandhāya “sace bhāsitaṃ bhaveyya bhagavā”ti pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:769_4: Idañca pana bhagavā jānanto neva dibbacakkhunā na cetopariyañāṇena na sabbaññutañāṇena jāni,
atk-s0203a0:769_6: Kathentassa hi adhippāyo nāma suvijāno hoti,
atk-s0203a0:769_11: Bhagavā tassa taṃ ākāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ udāyī sannisīdituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:769_16: Pucchantena “tisso vedanā pucchāmī”ti evaṃ vavatthapetvāva tisso vedanā pucchitā.
atk-s0203a0:770_0: Ettha ca kāmāvacarakusalato somanassasahagatacittasampayuttā catasso cetanā,
atk-s0203a0:770_1: heṭṭhā tikajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu sukhavedanāya jananato sukhavedaniyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:771_0: Akusalacetanā paṭisandhipavattesu dukkhasseva jananato dukkhavedaniyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:771_1: Kāyadvāre pavatteyeva cetaṃ ekantena dukkhaṃ janeti,
atk-s0203a0:771_3: sā pana vedanā aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattesuyeva ārammaṇesu uppajjanato dukkhātveva saṅkhaṃ gatā.
atk-s0203a0:772_1: rūpāvacarakusalato catutthajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu tatiyavedanāya jananato adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:772_2: Ettha ca kāmāvacaraṃ paṭisandhiyaṃyeva ekantena adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti,
atk-s0203a0:772_7: Etassa pana vasena sabbaṃ pavattivaseneva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:773_0: Etassa bhagavāti thero tathāgatena mahākammavibhaṅgakathanatthaṃ ālayo dassito,
atk-s0203a0:773_1: tathāgataṃ yācitvā mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti cintetvā anusandhikusalatāya evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:774_4: “dibbacakkhukā samaṇabrāhmaṇā idaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā imaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā idaṃ dassanaṃ gaṇhantī”ti pakāsanatthaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:774_7: Passatīti “so satto kuhiṃ nibbatto”ti olokento passati.
atk-s0203a0:774_8: Ye aññathāti ye “dasannaṃ kusalānaṃ kammapathānaṃ pūritattā nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti jānanti,
atk-s0203a0:775_3: Ettha pana etesaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ vacane ettakā anuññātā,
atk-s0203a0:775_8: Iti imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vāde dvīsu ṭhānesu anuññātā,
atk-s0203a0:775_9: tīsu ananuññātāti evaṃ sabbattha anuññā nānuññā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:776_1: Evaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ vacane anuññā ca ananuññā ca dassetvā idāni mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ vibhajanto tatrānanda,
atk-s0203a0:777_0: Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hotīti yaṃ iminā dibbacakkhukena kammaṃ karonto diṭṭho,
atk-s0203a0:777_7: issarādīhi vā loko visaṭṭho”tiādinā micchādassanenapi nibbattateva.
atk-s0203a0:777_8: Diṭṭheva dhammeti yaṃ tattha diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:778_0: Iti ayaṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ekaṃ kammarāsiṃ ekañca vipākarāsiṃ addasa,
atk-s0203a0:778_3: Iminā pana diṭṭhe adiṭṭhe ca cattāro kammarāsī tayo ca vipākarāsī addasa.
atk-s0203a0:778_4: Imāni satta ṭhānāni jānanañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:778_8: Imānipi pañca paccattaṭṭhānāni jānanañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:779_1: Abhabbābhāsanti abhabbaṃ ābhāsati abhibhavati paṭibāhatīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:779_2: Bahukasmiñhi akusalakamme āyūhite balavakammaṃ dubbalakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti idaṃ abhabbañceva abhabbābhāsañca.
atk-s0203a0:779_3: Kusalaṃ pana āyūhitvā āsanne akusalaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:779_4: taṃ kusalassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:779_6: Bahumhi kusale āyūhitepi balavakammaṃ dubbalakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:779_8: Akusalaṃ pana āyūhitvā āsanne kusalaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:779_9: taṃ akusalassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:780_3: Tattha “yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātī”tiādinā nayena cattāro puggalā vuttā,
atk-s0203a0:780_6: tassa ca niraye nibbattattā tattha nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ akusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:780_9: Tassa pana sagge nibbattattā aññatitthiyānaṃ sagge nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:785_4: Imāni pana dasa ṭhapetvā sesaṃ idha manoviññāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:787_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā.
atk-s0203a0:787_4: vitakko taṃsampayutto cāti iminā nayena aṭṭhārasa vitakkavicārasaṅkhātā manopavicārā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:787_5: Cha somanassūpavicārāti ettha pana somanassena saddhiṃ upavicarantīti somanassūpavicārā.
atk-s0203a0:788_12: evaṃ pubbepi anubhavi”nti anussarantassa balavasomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:789_5: Idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ somanassanti idaṃ rañño viya attano sirisampattiṃ olokentassa vipassanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:789_6: paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa saṅkhārānaṃ bhedaṃ passato saṅkhāragatamhi tikkhe sūre vipassanāñāṇe vahante uppannasomanassaṃ
atk-s0203a0:791_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0203a0:794_0: Imānīti imāni chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa uppannāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni.
atk-s0203a0:795_1: Atītanti paccuppannaṃ tāva patthetvā alabhantassa domanassaṃ uppajjatu,
atk-s0203a0:795_3: Atītepi “yathāhaṃ etarahi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ patthetvā na labhāmi,
atk-s0203a0:795_4: evaṃ pubbepi patthetvā na labhi”nti anussarantassa balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:796_6: Imāni cha nekkhammasitāni domanassānīti imāni evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate arahatte pihaṃ
atk-s0203a0:796_7: paṭṭhapetvā tadadhigamāya aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ asakkontassa –
atk-s0203a0:796_8: “imampi pakkhaṃ imampi māsaṃ imampi saṃvaccharaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato gāmantapabbhāravāsimahāsīvattherassa
atk-s0203a0:796_9: viya assudhārāpavattanavasena uppannadomanassāni cha nekkhammasitadomanassānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:796_10: Vatthu pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sakkapañhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthāritaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:797_1: Uppajjati upekkhāti ettha upekkhā nāma aññāṇupekhā.
atk-s0203a0:797_2: Anodhijinassāti kilesodhiṃ jinitvā ṭhitattā khīṇāsavo odhijino nāma,
atk-s0203a0:797_4: Avipākajinassāti etthapi āyatiṃ vipākaṃ jinitvā ṭhitattā khīṇāsavova vipākajino nāma,
atk-s0203a0:797_7: Imā cha gehasitā upekkhāti imā evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍake nilīnamakkhikā
atk-s0203a0:797_8: viya rūpādīni anativattamānā tattha laggā laggitā hutvā uppannā upekkhā cha gehasitā upekkhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:798_0: Rūpaṃ sā ativattatīti rūpaṃ sā anatikkamati,
atk-s0203a0:798_2: Imā cha nekkhammasitā upekkhāti imā evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhādiārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe arajjantassa,
atk-s0203a0:799_1: Tatra idaṃ nissāya idaṃ pajahathāti tesu chattiṃsasattapadesu aṭṭhārasa nissāya aṭṭhārasa pajahathāti attho. Teneva – “tatra,
atk-s0203a0:799_4: Nissāya āgammāti pavattanavasena nissāya ceva āgamma ca.
atk-s0203a0:799_5: Evametesaṃ samatikkamo hotīti evaṃ nekkhammasitānaṃ pavattanena gehasitāni atikkantāni nāma honti.
atk-s0203a0:800_0: Evaṃ sarikkhakeneva sarikkhakaṃ jahāpetvā idāni balavatā dubbalaṃ jahāpento – “tatra,
atk-s0203a0:800_4: nekkhammasitaupekkhāhi ca nekkhammasitasomanassāni jahāpentena balavatā dubbalappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:801_1: aṭṭhasu hi samāpattīsu paṭhamādīni ca tīṇi jhānāni,
atk-s0203a0:801_2: suddhasaṅkhāre ca pādake katvā vipassanaṃ āraddhānaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā hoti upekkhāsahagatā vā,
atk-s0203a0:801_4: Catutthajjhānādīni pādakāni katvā vipassanaṃ āraddhānaṃ pañcannaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanā purimasadisāva.
atk-s0203a0:801_11: Na kevalañca evaṃpaṭipannassa bhikkhuno ayaṃ vipassanāya vedanāvisesova hoti,
atk-s0203a0:802_1: Keci tāva therā vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ niyametīti vadanti,
atk-s0203a0:802_2: keci vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentīti vadanti,
atk-s0203a0:802_4: Tesampi vāde ayameva pubbabhāge vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā niyametīti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:804_4: Rūpe upekkhā ca rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:804_6: Rūpe upekkhābhāvañca aññā samathaupekkhā pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:804_11: Yasmā pana dve vā tīṇi vā ākāsānañcāyatanāni vā viññāṇañcāyatanādīni vā natthi,
atk-s0203a0:806_0: Taṃ pajahathāti ettha arūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhāya rūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhaṃ pajahāpeti,
atk-s0203a0:807_2: Taṃ pajahathāti idha vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanāya arūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhañca vipassanupekkhañca pajahāpeti.
atk-s0203a0:808_1: Yadariyoti ye satipaṭṭhāne ariyo sammāsambuddho sevati.
atk-s0203a0:808_2: Tattha tīsu ṭhānesu satiṃ paṭṭhapento satipaṭṭhāne sevatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:808_3: Na sussūsantīti saddahitvā sotuṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0203a0:808_4: Na aññāti jānanatthāya cittaṃ na upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0203a0:808_6: Satthu sāsanāti satthu ovādaṃ gahetabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ na maññantīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:808_8: Ettha ca gehasitadomanassavasena appatīto hotīti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:808_11: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:808_13: Attamanoti idhāpi gehasitasomanassavasena uppilāvitoti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:809_2: Ekameva disaṃ dhāvatīti anivattitvā dhāvanto ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvati,
atk-s0203a0:809_4: Aṭṭha disā vidhāvatīti ekapallaṅkena nisinno kāyena anivattitvāva vimokkhavasena ekappahāreneva aṭṭha disā vidhāvati,
atk-s0203a0:809_5: puratthābhimukho vā dakkhiṇādīsu aññataradisābhimukho vā nisīditvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:813_6: Avikkhittaṃ avisaṭanti nikantivasena ārammaṇe tiṭṭhamānaṃ vikkhittaṃ visaṭaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0203a0:813_9: Anupādāya na paritasseyyāti anupādiyitvā aggahetvā taṃ viññāṇaṃ na paritasseyya.
atk-s0203a0:813_13: Jātijarāmaraṇadukkhasamudayasambhavoti jātijarāmaraṇassa ceva avasesassa ca dukkhassa nibbatti na hotīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:815_2: Nikantivasena hi atiṭṭhamānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:816_5: taṃ mahāthero upādāparitassanameva anupādāparitassananti katvā dassento evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:816_8: Yadi hi koci saṅkhāro nicco vā dhuvo vā attā vā attaniyo vāti gahetabbayuttako abhavissa,
atk-s0203a0:816_10: Yasmā pana evaṃ upādātabbo saṅkhāro nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:816_11: tasmā rūpaṃ attātiādinā nayena rūpādayo upādinnāpi anupādinnāva honti.
atk-s0203a0:816_12: Evamesā diṭṭhivasena upādāparitassanāpi samānā atthato anupādāparitassanāyeva nāma hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:817_2: taṃ vata me natthī”ti vā ādinā nayena kammaviññāṇaṃ rūpassa bhedānuparivatti hoti.
atk-s0203a0:817_4: Paritassanā dhammasamuppādāti taṇhāparitassanā ca akusaladhammasamuppādā ca.
atk-s0203a0:817_5: Cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantīti kusalacittaṃ pariyādiyitvā gahetvā khepetvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0203a0:817_8: Apekkhavāti sālayo sasineho. Evaṃ kho, āvuso,
atk-s0203a0:817_9: anupādā paritassanā hotīti evaṃ maṇikaraṇḍakasaññāya tucchakaraṇḍakaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ naṭṭhe pacchā vighātaṃ
atk-s0203a0:817_10: āpajjantassa viya pacchā aggahetvā paritassanā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:818_1: Na ca rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattīti khīṇāsavassa kammaviññāṇameva natthi,
atk-s0203a0:822_2: Tattha nevussādeyya na apasādeyyāti gehasitavasena kañci puggalaṃ neva ukkhipeyya na avakkhipeyya.
atk-s0203a0:822_7: Sammukhā na khīṇanti sammukhāpi khīṇaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0203a0:824_1: Ittheke apasādetīti evaṃ gehasitavasena ekacce puggale apasādeti.
atk-s0203a0:825_0: Subhūtitthero kira imaṃ catukkaṃ nissāya etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0203a0:825_1: Bhagavato hi dhammaṃ desentassa puggalānaṃ ussādanāapasādanā paññāyanti,
atk-s0203a0:825_3: Subhūtittherassa pana dhammadesanāya “ayaṃ puggalo appaṭipannako anārādhako”ti vā,
atk-s0203a0:825_4: “ayaṃ sīlavā guṇavā lajjipesalo ācārasampanno”ti vā natthi,
atk-s0203a0:825_9: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:826_1: Kālaññū assāti asampatte ca atikkante ca kāle akathetvā “idāni vuccamānaṃ mahājano gaṇhissatī”ti yuttapattakālaṃ ñatvāva parammukhā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya.
atk-s0203a0:828_2: Abhinivissa voharatīti pattanti sañjānanajanapadaṃ gantvā “pattaṃ āharatha dhovathā”ti sutvā “andhabālaputhujjano,
atk-s0203a0:829_1: Tathā tathā voharati aparāmasanti amhākaṃ janapade bhājanaṃ pātīti vuccati,
atk-s0203a0:829_2: ime pana naṃ pattanti vadantīti tato paṭṭhāya janapadavohāraṃ muñcitvā pattaṃ pattanteva aparāmasanto voharati.
atk-s0203a0:830_6: bhikkhaveti ayaṃ thero dvīsu ṭhānesu etadaggaṃ āruḷho “araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūti,
atk-s0203a0:831_2: Tathā hi dhammasenāpati piṇḍāya caranto gehadvāre ṭhito yāva bhikkhaṃ āharanti,
atk-s0203a0:831_11: Imasmimpi hi tambapaṇṇidīpe porāṇakarājakāle piṅgalabuddharakkhitatthero nāma uttaragāmaṃ nissāya vihāsi.
atk-s0203a0:835_3: Sace te bhaggava agarūti sace tuyhaṃ bhāriyaṃ aphāsukaṃ kiñci natthi.
atk-s0203a0:835_4: Sace so anujānātīti bhaggavassa kira etadahosi –
atk-s0203a0:835_13: Evaṃ sante ahaṃ ubhinnaṃ vivādakāretā nāma bhavissāmi,
atk-s0203a0:837_1: majjhimappadese kira rājagahanagare bimbisāre rajjaṃ kārente paccante takkasīlanagare pukkusāti rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0203a0:837_2: Atha takkasīlato bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā vāṇijā rājagahaṃ āgatā paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā rājānaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:837_3: Rājā te vanditvā ṭhite “katthavāsino tumhe”ti pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:837_5: Atha ne rājā janapadassa khemasubhikkhatādīni nagarassa ca pavattiṃ pucchitvā “ko nāma tumhākaṃ rājā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:837_18: sakkuṇeyyātha tumhākaṃ rājānaṃ mama mittaṃ kātu”nti.
atk-s0203a0:837_20: Rājā tesaṃ suṅkaṃ vissajjetvā gehañca dāpetvā –
atk-s0203a0:837_21: “gacchatha bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā gamanakāle maṃ disvā gaccheyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:837_22: Te tathā katvā gamanakāle rājānaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:837_23: “Gacchatha tumhākaṃ rājānaṃ mama vacanena punappunaṃ ārogyaṃ pucchitvā ‘rājā tumhehi saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ icchatī’ti vadathā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:838_0: Te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā bhuttapātarāsā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:838_1: Rājā “kahaṃ bhaṇe tumhe ettake ime divase na dissathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:838_2: Te sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā – “sādhu, tātā,
atk-s0203a0:838_3: tumhe nissāya mayā majjhimappadese rājā mitto laddho”ti attamano ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:838_5: Te paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgate pukkusāti rājā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchitvā “rājagahato”ti sutvā “mayhaṃ sahāyassa nagarato āgatā tumhe”ti.
atk-s0203a0:838_7: Ārogyaṃ me sahāyassāti ārogyaṃ pucchitvā “ajja paṭṭhāya ye mayhaṃ sahāyassa nagarato jaṅghasatthena vā sakaṭasatthena vā vāṇijā āgacchanti,
atk-s0203a0:838_8: sabbesaṃ mama visayaṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya vasanagehāni,
atk-s0203a0:838_11: kiñci upaddavaṃ mā karontū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:838_12: Bimbisāropi attano nagare tatheva bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:839_2: yaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyassa rajje dassanīyaṃ vā savanīyaṃ vā ratanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:839_7: tattha me sahāyo mā maccharāyatū”ti paṭipaṇṇaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0203a0:839_8: Evaṃ te gacchante gacchante kāle aññamaññaṃ adisvāpi daḷhamittā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:840_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ katikaṃ katvā vasantānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ pukkusātissa paṇṇākāro uppajji.
atk-s0203a0:840_1: Rājā kira aṭṭha pañcavaṇṇe anagghakambale labhi. So –
atk-s0203a0:840_3: ahaṃ sahāyassa pesissāmī”ti lākhāguḷamatte aṭṭha sārakaraṇḍake likhāpetvā tesu te kambale pakkhipitvā
atk-s0203a0:840_4: lākhāya vaṭṭāpetvā setavatthena veṭhetvā samugge pakkhipitvā vatthena veṭhetvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā
atk-s0203a0:841_0: So sāsanaṃ sutvā amaccādayo sannipatantūti bheriṃ carāpetvā nagaramajjhe amaccādiparivuto setacchattena
atk-s0203a0:841_1: dhāriyamānena pallaṅkavare nisinno lañchanaṃ bhinditvā vatthaṃ apanetvā samuggaṃ vivaritvā anto bhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:841_2: muñcitvā lākhāguḷe disvā “mayhaṃ sahāyo pukkusāti ‘jutavittako me sahāyo’ti maññamāno maññe imaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:841_3: pahiṇī”ti ekaṃ guḷaṃ gahetvā hatthena vaṭṭetvā tulayantova anto dussabhaṇḍikaṃ atthīti aññāsi.
atk-s0203a0:841_4: Atha naṃ pallaṅkapāde paharitvā tāvadeva lākhā paripati,
atk-s0203a0:841_5: so nakhena karaṇḍakaṃ vivaritvā anto kambalaratanaṃ disvā itarepi vivarāpesi,
atk-s0203a0:841_8: te vaṇṇasampannā phassasampannā dīghato soḷasahatthā tiriyaṃ aṭṭhahatthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:841_11: “amhākaṃ rañño adiṭṭhasahāyo pukkusāti adisvāva evarūpaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pesesi,
atk-s0203a0:841_12: yuttaṃ evarūpaṃ mittaṃ kātu”nti attamano ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:841_18: “pacchā pesentena paṭhamaṃ pesitapaṇṇākārato atirekaṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0203a0:841_19: sahāyena ca me anaggho paṇṇākāro pesito,
atk-s0203a0:842_0: Kiṃ pana rājagahe tato adhikaṃ ratanaṃ natthīti?
atk-s0203a0:842_3: apica kho panassa sotāpannakālato paṭṭhāya ṭhapetvā tīṇi ratanāni aññaṃ ratanaṃ somanassaṃ janetuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:842_9: iti imesu dvīsu ratanesu saviññāṇakaṃ seṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:842_15: Tattha cakkavattino rañño uppannaṃ itthiratanampi purisasseva upabhogaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:843_1: Tattha agāriyaratanesupi cakkavattirājā ajja pabbajitasāmaṇeraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandati,
atk-s0203a0:843_4: Tattha satasahassampi sekkhānaṃ asekkhassa padesaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:843_7: Tattha satasahassampi sāvakaratanānaṃ buddharatanassa padesaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:844_1: Tattha satasahassampi paccekabuddhānaṃ sabbaññubuddhassa padesaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:844_3: Sadevakasmiñhi loke buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:844_4: Tasmā asadisameva ratanaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyassa pesessāmīti cintetvā takkasīlavāsino pucchi –
atk-s0203a0:844_5: “tātā tumhākaṃ janapade buddho dhammo saṅghoti imāni tīṇi ratanāni dissantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:844_6: Ghosopi so mahārāja tāva tattha natthi,
atk-s0203a0:845_1: “sakkā bhaveyya janasaṅgahatthāya mayhaṃ sahāyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ pesetuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:845_2: buddhā pana paccantimesu janapadesu na aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0203a0:845_5: Mayā pana ‘therā paccante vasantī’ti sutvāpi manusse pesetvā te attano samīpaṃ āṇāpetvā upaṭṭhātumeva yuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:845_7: Yena panākārena sāsane pesite satthā ca mahāsāvakā ca gatā viya honti,
atk-s0203a0:845_9: Cintetvā caturatanāyāmaṃ vidatthimattaputhulaṃ nātitanuṃ nātibahalaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ kārāpetvā “tattha ajja akkharāni likhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:845_10: Pātova sīsaṃ nhāyitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhuttapātarāso apanītagandhamālābharaṇo suvaṇṇasarakena
atk-s0203a0:845_11: jātihiṅgulikaṃ ādāya heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya dvārāni pidahanto pāsādamāruyha pubbadisāmukhaṃ sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0203a0:845_13: “idha tathāgato loke uppanno arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
atk-s0203a0:846_0: Tato “evaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavanato cavitvā mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0203a0:846_4: evaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto evaṃ mahāpadhānaṃ padahi.
atk-s0203a0:846_5: Evaṃ dukkarakārikaṃ katvā mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha aparājitapallaṅke nisinno sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0203a0:846_7: Sadevake loke aññaṃ evarūpaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0203a0:847_0: Yaṃkiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā,
atk-s0203a0:852_0: Evaṃ ekadesena buddhaguṇepi likhitvā dutiyaṃ dhammaratanaṃ thomento –
atk-s0203a0:852_5: “Satthārā desitadhammo nāma evarūpo ca evarūpo cā”ti sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiye ekadesena likhitvā –
atk-s0203a0:858_0: Evaṃ ekadesena dhammaguṇe likhitvā tatiyaṃ saṅgharatanaṃ thomento –
atk-s0203a0:858_3: “Kulaputtā nāma satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā evaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajanti,
atk-s0203a0:858_7: Pabbajitvā ca pana imañca paṭipattiṃ pūrentī”ti cūḷasīlamajjhimasīlamahāsīlādīni ekadesena likhitvā chadvārasaṃvaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:858_9: nīvaraṇappahānaṃ parikammaṃ jhānābhiññā aṭṭhatiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni yāva āsavakkhayā ekadesena likhi,
atk-s0203a0:858_10: soḷasavidhaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ vitthāreneva likhitvā “satthu sāvakasaṅgho nāma evarūpehi ca guṇehi samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:865_3: nikkhamitvā pabbajatū”ti likhitvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ saṃharitvā sukhumakambalena veṭhetvā sārasamugge pakkhipitvā taṃ samuggaṃ suvaṇṇamaye,
atk-s0203a0:866_0: Puna sārakaraṇḍakaṃ suvaṇṇakaraṇḍaketi purimanayeneva haritvā sabbaratanamayaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ kilañjamaye karaṇḍake ṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:866_1: Tato kilañjamayaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ sāramayapeḷāyāti puna vuttanayeneva haritvā sabbaratanamayaṃ peḷaṃ kilañjamayapeḷāya
atk-s0203a0:866_2: ṭhapetvā bahi vatthena veṭhetvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā amacce āṇāpesi –
atk-s0203a0:866_3: “mama āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne maggaṃ alaṅkārāpetha maggo aṭṭhusabhavitthato hotu,
atk-s0203a0:866_6: Tato maṅgalahatthiṃ alaṅkārāpetvā tassa upari pallaṅkaṃ paññapetvā setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā nagaravīthiyo
atk-s0203a0:866_8: attano visayappadese evarūpaṃ pūjaṃ kārentū”ti antarabhogikānaṃ javanadūte pesetvā sayaṃ sabbālaṅkārena
atk-s0203a0:866_10: “sabbatāḷāvacarasammissabalakāyaparivuto paṇṇākāraṃ pesemī”ti attano visayapariyantaṃ gantvā amaccassa mukhasāsanaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0203a0:866_11: “tāta mayhaṃ sahāyo pukkusāti imaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ paṭicchanto orodhamajjhe apaṭicchitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha paṭicchatū”ti.
atk-s0203a0:866_12: Evaṃ sāsanaṃ datvā paccantadesaṃ satthā gacchatīti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā nivatti.
atk-s0203a0:866_13: Antarabhogikā teneva niyāmena maggaṃ paṭiyādetvā paṇṇākāraṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:867_0: Pukkusātipi attano rajjasīmato paṭṭhāya teneva niyāmena maggaṃ paṭiyādetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā paṇṇākārassa paccuggamanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:867_2: paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gataamaccopi rañño vuttasāsanaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0203a0:867_3: Rājā taṃ sutvā paṇṇākārena saddhiṃ āgatānaṃ kattabbakiccaṃ vicāretvā paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya pāsādaṃ āruyha
atk-s0203a0:867_4: “mā idha koci pavisatū”ti dvāre ārakkhaṃ kāretvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā paṇṇākāraṃ uccāsane ṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:867_5: sayaṃ nīcāsane nisinno lañchanaṃ bhinditvā nivāsanaṃ apanetvā kilañjapeḷato paṭṭhāya anupubbena vivaranto
atk-s0203a0:867_9: Atha taṃ samuggaṃ vivaritvā rājalañchanaṃ bhinditvā sukhumakambalaṃ ubhato viyūhitvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ addasa.
atk-s0203a0:868_1: “manāpāni vata akkharāni samasīsāni samapantīni caturassānī”tiādito paṭṭhāya vācetuṃ ārabhi. Tassa –
atk-s0203a0:868_2: “idha tathāgato loke uppanno”ti buddhaguṇe vācentassa balavasomanassaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0203a0:868_4: Attano ṭhitabhāvaṃ vā nisinnabhāvaṃ vā na jānāti. Athassa –
atk-s0203a0:868_5: “kappakoṭisatasahassehipi etaṃ dullabhasāsanaṃ sahāyaṃ nissāya sotuṃ labhāmī”ti bhiyyo balavapīti udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:868_6: So hi upari vācetuṃ asakkonto yāva pītivegapassaddhiyā nisīditvā parato –
atk-s0203a0:868_9: So puna yāva pītivegapassaddhiyā nisīditvā parato “suppaṭipanno”ti saṅghaguṇe ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:868_11: Atha sabbapariyante ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ vācetvā catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattesi,
atk-s0203a0:869_0: Nāgarā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ akaṃsu “paṇṇākāraṃ paṭicchitadivasato paṭṭhāya baladassanaṃ vā nāṭakadassanaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0203a0:869_2: rājā sahāyena pahitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ yassicchati tassa dassetu,
atk-s0203a0:869_3: rājāno nāma ekaccassa paṇṇākāravasenapi vañcetvā rajjaṃ attano kātuṃ vāyamanti.
atk-s0203a0:869_11: Satthusāsanaṃ dhāressāmī”ti sayane ṭhapitaṃ asiṃ gahetvā kese chinditvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā –
atk-s0203a0:869_12: “etaṃ gahetvā rajjaṃ kārethā”ti saddhiṃ cūḷāmaṇinā kesakalāpaṃ parisamajjhe pātesi,
atk-s0203a0:869_14: “sahāyakasantikā laddhapaṇṇākārā nāma rājāno tumhādisā honti devā”ti ekappahāreneva viravi.
atk-s0203a0:870_0: Tato cūḷupaṭṭhākaṃ pesetvā antarāpaṇā dve kāsāyavatthāni mattikāpattañca āharāpetvā –
atk-s0203a0:870_2: te uddissa mayhaṃ pabbajjā”ti satthāraṃ uddissa ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ vāmaaṃsakūṭe katvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā –
atk-s0203a0:870_3: “sobhati nu kho me pabbajjā no vā”ti mahātale katipayavāre aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā –
atk-s0203a0:870_4: “sobhati me pabbajjā”ti dvāraṃ vivaritvā pāsādā otari.
atk-s0203a0:870_5: Otarantaṃ pana naṃ tīsu dvāresu ṭhitanāṭakādīni disvāpi na sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:870_6: “Eko paccekabuddho amhākaṃ rañño dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ āgato”ti kira cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:870_7: Uparipāsādaṃ pana āruyha rañño ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānāni disvā rājā gatoti ñatvā samuddamajjhe osīdamānāya nāvāya jano viya ekappahāreneva viraviṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:870_8: Kulaputtaṃ bhūmitalaṃ otiṇṇamattaṃ aṭṭhārasaseniyo sabbe nāgarā balakāyā ca parivāretvā mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:870_11: sāsanaṃ pesetvā buddharatanaṃ nāma loke uppannaṃ vā no vāti ñatvā gamissatha,
atk-s0203a0:870_14: tassa mayā saddhiṃ dvejjhavacanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:871_5: Mahājanakajātake bodhisattena katalekhaṃ sīvalidevī antaraṃ kātuṃ avisahantī vivattamānā agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:871_7: Taṃ pana lekhaṃ mahājano antaraṃ kātuṃ na visahi,
atk-s0203a0:871_9: Kulaputto “ayaṃ me gataṭṭhāne dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā mukhodakaṃ vā dassatī”ti antamaso ekaceṭakampi aggahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0203a0:871_10: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “mama satthā ca mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā ekakova pabbajito”ti ekakova agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:871_12: “satthā kira me pabbajitvā yānaṃ nāruḷho”ti ca antamaso ekapaṭalikampi upāhanaṃ nāruhi,
atk-s0203a0:871_14: Mahājano rukkhapākāraṭṭālakādīni āruyha esa amhākaṃ rājā gacchatīti olokesi.
atk-s0203a0:871_17: na sakkā ekena maggo nittharitu”nti ekaṃ satthavāhaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0203a0:871_18: Sukhumālassa kulaputtassa kaṭhinatattāya pathaviyā gachantassa pādatalesu phoṭā uṭṭhahitvā bhijjanti,
atk-s0203a0:871_20: Satthavāhe khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā nisinne kulaputto maggā okkamma ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdati.
atk-s0203a0:871_21: Nisinnaṭṭhāne pādaparikammaṃ vā piṭṭhiparikammaṃ vā kattā nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:871_22: kulaputto ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā maggadarathakilamathapariḷāhaṃ vikkhambhetvā jhānaratiyā vītināmeti.
atk-s0203a0:872_0: Punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā puna satthavāhaṃ anubandhati.
atk-s0203a0:872_1: Pātarāsakāle kulaputtassa pattaṃ gahetvā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ patte pakkhipitvā denti.
atk-s0203a0:872_2: Taṃ uttaṇḍulampi hoti kilinnampi samasakkharampi aloṇātiloṇampi,
atk-s0203a0:872_3: kulaputto pavisanaṭṭhānaṃ paccavekkhitvā amataṃ viya paribhuñjitvā etena niyāmena aṭṭhahi ūnakāni dve yojanasatāni gato.
atk-s0203a0:872_8: “idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī”ti satthāraṃ rājagahe uppannaṃ viya katvā sāsanaṃ pesitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:872_9: tasmā naṃ apucchitvāva pañcacattālīsayojanamattaṃ maggaṃ atikkanto.
atk-s0203a0:872_10: So sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāya rājagahaṃ patvā satthā kahaṃ vasatīti pucchi. Kuto nu, bhante, āgatoti?
atk-s0203a0:872_12: Satthā tuyhaṃ āgatamagge ito pañcacattālīsayojanamatte sāvatthi nāma atthi,
atk-s0203a0:872_16: ajja idheva vasitvā sve satthu santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti. Tato –
atk-s0203a0:872_19: Atha so taṃ kumbhakāraṃ yācitvā tattha vāsatthāya pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0203a0:873_0: Bhagavāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento pukkusātiṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0203a0:873_1: “ayaṃ kulaputto sahāyena pesitaṃ sāsanamattakaṃ vācetvā atirekatiyojanasatikaṃ mahārajjaṃ pahāya maṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_2: uddissa pabbajitvā aṭṭhahi ūnakāni dve yojanasatāni atikkamma rājagahaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0203a0:873_3: mayi agacchante pana tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni appaṭivijjhitvā ekarattivāsena anāthakālakiriyaṃ karissati,
atk-s0203a0:873_4: mayi pana gate tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni paṭivijjhissati.
atk-s0203a0:873_5: Janasaṅgahatthāyeva pana mayā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0203a0:873_6: karissāmi tassa saṅgaha”nti pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0203a0:873_7: caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā muhuttaṃ attadarathakilamathaṃ paṭipassambhetvā –
atk-s0203a0:873_9: atirekayojanasataṃ rajjaṃ pahāya antamaso mukhadhovanadāyakampi ceṭakaṃ aggahetvā ekakova nikkhanto”ti
atk-s0203a0:873_10: sāriputtamahāmoggallānādīsu kañci anāmantetvā sayameva attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā ekakova nikkhanto.
atk-s0203a0:873_13: “kulaputto mama lajjamāno hatthiassarathasuvaṇṇasivikādīsu ekayānepi anisīditvā antamaso ekapaṭalikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_15: mayāpi padasāva gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pana cintetvā padasāva agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:874_0: So asīti anubyañjanāni byāmappabhā bāttiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇānīti imaṃ buddhasiriṃ paṭicchādetvā valāhakapaṭicchanno
atk-s0203a0:874_1: puṇṇacando viya aññatarabhikkhuvesena gacchanto ekapacchābhatteneva pañcacattālīsa yojanāni atikkamma
atk-s0203a0:874_2: sūriyatthaṅgamalīvelāya kulaputte paviṭṭhamatteyeva taṃ kumbhakārasālaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0203a0:874_6: nāma kulaputto bhagavantaṃ uddissa saddhāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
atk-s0203a0:874_7: so tasmiṃ kumbhakārāvesane paṭhamaṃ vāsūpagato hotī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:875_1: “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti pasayha kumbhakārasālaṃ apavisitvā dvāre ṭhitova kulaputtaṃ okāsaṃ kārento sace te bhikkhūtiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:875_3: Viharatāyasmā yathāsukhanti yena yena iriyāpathena phāsu hoti,
atk-s0203a0:875_4: tena tena yathāsukhaṃ āyasmā viharatūti okāsaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:875_5: Atirekatiyojanasatañhi rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito kulaputto parassa chaḍḍitapatitaṃ kumbhakārasālaṃ kiṃ aññassa sabrahmacārino maccharāyissati.
atk-s0203a0:875_6: Ekacce pana moghapurisā sāsane pabbajitvā āvāsamacchariyādīhi abhibhūtā attano vasanaṭṭhāne mayhaṃ kuṭi
atk-s0203a0:875_8: Nisīdīti accantasukhumālo lokanātho devavimānasadisaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pahāya tattha tattha vippakiṇṇachārikāya
atk-s0203a0:875_10: santharitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā devavimānasadisaṃ dibbagandhasugandhaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0203a0:876_10: Iti dvepi khattiyā dvepi abhinīhārasampannā dvepi rājapabbajitā dvepi suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dvepi samāpattilābhino
atk-s0203a0:876_11: kumbhakārasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnāti tehi kumbhakārasālā ativiya sobhati,
atk-s0203a0:876_14: “sukhumālo ahaṃ paramasukhumālo ekapacchābhattena pañcacattālīsa yojanāni āgato,
atk-s0203a0:876_15: muhuttaṃ tāva sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā maggadarathaṃ paṭipassambhemī”ti cittampi anuppādetvā nisīdantova phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0203a0:876_18: muhuttaṃ tāva nipajjitvā maggadarathaṃ vinodemī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā nisīdamānova ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0203a0:876_19: Idaṃ sandhāya atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattintiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:877_0: Nanu ca bhagavā kulaputtassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti āgato,
atk-s0203a0:877_4: so tāvassa paṭipassambhatūti na desesi. Apare –
atk-s0203a0:877_9: brahmalokappamāṇampi hi saddaṃ bhagavā attano ānubhāvena vūpasametuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:878_1: Etadahosīti bhagavā phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya suvaṇṇavimāne maṇisīhapañjaraṃ vivaranto viya pañcapasādappaṭimaṇḍitāni akkhīni ummīletvā olokesi,
atk-s0203a0:878_3: suvaṇṇapaṭimaṃ viya nisinnaṃ kulaputtaṃ disvā etaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:878_10: Catūsu hi iriyāpathesu tayo iriyāpathā na sobhanti.
atk-s0203a0:878_16: pacchābhatte pana divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā sudhotahatthapādassa catusandhikapallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0203a0:878_18: Ayañca kulaputto pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ appetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0203a0:879_1: Kiṃ bhagavā attānaṃ uddissa pabbajitabhāvaṃ na jānātīti?
atk-s0203a0:879_4: apatiṭṭhitāya kathāya kathā na sañjāyatīti kathāpatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:880_0: Disvā ca pana jāneyyāsīti tathāgataṃ buddhasiriyā virocantaṃ ayaṃ buddhoti sabbe jānanti.
atk-s0203a0:880_2: buddhasiriṃ pana paṭicchādetvā aññatarapiṇḍapātikavesena caranto dujjāno hoti.
atk-s0203a0:880_6: Tathā hi naṃ ekakumbhakārasālāya nisinnampi na jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:881_1: Evamāvusoti kulaputto sahāyena pesitaṃ sāsanamattaṃ vācetvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajamāno –
atk-s0203a0:881_5: “dhammaṃ te bhikkhu desessāmī”ti padamattassa vattāraṃ nālattha,
atk-s0203a0:881_6: so “dhammaṃ te bhikkhu desessāmī”ti vuttaṃ kiṃ sakkaccaṃ na suṇissati.
atk-s0203a0:881_7: Pipāsitasoṇḍo viya hi pipāsitahatthī viya cāyaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:882_1: Chadhāturo ayanti bhagavā kulaputtassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ akathetvā āditova arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
atk-s0203a0:882_4: tassa paṭhamameva sīlasaṃvaraṃ indriyesu guttadvārataṃ bhojane mattaññutaṃ jāgariyānuyogaṃ satta saddhamme
atk-s0203a0:882_7: tassa taṃ akathetvā arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vipassanameva ācikkhati.
atk-s0203a0:882_9: Tathā hi anena sāsanaṃ vācetvā pāsādavaragateneva ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:882_12: Tasmā pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ akathetvā arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ accantasuññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇamevassa ācikkhituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0203a0:883_2: Bhagavā hi katthaci vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0203a0:883_5: katthaci avijjamānena avijjamānanti sabbāsave vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:883_6: Idha pana vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:883_7: Sace hi bhagavā purisoti paṇṇattiṃ vissajjetvā dhātuyo icceva vatvā cittaṃ upaṭṭhāpeyya,
atk-s0203a0:883_11: Tasmā tathāgato anupubbena purisoti paṇṇattiṃ pahāya “sattoti vā purisoti vā puggaloti vā paṇṇattimattameva,
atk-s0203a0:883_13: dhātumatteyeva cittaṃ ṭhapāpetvā tīṇi phalāni paṭivijjhāpessāmī”ti anaṅgaṇasutte vuttabhāsantarakusalo
atk-s0203a0:883_14: tāya tāya bhāsāya sippaṃ uggaṇhāpento ācariyo viya evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:884_10: svāyaṃ bhikkhu puriso chadhāturo chaphassāyatano aṭṭhārasamanopavicāro,
atk-s0203a0:884_11: so ettova vivaṭṭitvā uttamasiddhibhūtaṃ arahattaṃ gaṇhamāno imesu catūsu ṭhānesu patiṭṭhāya gaṇhātīti caturādhiṭṭhānoti.
atk-s0203a0:884_13: Maññassa vā nappavattantīti maññassa vā mānassa vā nappavattanti.
atk-s0203a0:884_14: Muni santoti vuccatīti khīṇāsavamuni upasanto nibbutoti vuccati.
atk-s0203a0:884_15: Paññaṃ nappamajjeyyāti arahattaphalapaññāya paṭivijjhanatthaṃ āditova samādhivipassanāpaññaṃ nappamajjeyya.
