atk-s0203a0:884_16: Saccamanurakkheyyāti paramatthasaccassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyatthaṃ āditova vacīsaccaṃ rakkheyya.
atk-s0203a0:884_17: Cāgamanubrūheyyāti arahattamaggena sabbakilesapariccāgakaraṇatthaṃ āditova kilesapariccāgaṃ brūheyya.
atk-s0203a0:884_18: Santimeva so sikkheyyāti arahattamaggena sabbakilesavūpasamanatthaṃ āditova kilesavūpasamanaṃ sikkheyya.
atk-s0203a0:884_19: Iti paññādhiṭṭhānādīnaṃ adhigamatthāya imāni samathavipassanāpaññādīni pubbabhāgādhiṭṭhānāni vuttāni.
atk-s0203a0:885_3: Paññādhiṭṭhānantiādīni pubbe vuttānaṃ arahattaphalapaññādīnaṃ vasena veditabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:886_1: Idāni nikkhittamātikāvasena “yattha ṭhitaṃ maññassa vā nappavattantī”ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0203a0:886_2: arahatte pana patte puna “paññaṃ nappamajjeyyā”tiādīhi kiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0203a0:886_3: Iti bhagavā mātikaṃ uppaṭipāṭidhātukaṃ ṭhapetvāpi yathādhammavaseneva vibhaṅgaṃ vibhajanto paññaṃ nappamajjeyyātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:886_6: Yo tāva imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā vejjakammādivasena ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappento pabbajjānurūpena cittuppādaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:886_8: Yo pana sāsane pabbajitvā sīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sappāyaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ samādāya cittarucitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:886_9: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ nissāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ patvā ajjeva arahattanti
atk-s0203a0:886_12: Imasmiṃ pana sutte dhātukammaṭṭhānavasena esa paññāya appamādo vutto.
atk-s0203a0:887_1: Athāparaṃ viññāṇaṃyeva avasissatīti ayampettha pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0203a0:887_3: idāni arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nibbattetvā dassetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0203a0:887_4: Yaṃ vā panetaṃ imassa bhikkhuno pathavīdhātuādīsu āgamaniyavipassanāvasena kammakārakaviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:887_5: taṃ viññāṇadhātuvasena bhājetvā dassentopi imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:887_7: Satthu kathanatthāya kulaputtassa ca paṭivijjhanatthāya avasissati.
atk-s0203a0:887_10: Sukhantipi vijānātīti sukhavedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhavedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānāti.
atk-s0203a0:887_12: Sace panāyaṃ vedanākathā heṭṭhā na kathitā bhaveyya,
atk-s0203a0:887_14: Satipaṭṭhāne panesā kathitāvāti tattha kathitanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:888_1: Upekkhāyeva avasissatīti ettāvatā hi yathā nāma chekena maṇikārācariyena vajirasūciyā vijjhitvā cammakhaṇḍe
atk-s0203a0:888_2: pātetvā pātetvā dinnamuttaṃ antevāsiko gahetvā gahetvā suttagataṃ karonto muttolambakamuttajālādīni karoti,
atk-s0203a0:888_3: evameva bhagavatā kathetvā kathetvā dinnaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ayaṃ kulaputto manasikaronto manasikaronto paguṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:889_4: Kulaputtena hi sahāyassa sāsanaṃ vācetvā pāsādatale ṭhiteneva ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:889_5: yadassa ettakaṃ maggaṃ āgacchantassa yānakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0203a0:889_7: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne satthā kulaputtassa rūpāvacarajjhāne vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:889_8: Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti “bhikkhu paguṇaṃ tava idaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāna”nti.
atk-s0203a0:889_11: Ālimpeyyāti tattha aṅgāre pakkhipitvā aggiṃ datvā nāḷikāya dhamento aggiṃ jāleyya.
atk-s0203a0:889_12: Ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyāti aṅgāre viyūhitvā aṅgāramatthake vā ṭhapeyya,
atk-s0203a0:889_16: Evameva khoti yathā taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ icchiticchitāya piḷandhanavikatiyā saṃvattati,
atk-s0203a0:889_17: evameva ayaṃ tāva catutthajjhānupekkhā vipassanā abhiññā nirodho bhavokkantīti imesu yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0203a0:890_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā imasmiṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne nikantipariyādānatthaṃ avaṇṇaṃ akathetvā vaṇṇaṃ kathesīti.
atk-s0203a0:890_3: “mayhaṃ pabbajitvā dvānavutiyojanasataṃ āgacchantassa imaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ yānakiccaṃ sādhesi,
atk-s0203a0:890_4: ahaṃ ettakaṃ maggaṃ āgacchanto jhānasukhena jhānaratiyā āgato,
atk-s0203a0:890_6: jānaṃ nu kho katheti ajāna”nti kulaputto saṃsayaṃ sammohaṃ āpajjeyya,
atk-s0203a0:892_1: Evaṃ catūhi vārehi arūpāvacarajjhānassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni tasseva ādīnavaṃ dassento so evaṃ pajānātītiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:892_2: Tattha saṅkhatametanti kiñcāpi ettha vīsatikappasahassāni āyu atthi,
atk-s0203a0:893_0: Idāni arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ gaṇhanto so neva taṃ abhisaṅkharotītiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:893_1: Yathā hi cheko bhisakko visavikāraṃ disvā vamanaṃ kāretvā visaṃ ṭhānato cāvetvā upari āropetvā khandhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:893_2: vā sīsaṃ vā gahetuṃ adatvā visaṃ otāretvā pathaviyaṃ pāteyya,
atk-s0203a0:893_3: evameva bhagavā kulaputtassa arūpāvacarajjhāne vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:893_4: Taṃ sutvā kulaputto rūpāvacarajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya arūpāvacarajjhāne patthanaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:894_0: Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā taṃ asampattassa appaṭiladdhasseva bhikkhuno “atthesā ākāsānañcāyatanādīsu sampatti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:894_5: Taṃ pana aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ tāvakālikaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:894_12: ettakaṃ kālaṃ tattha sampattiṃ anubhavitvāpi puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā puna catūsu apāyesu patitabba”nti
atk-s0203a0:894_14: Kulaputto taṃ sutvā arūpāvacarajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādiyi,
atk-s0203a0:894_15: bhagavā tassa rūpāvacarārūpāvacaresu nikantiyā pariyādinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhanto “so neva taṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:895_0: Yathā vā paneko mahāyodho ekaṃ rājānaṃ ārādhetvā satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gāmavaraṃ labheyya,
atk-s0203a0:895_5: aññaṃ catusatasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti dadeyya so sādhu devāti taṃ vissajjetvā itaraṃ gāmaṃ gaṇheyya.
atk-s0203a0:895_9: Asukasmiṃ pana ṭhāne mahantaṃ nagaraṃ atthi,
atk-s0203a0:895_10: tattha chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjaṃ kārehī”ti pahiṇeyya,
atk-s0203a0:896_3: taṃ vissajjetvā itaraṃ gāmaṃ gaṇhāhīti vuttakālo viya ānāpānacatutthajjhāne nikantipariyādānaṃ katvā āruppakathanaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:896_4: taṃ gāmaṃ asampattameva pakkosāpetvā “kiṃ te tena,
atk-s0203a0:896_7: tattha chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjaṃ kārehī”ti vuttakālo viya arūpe saṅkhatametanti ādīnavakathanena appattāsuyeva
atk-s0203a0:896_8: tāsu samāpattīsu patthanaṃ nivatthāpetvā upari arahattanikūṭena desanāgahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:897_0: Tattha neva abhisaṅkharotīti nāyūhati na rāsiṃ karoti.
atk-s0203a0:897_2: Bhavāya vā vibhavāya vāti vuddhiyā vā parihāniyā vā,
atk-s0203a0:897_4: Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti loke rūpādīsu kiñci ekadhammampi taṇhāya na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0203a0:897_6: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātīti bhagavā attano buddhavisaye ṭhatvā desanāya arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0203a0:897_7: Kulaputto pana attano yathopanissayena tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0203a0:897_8: Yathā nāma rājā suvaṇṇabhājanena nānārasabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto attano pamāṇena piṇḍaṃ vaṭṭetvā aṅke nisinnena
atk-s0203a0:897_9: rājakumārena piṇḍamhi ālaye dassite taṃ piṇḍaṃ upanāmeyya,
atk-s0203a0:897_13: evaṃ dhammarājā tathāgato attano pamāṇena arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhanto desanaṃ desesi,
atk-s0203a0:897_14: kulaputto attano yathopanissayena tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0203a0:898_0: Ito pubbe panassa khandhā dhātuyo āyatanānīti evarūpaṃ accantasuññataṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ kathaṃ kathentassa neva kaṅkhā,
atk-s0203a0:898_3: evaṃ me ācariyena vutta”nti iti kira na dandhāyitattaṃ na vitthāyitattaṃ atthi.
atk-s0203a0:898_4: Ekaccesu ca kira ṭhānesu buddhā aññātakavesena vicaranti,
atk-s0203a0:898_5: sammāsambuddho nu kho esoti ahudeva saṃsayo,
atk-s0203a0:898_8: atha ayaṃ me satthāti niṭṭhaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:898_9: Yadi evaṃ kasmā accayaṃ na desesīti.
atk-s0203a0:898_11: Bhagavā hi yathānikkhittāya mātikāya acchinnadhāraṃ katvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya desanaṃ desesiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:899_2: Anajjhositāti gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahetuṃ na yutthāti pajānāti.
atk-s0203a0:899_3: Anabhinanditāti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinandituṃ na yuttāti pajānāti.
atk-s0203a0:900_1: Visaṃyutto naṃ vedetīti sace hissa sukhavedanaṃ ārabbha rāgānusayo,
atk-s0203a0:900_5: Anuppajjanato pana visaṃyutto naṃ vedeti nissaṭo vippamutto.
atk-s0203a0:900_7: Yāva kāyapavattā uppajjitvā tato paraṃ anuppajjanavedananti attho.
atk-s0203a0:900_9: Anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantīti dvādasasu āyatanesu kilesānaṃ visevanassa natthitāya anabhinanditāni
atk-s0203a0:900_11: Kilesā hi nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāpi yattha natthi,
atk-s0203a0:900_15: Tasmā bhagavā nibbānaṃ āgamma sītibhūtānipi idheva sītībhavissantīti āha.
atk-s0203a0:900_19: Itarathā nesaṃ sītibhāvo nāma natthīti suvuttametaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:901_2: yathā hi eko puriso telapadīpassa jhāyato tele khīṇe telaṃ āsiñcati,
atk-s0203a0:901_5: evameva puthujjano ekasmiṃ bhave ṭhito kusalākusalaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:901_6: so tena sugatiyañca apāyesu ca nibbattatiyeva,
atk-s0203a0:901_9: “imaṃ purisaṃ āgamma dīpasikhā na upacchijjatī”ti nilīno tassa purisassa sīsaṃ chindeyya,
atk-s0203a0:901_10: evaṃ vaṭṭiyā ca telassa ca anupahārā dīpasikhā anāhārā nibbāyati,
atk-s0203a0:901_11: evameva vaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhito yogāvacaro arahattamaggena kusalākusalaṃ samucchindati,
atk-s0203a0:901_12: tassa samucchinnattā khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno kāyassa bhedā puna vedayitāni na uppajjantīti.
atk-s0203a0:902_0: Tasmāti yasmā ādimhi samādhivipassanāpaññāhi arahattaphalapaññā uttaritarā, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:902_1: Evaṃ samannāgatoti iminā uttamena arahattaphalapaññādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:902_3: imasmiṃ pana sutte arahattaphale ñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:902_4: Tenevāha tassa sā vimutti sacce ṭhitā akuppā hotīti.
atk-s0203a0:904_0: Tasmāti yasmā ādito samathavipassanāvasena vacīsaccato dukkhasaccasamudayasaccehi ca paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānameva uttaritaraṃ, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:904_1: Evaṃ samannāgatoti iminā uttamena paramatthasaccādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:905_2: Upadhī hontīti khandhūpadhi kilesūpadhi abhisaṅkhārūpadhi pañcakāmaguṇūpadhīti ime upadhayo honti.
atk-s0203a0:905_5: sotāpattimaggādīhi ca kilesapariccāgato arahattamaggeneva kilesapariccāgo uttaritaro, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:905_6: Evaṃ samannāgatoti iminā uttamena cāgādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:906_3: sampadussanavasena sampadosoti tīhi padehi dosākusalamūlameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:906_5: sotāpattimaggādīhi kilesavūpasamato ca arahattamaggeneva kilesavūpasamo uttaritaro, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:906_6: Evaṃ samannāgatoti iminā uttamena upasamādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:907_1: Maññitametanti taṇhāmaññitaṃ mānamaññitaṃ diṭṭhimaññitanti tividhampi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:907_2: Ayamahamasmīti ettha pana ayamahanti ekaṃ taṇhāmaññitameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:907_6: Muni santoti vuccatīti khīṇāsavamuni santo nibbutoti vuccati.
atk-s0203a0:907_8: Saṃkhittenāti buddhānaṃ kira sabbāpi dhammadesanā saṃkhittāva,
atk-s0203a0:907_12: Ugghāṭitaññūtiādīsu pana catūsu puggalesu pukkusāti kulaputto vipañcitaññū,
atk-s0203a0:907_13: iti vipañcitaññuvasena bhagavā imaṃ dhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:908_2: paripuṇṇaṃ pattacīvaranti kasmā kulaputtassa iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ na nibbattanti.
atk-s0203a0:908_9: Atha bhagavā sayaṃ pariyesitvā kasmā na upasampādesīti.
atk-s0203a0:908_12: suddhāvāsiko anāgāmī mahābrahmā kumbhakārasālaṃ āgantvā nisinno viya ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:909_2: Bhagavato kira dhammadesanāpariniṭṭhānañca aruṇuṭṭhānañca rasmivissajjanañca ekakkhaṇe ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:909_3: Bhagavā kira desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvāva chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajji,
atk-s0203a0:909_5: chabbaṇṇarasmiyo jālajālā puñjapuñjā hutvā vidhāvantiyo sabbadisābhāge suvaṇṇapaṭapariyonaddhe viya ca
atk-s0203a0:909_9: kumbhakārasālāya kira nisinno”ti aññamaññassa ārocetvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:910_4: Tumhākaṃ sahāyo pukkusāti rājā tumhehi pahitaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā maṃ uddissa āgacchanto
atk-s0203a0:910_5: sāvatthiṃ atikkamma pañcacattālīsa yojanāni āgantvā imaṃ kumbhakārasālaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi,
atk-s0203a0:910_6: ahaṃ tassa saṅgahatthaṃ āgantvā dhammakathaṃ kathesiṃ,
atk-s0203a0:910_9: Upasampadaṃ yācitvā aparipuṇṇapattacīvaratāya pattacīvarapariyesanatthaṃ gato mahārājāti.
atk-s0203a0:911_0: Kulaputtopi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesamāno neva bimbisārarañño na takkasīlakānaṃ jaṅghavāṇijānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:911_2: “na kho me kukkuṭassa viya tattha tattha manāpāmanāpameva vicinitvā pattacīvaraṃ pariyesituṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:912_0: Jīvitā voropesīti etasmiṃ saṅkārakūṭe pilotikaṃ olokentaṃ vibbhantā taruṇavacchā gāvī upadhāvitvā siṅgena vijjhitvā ghātesi.
atk-s0203a0:912_1: Chātakajjhatto kulaputto ākāseyeva āyukkhayaṃ patvā patito.
atk-s0203a0:912_5: Avihābrahmaloke kira nibbattamattāva satta janā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:915_0: Ke ca te ataruṃ paṅkaṃ, maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ;
atk-s0203a0:916_0: Ke hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccaguṃ.
atk-s0203a0:917_0: Upako palagaṇḍo ca, pukkusāti ca te tayo;
atk-s0203a0:918_0: Bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bāhuraggi ca siṅgiyo;
atk-s0203a0:919_0: Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccagu”nti. ;
atk-s0203a0:920_0: Bimbisāropi “mayhaṃ sahāyo mayā pesitasāsanamattaṃ vācetvā hatthagataṃ rajjaṃ pahāya ettakaṃ addhānaṃ āgato,
atk-s0203a0:920_2: pabbajitasakkārena taṃ sakkarissāmī”ti “pariyesatha me sahāyaka”nti tattha tattha pesesi.
atk-s0203a0:920_5: Rājā gantvā kulaputtaṃ disvā – “na vata, bho,
atk-s0203a0:920_8: Paridevitvā kulaputtaṃ mañcakena gaṇhāpetvā yuttokāse ṭhapetvā anupasampannassa sakkāraṃ kātuṃ jānanābhāvena
atk-s0203a0:920_9: nhāpakakappakādayo pakkosāpetvā kulaputtaṃ sīsaṃ nhāpetvā suddhavatthāni nivāsāpetvā rājavesena alaṅkārāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:920_10: sovaṇṇasivikaṃ āropetvā sabbatāḷāvacaragandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ karonto nagarā nīharitvā bahūhi gandhakaṭṭhehi
atk-s0203a0:920_11: mahācitakaṃ kāretvā kulaputtassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo ādāya cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:924_2: Tattha ācikkhanāti idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāma…pe…
atk-s0203a0:924_6: Āsanaṃ ṭhapento hi āsanaṃ paññapetīti vuccati.
atk-s0203a0:925_0: Anuggāhakāti āmisasaṅgahena dhammasaṅgahenāti dvīhipi saṅgahehi anuggāhakā.
atk-s0203a0:925_4: Janikamātā hi nava vā dasa vā māse loṇambilādīni pariharamānā kucchiyā dārakaṃ dhāretvā kucchito nikkhantaṃ posikamātaraṃ dhātiṃ paṭicchāpeti.
atk-s0203a0:925_7: Evameva sāriputto attano vā paresaṃ vā santike pabbajite dvīhi saṅgahehi saṅgaṇhanto gilāne paṭijagganto
atk-s0203a0:925_8: kammaṭṭhāne yojetvā sotāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā apāyabhayehi vuṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya –
atk-s0203a0:925_9: “idāni paccattapurisakārena uparimagge nibbattessantī”ti tesu anapekkho hutvā aññe nave nave ovadati.
atk-s0203a0:925_10: Mahāmoggallānopi attano vā paresaṃ vā santike pabbajite tatheva saṅgaṇhitvā kammaṭṭhāne yojetvā heṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:925_11: tīṇi phalāni pattesupi anapekkhataṃ na āpajjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a0:925_21: appamattakampi bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi antamaso accharāsaṅghatamattampī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:925_23: tāva tesu anapekkhataṃ anāpajjitvā arahattaṃ pattesuyeva āpajjatīti.
atk-s0203a0:926_12: Tatra hi micchāsaṅkappacetanāya samugghātako ekova saṅkappo labbhati,
atk-s0203a0:926_17: vitthārena pana saccakathā visuddhimagge ca sammādiṭṭhisutte ca vuttāyevāti.
atk-s0203a0:930_3: Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā –
atk-s0203a0:930_7: cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:930_9: Idha pana gottena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā mahāpajāpatigotamīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:930_12: ekadivasaṃ pana dhātigaṇaparivutā sippikānaṃ vāyanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vemakoṭiṃ gahetvā vāyanākāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:931_0: Kadā pana gotamiyā bhagavato dussayugaṃ dātuṃ cittaṃ uppannanti.
atk-s0203a0:931_2: Tadā hi piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ satthāraṃ gahetvā suddhodanamahārājā sakaṃ nivesanaṃ pavesesi,
atk-s0203a0:931_3: atha bhagavato rūpasobhaggaṃ disvā mahāpajāpatigotamī cintesi –
atk-s0203a0:931_7: “mama puttassa ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe vasantassa antamaso mocaphalamattampi mayā dinnakameva ahosi,
atk-s0203a0:931_9: “Imasmiṃ kho pana rājagehe bahūni mahagghāni vatthāni atthi,
atk-s0203a0:932_0: Athantarāpaṇā kappāsaṃ āharāpetvā sahattheneva pisitvā pothetvā sukhumasuttaṃ kantitvā antovatthusmiṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:932_1: sālaṃ kārāpetvā sippike pakkosāpetvā sippikānaṃ attano paribhogakhādanīyabhojanīyameva datvā vāyāpesi,
atk-s0203a0:932_3: Niṭṭhitakāle sippikānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ katvā dussayugaṃ gandhasamugge pakkhipitvā vāsaṃ gāhāpetvā –
atk-s0203a0:932_4: “mayhaṃ puttassa cīvarasāṭakaṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0203a0:932_6: vīthiyo sammajjitvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapetvā dhajapaṭākā ussāpetvā rājagharadvārato paṭṭhāya yāva nigrodhārāmā maggaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā pupphābhikiṇṇaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:932_7: Mahāpajāpatipi sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā dhātigaṇaparivutā samuggaṃ sīse ṭhapetvā bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā idaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:933_2: dussakoṭṭhāgārato bhikkhusatassāpi bhikkhusahassassāpi bhikkhusatasahassassāpi cīvaradussāni dātuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:933_3: idaṃ pana me bhagavantaṃ uddissa sāmaṃ kantaṃ sāmaṃ vāyitaṃ, taṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:934_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā attano diyyamānaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa dāpetīti?
atk-s0203a0:934_3: “imissā maṃ ārabbha pubbacetanā muñcacetanā paracetanāti tisso cetanā uppannā,
atk-s0203a0:934_5: evamassā cha cetanā ekato hutvā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya pavattissantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:934_9: “kiṃ tvaṃ satthu dinnato saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vadasī”ti āma vadāmīti.
atk-s0203a0:934_12: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cāti.
atk-s0203a0:934_16: vighāsādānaṃ pūvaṃ dehī”ti ca “tena hi tva, kaccāna,
atk-s0203a0:934_17: vighāsādānaṃ guḷaṃ dehī”ti ca vacanato vighāsādānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalatarañca bhaveyya.
atk-s0203a0:934_19: Rājarājamahāmattādayopi attano āgataṃ paṇṇākāraṃ hatthigopakādīnaṃ dāpenti,
atk-s0203a0:939_0: Vacanato hi satthārā uttaritaro dakkhiṇeyyo nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:939_1: Evamassā cha cetanā ekato hutvā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissantīti sandhāya yāvatatiyaṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghassa dāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:940_0: Pacchimāya janatāya saṅghe cittīkārajananatthaṃ cāpi evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:940_4: pacchimā janatā saṅghe cittīkāraṃ janetū”ti yāvatatiyaṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghassa dāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:940_7: saṅgho nāma dakkhiṇeyyo”ti pacchimā janatā saṅghe cittīkāraṃ uppādetvā cattāro paccaye dātabbe maññissati,
atk-s0203a0:940_8: saṅgho catūhi paccayehi akilamanto buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karissati.
atk-s0203a0:940_9: Evaṃ mama sāsanaṃ pañca vassasahassāni ṭhassatīti.
atk-s0203a0:940_11: bhagavā”ti vacanatopi cetaṃ veditabbaṃ “satthārā uttaritaro dakkhiṇeyyo nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:940_12: Na hi ānandattherassa mahāpajāpatiyā āghāto vā veraṃ vā atthi.
atk-s0203a0:940_16: so satthu dinnassa mahapphalabhāve sampassamānova paṭiggaṇhātu, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:941_1: “saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti vacanato satthā saṅghapariyāpanno vāti.
atk-s0203a0:941_6: tava laddhiyā satthu saṅghapariyāpannattā dveyeva honti.
atk-s0203a0:941_10: imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ upasampada”nti evaṃ anuññātā pabbajjāpi upasampadāpi na ruhati.
atk-s0203a0:941_11: Tato tvaṃ neva pabbajito asi, na gihi.
atk-s0203a0:941_12: Sammāsambuddhe ca gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne bhikkhū uposathampi pavāraṇampi saṅghakammānipi karonti,
atk-s0203a0:942_2: tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu hatthapādakiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe ca pāde ca vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggikāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:942_3: Posikāti divasassa dve tayo vāre nhāpetvā bhojetvā pāyetvā tumhe posesi.
atk-s0203a0:942_4: Thaññaṃ pāyesīti nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva daharo,
atk-s0203a0:942_5: tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpati attano puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattassa dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0203a0:942_7: Iti mahāpajāpatiyā bahūpakārataṃ kathetvā idāni tathāgatassa bahūpakārataṃ dassento bhagavāpi,
atk-s0203a0:943_1: Atha bhagavā dvīsu upakāresu atirekataraṃ anumodanto evametantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:943_3: puggalo puggalaṃ āgammāti yaṃ ācariyapuggalaṃ antevāsikapuggalo āgamma.
atk-s0203a0:943_5: puggalassa iminā puggalenāti imassa ācariyapuggalassa iminā antevāsikapuggalena.
atk-s0203a0:943_6: Na suppaṭikāraṃ vadāmīti paccūpakāraṃ na sukaraṃ vadāmi,
atk-s0203a0:943_7: abhivādanādīsu ācariyaṃ disvā abhivādanakaraṇaṃ abhivādanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:943_9: iriyāpathe vā kappento tadabhimukho vanditvā gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:943_12: ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:943_13: Ācariyaṃ pana disvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīse ṭhapetvā ācariyaṃ namassati,
atk-s0203a0:943_16: gacchantopi ṭhitopi nisinnopi añjaliṃ paggayha namassatiyevāti idaṃ añjalikammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:943_18: Cīvarādīsu cīvaraṃ dento na yaṃ vā taṃ vā deti,
atk-s0203a0:943_22: catūhi paṇītapaccayehi cakkavāḷantaraṃ pūretvā sinerupabbatena kūṭaṃ gahetvā dentopi ācariyassa anucchavikaṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:944_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ ārabbha samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:944_5: cuddasasu ca ṭhānesu dinnadānaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ nāma hotīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:944_6: Ayaṃ paṭhamāti ayaṃ dakkhiṇā guṇavasenapi paṭhamā jeṭṭhakavasenapi.
atk-s0203a0:944_13: asaṭho amāyāvī paraṃ apīḷetvā dhammena samena kasiyā vā vaṇijjāya vā jīvikaṃ kappetā.
atk-s0203a0:944_14: Puthujjanadussīleti puthujjanadussīlā nāma kevaṭṭamacchabandhādayo paraṃ pīḷāya jīvikaṃ kappetā.
atk-s0203a0:945_1: Tattha tiracchānagateti yaṃ guṇavasena upakāravasena posanatthaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:945_5: Yaṃ pana sunakhasūkarakukkuṭakākādīsu yassa kassaci sampattassa phalaṃ paṭikaṅkhitvā yāvadatthaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:945_10: ayaṃ dakkhiṇā āyusataṃ vaṇṇasataṃ sukhasataṃ balasataṃ paṭibhānasatanti pañca ānisaṃsasatāni deti,
atk-s0203a0:945_11: attabhāvasate āyuṃ deti, vaṇṇaṃ, sukhaṃ, balaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:946_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanneti ettha heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tisaraṇaṃ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno nāma,
atk-s0203a0:946_9: uttamakoṭiyā pana maggasamaṅgī sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno nāma.
atk-s0203a0:947_0: Kiṃ pana maggasamaṅgissa sakkā dānaṃ dātunti?
atk-s0203a0:947_2: Āraddhavipassako hi pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0203a0:947_3: tassa gehadvāre ṭhitassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pakkhipanti.
atk-s0203a0:947_5: idaṃ dānaṃ maggasamaṅgino dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:947_6: Atha vā panesa āsanasālāya nisinno hoti,
atk-s0203a0:947_10: Atha vā panassa vihāre vā āsanasālāya vā nisinnassa upāsakā pattaṃ ādāya attano gharaṃ gantvā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pakkhipanti,
atk-s0203a0:947_13: Tattha soṇḍiyaṃ udakassa viya sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne dinnadānassa asaṅkhyeyyatā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:947_14: Tāsu tāsu mahānadīsu mahāsamudde ca udakassa viya sotāpannādīsu dinnadānassa uttaritaravasena asaṅkhyeyyatā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:947_15: Pathaviyā khayamaṇḍalamatte padese paṃsuṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva mahāpathaviyā paṃsuno appameyyatāyapi ayamattho dīpetabbo.
atk-s0203a0:948_3: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti hi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:948_4: tattha sattasu ṭhānesu dinnadānaṃ saṅghe dinnaṃ nāma hotīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:948_7: satthā majjhe nisinno hotīti ayaṃ buddhappamukho ubhatosaṅgho nāma.
atk-s0203a0:948_8: Ayaṃ paṭhamāti imāya dakkhiṇāya samappamāṇā dakkhiṇā nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:948_9: Dutiyadakkhiṇādayo pana etaṃ paramadakkhiṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0203a0:949_0: Kiṃ pana tathāgate parinibbute buddhappamukhassa ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ dātuṃ sakkāti? Sakkā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a0:949_1: Ubhatosaṅghassa hi pamukhe sadhātukaṃ paṭimaṃ āsane ṭhapetvā ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0203a0:949_2: sabbaṃ satthu paṭhamaṃ datvā ubhatosaṅghassa dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:949_3: evaṃ buddhappamukhassa ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:950_3: Te kira ekaṃ kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ hatthe vā gīvāya vā bandhitvā vicarissanti.
atk-s0203a0:950_4: Gharadvāraṃ pana tesaṃ puttabhariyā kasivaṇijjādikammāni ca pākatikāneva bhavissanti.
atk-s0203a0:950_5: Tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassantīti ettha dussīlasaṅghanti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:950_7: Dussīlā pana upāsakā tesu dussīlesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uddissa saṅghassa demāti dānaṃ dassanti.
atk-s0203a0:950_8: Iti bhagavatā buddhappamukhe saṅghe dinnadakkhiṇāpi guṇasaṅkhāya asaṅkhyeyyāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:950_10: Saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā hi saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa hoti,
atk-s0203a0:951_0: Yo hi saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmīti deyyadhammaṃ paṭiyādetvā vihāraṃ gantvā, – “bhante,
atk-s0203a0:951_1: saṅghaṃ uddissa ekaṃ theraṃ dethā”ti vadati,
atk-s0203a0:951_2: atha saṅghato sāmaṇeraṃ labhitvā “sāmaṇero me laddho”ti aññathattaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0203a0:951_4: Mahātheraṃ labhitvāpi “mahāthero me laddho”ti somanassaṃ uppādentassāpi na hotiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:951_5: Yo pana sāmaṇeraṃ vā upasampannaṃ vā daharaṃ vā theraṃ vā bālaṃ vā paṇḍitaṃ vā yaṃkiñci saṅghato labhitvā
atk-s0203a0:951_6: nibbematiko hutvā saṅghassa demīti saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:952_0: Tattha hi eko vihārasāmi kuṭumbiko “saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti saṅghato uddisitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethāti yāci.
atk-s0203a0:952_1: So ekaṃ dussīlabhikkhuṃ labhitvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ opuñjāpetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā upari vitānaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0203a0:952_2: gandhadhūmapupphehi pūjetvā pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā buddhassa nipaccakāraṃ karonto viya saṅghe
atk-s0203a0:952_4: So bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ vihārajagganatthāya kudālakaṃ dethāti gharadvāraṃ āgato,
atk-s0203a0:952_5: upāsako nisinnova kudālaṃ pādena khipitvā “gaṇhā”ti adāsi.
atk-s0203a0:952_7: “tumhehi pātova etassa katasakkāro vattuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0203a0:952_15: there ādiṃ katvā yāvajja dharamānā khīṇāsavā sodhentiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:953_1: kenaci pariyāyena saṅghagatāya dakkhiṇāyāti ettha atthi buddhappamukho saṅgho,
atk-s0203a0:953_4: Buddhappamukho saṅgho etarahi saṅghena na upanetabbo,
atk-s0203a0:953_5: etarahi saṅgho anāgate kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghena saddhiṃ na upanetabbo.
atk-s0203a0:953_7: Saṅghato uddisitvā gahitasamaṇaputhujjano hi pāṭipuggaliko sotāpanno,
atk-s0203a0:953_8: saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa puthujjanasamaṇe dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ.
atk-s0203a0:953_9: Uddisitvā gahito sotāpanno pāṭipuggaliko sakadāgāmītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:953_10: Saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa hi khīṇāsave dinnadānato uddisitvā gahite dussīlepi dinnaṃ mahapphalatarameva.
atk-s0203a0:953_14: taṃ imaṃ nayaṃ pahāya “catasso kho imānanda,
atk-s0203a0:954_6: So hi jūjakabrāhmaṇassa dārake datvā pathaviṃ kampesi.
atk-s0203a0:955_1: So kira dīghasomattherassa tikkhattumpi piṇḍapātaṃ datvā maraṇamañce nipanno “ayyassa maṃ dīghasomattherassa dinnapiṇḍapāto uddharatī”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:956_1: So kira petadakkhiṇaṃ dento ekassa dussīlasseva tayo vāre adāsi,
atk-s0203a0:957_0: Dāyakato ceva visujjhatīti ettha asadisadānaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:958_0: Sā dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhatīti ettha yathā nāma cheko kassako asārampi khettaṃ labhitvā samaye kasitvā
atk-s0203a0:958_1: paṃsuṃ apanetvā sārabījāni patiṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṃ ārakkhe pamādaṃ anāpajjanto aññassa sārakhettato
atk-s0203a0:958_3: evaṃ sīlavā dussīlassa datvāpi phalaṃ mahantaṃ adhigacchatīti.
atk-s0203a0:959_0: Vītarāgo vītarāgesūti ettha vītarāgo nāma anāgāmī,
atk-s0203a0:959_2: tasmā arahatā arahato dinnadānameva aggaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a0:959_6: Khīṇāsavena katakammaṃ pana nicchandarāgattā kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:960_0: Kiṃ pana sammāsambuddhena sāriputtattherassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:960_3: Sammāsambuddhañhi ṭhapetvā añño dānassa vipākaṃ jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:960_4: Dānañhi catūhi sampadāhi dātuṃ sakkontassa tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0203a0:960_6: deyyadhammassa dhammena samena paraṃ apīḷetvā uppannatā,
atk-s0203a0:965_3: Āmantesīti gahapatissa kira yāva pādā vahiṃsu,
atk-s0203a0:965_4: tāva divase sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:965_7: So ajja gamanapādassa pacchinnattā anuṭṭhānaseyyaṃ upagato sāsanaṃ pesetukāmo aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0203a0:967_0: Abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamoti yasmiñhi samaye māraṇantikā vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:967_3: tāva mahatāpi upakkamena na sakkā vūpasametuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:968_7: Tattha tasmāti yasmā cakkhuṃ tīhi gāhehi gaṇhanto uppannaṃ māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho nāma natthi, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:968_8: Na cakkhuṃ upādiyissāmīti cakkhuṃ tīhi gāhehi na gaṇhissāmi.
atk-s0203a0:968_9: Na ca me cakkhunissitaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāpi me cakkhunissitaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0203a0:968_11: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sabbampi kāmabhavarūpaṃ kathento evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:969_1: Na idhalokanti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā ghāsacchādanaṃ vā na upādiyissāmīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:969_3: Na paralokanti ettha pana manussalokaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā paralokā nāma. Idaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:969_5: idaṃ nāma khādissāmi bhuñjissāmi nivāsessāmi pārupissāmī”ti evarūpāya paritassanāya pahānatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:969_7: na ca me tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ tīhi gāhehi parimocetvā thero desanaṃ arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:970_1: Olīyasīti attano sampattiṃ disvā ārammaṇesu bajjhasi allīyasīti.
atk-s0203a0:970_3: “ayampi nāma gahapati evaṃ saddho pasanno maraṇabhayassa bhāyati,
atk-s0203a0:970_4: añño ko na bhāyissatī”ti maññamāno tassa gāḷhaṃ katvā ovādaṃ dento evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:970_5: Na ca me evarūpī dhammīkathā sutapubbāti ayaṃ upāsako –
atk-s0203a0:970_6: “satthu santikāpi me evarūpī dhammakathā na sutapubbā”ti vadati,
atk-s0203a0:970_7: kiṃ satthā evarūpi sukhumaṃ gambhīrakathaṃ na kathetīti?
atk-s0203a0:970_9: Evaṃ pana cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni cha bāhirāni cha viññāṇakāye cha phassakāye cha vedanākāye cha dhātuyo
atk-s0203a0:970_10: pañcakkhandhe cattāro arūpe idhalokañca paralokañca dassetvā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena arahatte pakkhipitvā
atk-s0203a0:971_0: Apicāyaṃ upāsako dānādhimutto dānābhirato buddhānaṃ santikaṃ gacchanto tucchahattho na gatapubbo.
atk-s0203a0:971_3: Tasmiṃ asati vālikaṃ gāhāpetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe okirāpeti,
atk-s0203a0:971_4: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā gehaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:971_6: tasmā bhagavā catuvīsati saṃvaccharāni upāsakassa yebhuyyena dānakathameva kathesi – “upāsaka,
atk-s0203a0:971_9: mayā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dānaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:971_11: Dhammasenāpatiādayo mahāsāvakāpi attano attano santikaṃ āgatakāle dānakathamevassa kathenti.
atk-s0203a0:971_12: Tenevāha na kho gahapati gihīnaṃ odātavasanānaṃ evarūpī dhammīkathā paṭibhātīti.
atk-s0203a0:971_14: gahapati gihīnaṃ nāma khettavatthuhiraññasuvaṇṇadāsīdāsaputtabhariyādīsu tibbo ālayo tibbaṃ nikantipariyuṭṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:971_16: nikanti na kātabbā”ti kathā na paṭibhāti na ruccatīti.
atk-s0203a0:972_1: Tusitabhavane kirassa nibbattamattasseva tigāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇakkhandhaṃ viya vijjotamānaṃ attabhāvaṃ uyyānavimānādisampattiñca disvā –
atk-s0203a0:972_3: kiṃ nu kho me manussapathe kammaṃ kata”nti olokento tīsu ratanesu adhikāraṃ disvā cintesi “pamādaṭṭhānamidaṃ devattaṃ nāma,
atk-s0203a0:972_4: imāya hi me sampattiyā modamānassa satisammosopi siyā,
atk-s0203a0:972_5: handāhaṃ gantvā mama jetavanassa ceva bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tathāgatassa ca ariyamaggassa ca sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0203a0:972_6: ca vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā tato āgantvā sampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:972_8: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho anāthapiṇḍikotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:973_1: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento kammaṃ vijjā cātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:973_5: Sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamanti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttamanti dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:973_9: Jīvitamuttamanti etasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:973_10: Etena maccā sujjhantīti etena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sattā visujjhanti.
atk-s0203a0:974_2: Yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena samādhipakkhiyaṃ dhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0203a0:974_3: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhati.
atk-s0203a0:974_4: Atha vā yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena pañcakkhandhadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0203a0:974_5: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhati.
atk-s0203a0:975_0: Idāni sāriputtattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento sāriputto vātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:975_7: na therena uttaritaro nāma atthīti vadati.
atk-s0203a0:981_3: Netaṃ mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti samanupassāmīti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti samanupassāmi.
atk-s0203a0:982_1: Tasmāti yasmā māraṇantikavedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto satthaṃ āharāmīti vadati, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:982_11: Āgatigati na hotīti paṭisandhivasena āgati nāma na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:982_15: Nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarenāti nayidha loke,
atk-s0203a0:982_18: Esevanto dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhakilesadukkhassa ayameva anto ayaṃ paricchedo parivaṭumabhāvo hoti.
atk-s0203a0:982_20: Ye pana “na ubhayamantarenā”ti vacanaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0203a0:983_5: So attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā saṃviggo vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto arahattaṃ patvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0203a0:983_6: Sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatāti kiñcāpi idaṃ therassa puthujjanakāle byākaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:983_7: etena pana byākaraṇena anantarāyamassa parinibbānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:983_8: Tasmā bhagavā tameva byākaraṇaṃ gahetvā kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:983_11: evaṃ upaṭṭhākesu ca upaṭṭhāyikāsu ca vijjamānāsu so bhikkhu tumhākaṃ sāsane parinibbāyissatī”ti pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:983_12: Athassa bhagavā kulesu saṃsaggābhāvaṃ dīpento honti hete sāriputtātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:983_13: Imasmiṃ kira ṭhāne therassa kulesu asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:987_4: Nandīsamudayā dukkhasamudayoti nandiyā taṇhāya samodhānena pañcakkhandhadukkhassa samodhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:987_5: Iti chasu dvāresu dukkhaṃ samudayoti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0203a0:987_6: Dutiyanaye nirodho maggoti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0203a0:987_7: Iminā ca tvaṃ puṇṇāti pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0203a0:987_8: Evaṃ tāva vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā idāni puṇṇattheraṃ sattasu ṭhānesu sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ iminā ca tvantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:989_0: Daṇḍenāti catuhatthena daṇḍena vā ghaṭikamuggarena vā.
atk-s0203a0:989_3: Idaṃ thero tatiyapārājikavatthusmiṃ asubhakathaṃ sutvā attabhāvena jigucchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satthahārakapariyesanaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0203a0:989_4: Damūpasamenāti ettha damoti indriyasaṃvarādīnaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:989_6: vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro damoti vutto.
atk-s0203a0:989_8: khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā damoti vutto.
atk-s0203a0:989_9: “Dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṃ damoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:989_10: Imasmiṃ pana sutte khanti damoti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:990_1: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇoti ko panesa puṇṇo,
atk-s0203a0:990_4: sāvatthiyaṃ pana asappāyavihāraṃ sallakkhetvā tattha gantukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:991_1: sunāparantaraṭṭhe kira ekasmiṃ vāṇijakagāme ete dve bhātaro.
atk-s0203a0:991_2: Tesu kadāci jeṭṭho pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ āharati,
atk-s0203a0:991_4: Imasmiṃ pana samaye kaniṭṭhaṃ ghare ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhabhātiko pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:991_5: caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanassa nātidūre sakaṭasatthaṃ nivāsetvā bhuttapātarāso parijanaparivuto
atk-s0203a0:992_0: Tena ca samayena sāvatthivāsino bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhapupphādihatthā yena buddho yena dhammo yena saṅgho,
atk-s0203a0:992_1: tanninnā tappoṇā tappābbhārā hutvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:992_2: So te disvā “kahaṃ ime gacchanti”ti ekamanussaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:992_5: iccesa mahājano satthu santike dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0203a0:992_6: Tassa buddhoti vacanaṃ chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:992_7: Atha attano parijanaparivuto tāya parisāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu madhurassarena dhammaṃ desentassa
atk-s0203a0:992_8: parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0203a0:992_9: Atha tathāgatena kālaṃ viditvā parisāya uyyojitāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā
atk-s0203a0:992_10: dutiyadivase maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā āsanāni paññapetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0203a0:992_14: “imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ mayhaṃ kaniṭṭhassa dehī”ti sabbaṃ niyyātetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:993_0: Athassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:993_3: yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gaccheyya”nti.
atk-s0203a0:993_4: Atha pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhahitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:994_2: sunāparantaraṭṭhaṃ tāva pavisitvā ajjuhatthapabbate nāma pavisitvā vāṇijagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0203a0:994_3: Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā sañjānitvā bhikkhaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0203a0:994_4: aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā tattheva vasāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:995_2: taṃ koci caṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:995_3: Tattha samuddavīciyo āgantvā ayakantapāsāṇesu paharitvā mahāsaddaṃ karonti.
atk-s0203a0:995_5: “kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontānaṃ phāsuvihāro hotū”ti samuddaṃ nissaddaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:996_2: rattiñca divā ca saddo ekābaddhova hoti,
atk-s0203a0:996_3: thero imaṃ ṭhānaṃ aphāsukanti tato makulakārāmavihāraṃ nāma gato.
atk-s0203a0:996_4: So vāṇijagāmassa nātidūro naccāsanno gamanāgamanasampanno vivitto appasaddo.
atk-s0203a0:996_5: Thero imaṃ ṭhānaṃ phāsukanti tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanādīni kāretvā vassaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0203a0:997_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃyeva antovasse pañca vāṇijasatāni parasamuddaṃ gacchāmāti nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:997_1: Nāvārohanadivase therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā theraṃ bhojetvā therassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā vanditvā gacchanto, – “bhante,
atk-s0203a0:997_4: Nāvā uttamajavena gacchamānā aññataraṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0203a0:998_0: Atheko vāsiyā rukkhaṃ ākoṭetvā lohitacandanabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha –
atk-s0203a0:998_2: ito ca uttari lābho nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:998_9: “idheva ghātitesu sabbaṃ vanaṃ ekaṃ kuṇapaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0203a0:998_11: Atha tesaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha muhuttaṃ gatakāleyeva uppādikaṃ uṭṭhapetvā sayampi te amanussā bhayānakāni rūpāni dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:998_12: Bhītā manussā attano attano devatā namassanti.
atk-s0203a0:998_14: “mayhaṃ bhātā avassayo hotū”ti therassa namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:999_0: Theropi kira tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjitvā tesaṃ byasanuppattiṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā sammukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:999_1: Amanussā theraṃ disvā “ayyo puṇṇatthero etī”ti pakkamiṃsu,
atk-s0203a0:999_3: Thero mā bhāyathāti te assāsetvā “kahaṃ gantukāmatthā”ti pucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0203a0:999_5: Thero nāvaṃ phale akkamitvā “etesaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:999_6: Vāṇijā sakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ puttadārassa ārocetvā “etha theraṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmā”ti pañcasatā
atk-s0203a0:999_7: attano pañcamātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:999_8: Tato nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ otāretvā therassa ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā – “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:999_13: Tena hi iminā satthu maṇḍalamāḷaṃ karotha,
atk-s0203a0:999_15: bhanteti tena ca koṭṭhāsena attano ca koṭṭhāsehi maṇḍalamāḷaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1000_0: Satthāpi kira āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya paribhogaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1000_1: Ārakkhamanussā rattiṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “mahesakkhā devatā atthī”ti saññaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1000_2: Upāsakā maṇḍalamāḷañca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca senāsanāni niṭṭhapetvā dānasambhāraṃ sajjetvā – “kataṃ, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:1000_9: Thero bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā sakaṭṭhānameva paccāgato.
atk-s0203a0:1001_4: bhanteti bhikkhusaṅghassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā nabhacārikā bhikkhū salākaṃ gaṇhantūti āha.
atk-s0203a0:1001_6: Vāṇijagāmavāsinopi “sve kira satthā āgamissatī”ti gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaggaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1001_7: Bhagavā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0203a0:1001_9: So kiṃ idanti āvajjetvā satthu sunāparantagamanaṃ disvā vissakammaṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0203a0:1001_10: “tāta ajja bhagavā timattāni yojanasatāni piṇḍācāraṃ karissati,
atk-s0203a0:1001_11: pañca kūṭāgārasatāni māpetvā jetavanadvārakoṭṭhamatthake gamanasajjāni katvā ṭhapehī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:1001_16: Satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitakūṭāgāresu dhurakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0203a0:1001_17: Dve aggasāvake ādiṃ katvā ekūnapañcabhikkhusatānipi kūṭāgāraṃ gantvā nisinnā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1002_0: Satthā saccabandhapabbataṃ nāma patvā kūṭāgāraṃ ākāse ṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:1002_1: Tasmiṃ pabbate saccabandho nāma micchādiṭṭhikatāpaso mahājanaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ uggaṇhāpento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā vasati.
atk-s0203a0:1002_2: Abbhantare cassa antocāṭiyaṃ padīpo viya arahattassa upanissayo jalati.
atk-s0203a0:1002_3: Taṃ disvā dhammamassa kathessāmīti gantvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0203a0:1002_6: Ehibhikkhu hutvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharo hutvā kūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0203a0:1003_0: Bhagavā kūṭāgāragatehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvā kūṭāgārāni adissamānāni katvā vāṇijagāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0203a0:1003_1: Vāṇijā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ makulakārāmaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1003_4: tāva pātarāsaṃ katvā uposathaṅgāni samādāya bahuṃ gandhañca pupphañca ādāya dhammassavanatthāya ārāmaṃ paccāgamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1004_0: Satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthaṃ katipāhaṃ tattheva vasi,
atk-s0203a0:1004_2: Tattha katipāhaṃ vasitvā vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya caritvā “tvaṃ idheva vasāhī”ti puṇṇattheraṃ nivattetvā antare nammadānadī nāma atthi,
atk-s0203a0:1004_4: Nammadānāgarājā satthu paccuggamanaṃ katvā nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1004_5: Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā nāgabhavanā nikkhami. So – “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:1004_11: Satthā tato nikkhamma saccabandhapabbataṃ gantvā saccabandhaṃ āha –
atk-s0203a0:1004_13: tvaṃ idheva vasitvā etesaṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetvā nibbānamagge patiṭṭhāpehī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:1004_15: Satthā ghanapiṭṭhipāsāṇe allamattikapiṇḍamhi lañchanaṃ viya padacetiyaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0203a0:1005_1: Mahājano therassa satta divasāni sarīrapūjaṃ katvā bahūni gandhakaṭṭhāni samodhānetvā sarīraṃ jhāpetvā dhātuyo ādāya cetiyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1009_2: Tattha tena kho pana samayenāti bhagavā mahāpajāpatiyā yācito bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā –
atk-s0203a0:1009_3: “therā bhikkhū vārena bhikkhuniyo ovadantū”ti saṅghassa bhāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1009_6: Na icchatīti attano vāre sampatte dūraṃ gāmaṃ vā gantvā sūcikammādīni vā ārabhitvā “ayaṃ nāmassa papañco”ti vadāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:1009_7: Imaṃ pana pariyāyena ovādaṃ bhagavā nandakattherasseva kāraṇā akāsi. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a0:1009_8: Imāsañhi bhikkhunīnaṃ theraṃ disvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti pasīdati.
atk-s0203a0:1009_14: Thero pana attano vāraṃ na karoti,
atk-s0203a0:1009_16: Tā kira bhikkhuniyo pubbe therassa jambudīpe rajjaṃ kārentassa orodhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1009_17: Thero pubbenivāsañāṇena taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā cintesi –
atk-s0203a0:1009_18: “maṃ imassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa majjhe nisinnaṃ upamāyo ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā dhammaṃ kathayamānaṃ disvā
atk-s0203a0:1009_19: añño pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī bhikkhu imaṃ kāraṇaṃ oloketvā ‘āyasmā nandako yāvajjadivasā orodhe na vissajjeti,
atk-s0203a0:1009_21: Etamatthaṃ sampassamāno thero attano vāraṃ na karoti.
atk-s0203a0:1009_22: Imāsañca kira bhikkhunīnaṃ therasseva desanā sappāyā bhavissatīti ñatvā atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandakaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0203a0:1010_0: Tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pubbe tassa orodhabhāvajānanatthaṃ idaṃ vatthuṃ –
atk-s0203a0:1010_1: pubbe kira bārāṇasiyaṃ pañca dāsasatāni pañca dāsisatāni cāti jaṅghasahassaṃ ekatova kammaṃ katvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasi.
atk-s0203a0:1010_2: Ayaṃ nandakatthero tasmiṃ kāle jeṭṭhakadāso hoti,
atk-s0203a0:1010_4: Sā jeṭṭhakadāsassa pādaparicārikā ahosi paṇḍitā byattā.
atk-s0203a0:1010_6: Atha vassūpanāyikasamaye pañca paccekabuddhā nandamūlakapabbhārato isipatane otaritvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā isipatanameva gantvā –
atk-s0203a0:1010_7: “vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā atthāya hatthakammaṃ yācissāmā”ti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā sāyanhasamaye nagaraṃ pavisitvā seṭṭhissa gharadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1010_8: Jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā udakatitthaṃ gacchantī paccekabuddhe nagaraṃ pavisante addasa.
atk-s0203a0:1010_9: Seṭṭhi tesaṃ āgatakāraṇaṃ sutvā “amhākaṃ okāso natthi,
atk-s0203a0:1011_0: Atha te nagarā nikkhamante jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā pavisantī disvā kuṭaṃ otāretvā vanditvā onamitvā mukhaṃ pidhāya –
atk-s0203a0:1011_3: Vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā hatthakammaṃ yācituṃ āgamimhāti. Laddhaṃ, bhanteti.
atk-s0203a0:1011_9: Sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti nimantetvā udakaṃ netvā puna kuṭaṃ gahetvā āgamma titthamagge ṭhatvā āgatā
atk-s0203a0:1011_10: avasesadāsiyo “ettheva hothā”ti vatvā sabbāsaṃ āgatakāle āha –
atk-s0203a0:1011_14: Yadi evaṃ mayā pañca paccekabuddhā hatthakammaṃ alabhantā svātanāya nimantitā,
atk-s0203a0:1011_16: Tā sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā sāyaṃ aṭavito āgatakāle sāmikānaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1012_0: Atha ne jeṭṭhakadāsī sve tātā paccekabuddhānaṃ hatthakammaṃ dethāti ānisaṃsaṃ ācikkhitvā yepi na kātukāmā,
atk-s0203a0:1012_2: Sā punadivase paccekabuddhānaṃ bhattaṃ datvā sabbesaṃ dāsaputtānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1012_3: Te tāvadeva araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre samodhānetvā sataṃ sataṃ hutvā ekekakuṭiṃ ekekacaṅkamanādiparivāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:1012_4: katvā mañcapīṭhapānīyaparibhojanīyabhājanādīni ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhe temāsaṃ tattha vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1012_8: Evaṃ temāsaṃ jaggitvā jeṭṭhakadāsī ekekaṃ dāsaṃ ekekaṃ sāṭakaṃ vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:1012_10: Tāni parivattāpetvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ ticīvarāni katvā adāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1012_12: Tampi jaṅghasahassaṃ ekato kusalaṃ katvā kāyassa bhedā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0203a0:1012_13: Tāni pañca mātugāmasatāni kālena kālaṃ tesaṃ pañcannaṃ purisasatānaṃ gehe honti,
atk-s0203a0:1012_14: kālena kālaṃ sabbāpi jeṭṭhakadāsaputtasseva gehe honti.
atk-s0203a0:1012_15: Atha ekasmiṃ kāle jeṭṭhakadāsaputto devalokato cavitvā rājakule nibbatto.
atk-s0203a0:1012_16: Tāpi pañcasatā devakaññā mahābhogakulesu nibbattitvā tassa rajje ṭhitassa gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1012_17: Etena niyāmena saṃsarantiyo amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle koliyanagare devadahanagare ca khattiyakulesu nibbattā.
atk-s0203a0:1013_1: jeṭṭhakadāsidhītā vayaṃ āgamma suddhodanamahārājassa aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhitā,
atk-s0203a0:1013_2: itarāpi tesaṃ tesaṃ rājaputtānaṃyeva gharaṃ gatā.
atk-s0203a0:1013_3: Tāsaṃ sāmikā pañcasatā rājakumārā udakacumbaṭakalahe satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitā,
atk-s0203a0:1013_5: Te ukkaṇṭhite bhagavā kuṇāladahaṃ netvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhapetvā mahāsamayadivase arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:1013_6: Tāpi pañcasatā rājadhītaro nikkhamitvā mahāpajāpatiyā santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1013_7: Ayamāyasmā nandako ettāva tā bhikkhuniyoti evametaṃ vatthu dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1014_0: Rājakārāmoti pasenadinā kārito nagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge thūpārāmasadise ṭhāne vihāro.
atk-s0203a0:1015_0: 399. Sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhanti hetunā kāraṇena vipassanāpaññāya yāthāvasarasato diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1016_2: atthato pana taṃ taṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca tā tā vedanā uppajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:1017_0: 402. Pagevassa chāyāti mūlādīni nissāya nibbattā chāyā paṭhamataraṃyeva aniccā.
atk-s0203a0:1018_2: Tattha maṃsaṃ piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ katvā cammaṃ alliyāpento maṃsakāyaṃ upahanati nāma.
atk-s0203a0:1018_3: Cammaṃ baddhaṃ baddhaṃ katvā maṃse alliyāpento maṃsakāyaṃ upahanati nāma.
atk-s0203a0:1019_2: Yā hi esā paññā kilese chindatīti vuttā,
atk-s0203a0:1019_3: sā na ekikāva attano dhammatāya chindituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0203a0:1019_4: Yathā pana kuṭhārī na attano dhammatāya chejjaṃ chindati,
atk-s0203a0:1019_6: evaṃ na vinā chahi bojjhaṅgehi paññā kilese chindituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0203a0:1019_8: Tena hīti yena kāraṇena tayā cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni,
atk-s0203a0:1019_13: gāvūpamañca dassetvā sattahi bojjhaṅgehi āsavakkhayena desanā niṭṭhapitā,
atk-s0203a0:1019_14: tena kāraṇena tvaṃ svepi tā bhikkhuniyo teneva ovādena ovadeyyāsīti.
atk-s0203a0:1020_1: Sā sotāpannāti yā sā guṇehi sabbapacchimikā,
atk-s0203a0:1020_3: Sesā pana sakadāgāmianāgāminiyo ca khīṇāsavā ca.
atk-s0203a0:1020_7: “kadā nu kho ahaṃ ayyassa nandakassa dhammadesanaṃ suṇantī tasmiṃyeva āsane sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikareyya”nti,
atk-s0203a0:1025_1: saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0203a0:1025_2: Kusīte puggale parivajjayato āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato sammappadhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0203a0:1025_3: Muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato upaṭṭhitassatī puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato
atk-s0203a0:1025_5: Asamāhite puggale parivajjayato samāhite puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0203a0:1025_6: Duppaññe puggale parivajjayato paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ paccavekkhato
atk-s0203a0:1025_8: Iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayato pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato pañca suttantakkhandhe
atk-s0203a0:1025_9: paccavekkhato imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:1027_1: Anekānaṃ devatāsahassānanti āyasmatā rāhulena padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle pālitanāgarājakāle patthanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1027_8: Imasmiṃ pana divase sabbā ekaṭṭhāne andhavanasmiṃyeva sannipatitā.
atk-s0203a0:1027_14: Tattha hi kāci devatā sotāpannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1027_17: Tāsañca pana devatānaṃ ettakāti gaṇanavasena paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0203a0:1031_2: Tattha ādikalyāṇantiādimhi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ niddosaṃ katvā desessāmi.
atk-s0203a0:1031_7: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ navahi padehi thomesi.
atk-s0203a0:1032_3: manoviññāṇena ṭhapetvā dve pañcaviññāṇāni sesaṃ bāvīsatividhaṃ lokiyavipākacittaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1033_2: Heṭṭhā kathitānañhi dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ anattabhāvadassanatthaṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0203a0:1034_3: Ayañhi desanā tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0203a0:1034_4: Dukkhaṃ samudayoti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ dassetuntipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:1035_0: Evaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena,
atk-s0203a0:1035_1: nirodho maggoti imesaṃ vā dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:1036_1: Evaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni tiṇṇaṃ anusayānaṃ vasena puna vaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ cakkhuñca,
atk-s0203a0:1037_1: Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ anusayānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni tesaṃ paṭikkhepavasena vivaṭṭaṃ dassento puna cakkhuñcātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:1038_1: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti ettakeneva kathāmaggena vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā puna tadeva sampiṇḍetvā dassento evaṃ passaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1038_4: yaṃ sayameva tathāgate desente saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0203a0:1038_5: Imañhi suttaṃ dhammasenāpatimhi kathentepi saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0203a0:1039_0: Aparabhāge pana tambapaṇṇidīpe māleyyadevatthero nāma heṭṭhā lohapāsāde idaṃ suttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:1039_3: evaṃ thero mahāmaṇḍapepi idaṃ suttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:1039_15: Tesupi ṭhānesu saṭṭhi saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0203a0:1039_16: Tato nikkhamitvā pana thero cittalapabbataṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:1039_24: so ayaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā tvaṃ devoti āha. Āma, bhanteti.
atk-s0203a0:1039_26: koci sarīraṃ hatthena phusituṃ nāma na labhi,
atk-s0203a0:1039_27: tvaṃ pana nhāpehīti uttaritvā tīre nisīdi.
atk-s0203a0:1040_0: Thero sabbampi hatthapādādiparikammaṃ katvā mahātheraṃ nhāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:1040_9: suttantapariyosāne ca saṭṭhi mahātherā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1040_14: Tato kalyāṇiṃ gantvā tattha cātuddase heṭṭhāpāsāde kathesi,
atk-s0203a0:1040_17: tasmimpi saṭṭhi therāti evaṃ devatthereyeva idaṃ suttaṃ kathente saṭṭhiṭṭhānesu saṭṭhi saṭṭhi janā arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0203a0:1041_0: Ambilakāḷakavihāre pana tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthere imaṃ suttaṃ kathente manussaparisā gāvutaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0203a0:1041_3: devesu pana tato tato ekekova puthujjano ahosīti.
atk-s0203a0:1045_2: Tattha mahāsaḷāyatanikanti mahantānaṃ channaṃ āyatanānaṃ jotakaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1047_3: Ettha ca pañcadvārikajavanena samāpajjanaṃ vā vuṭṭhānaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0203a0:1048_2: Pubbeva kho panassāti assa bhikkhuno vācākammantājīvā pubbasuddhikā nāma ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddhāva honti.
atk-s0203a0:1048_4: Evaṃ lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko vā sattaṅgiko vā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:1049_0: Vitaṇḍavādī pana “yā yathābhūtassa diṭṭhī”ti imameva suttapadesaṃ gahetvā “lokuttaramaggo pañcaṅgiko”ti vadati. So –
atk-s0203a0:1049_1: “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti iminā anantaravacaneneva paṭisedhitabbo.
atk-s0203a0:1049_4: imāni pana pañca sabbatthakakārāpakaṅgāni maggakkhaṇe virativasena pūrenti.
atk-s0203a0:1049_5: “Yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati viratī”ti evaṃ vuttaviratīsu hi micchāvācaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0203a0:1049_7: evaṃ sammāvācaṃ bhāventassa imāni pañcaṅgikāni na vinā,
atk-s0203a0:1049_10: Iti vacīkammādīni ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddhāneva vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0203a0:1049_11: Imāni pana pañca sabbatthakakārāpakaṅgāni virativasena paripūrentīti pañcaṅgiko maggo nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:1049_15: Aññesu ca anekesu suttasatesu aṭṭhaṅgikova maggo āgatoti.
atk-s0203a0:1051_0: Vijjā ca vimutti cāti arahattamaggavijjā ca phalavimutti ca. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:1055_2: Tattha samavisamaṃ carantīti kālena samaṃ caranti,
atk-s0203a0:1056_3: Natthi kho pana tatthāti kasmā āha,
atk-s0203a0:1056_4: nanu araññe haritatiṇacampakavanādivasena atimanuññā rūpādayo pañca kāmaguṇā atthīti?
atk-s0203a0:1056_8: Tāni hi purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti. Yathāha – “nāhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1056_11: yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0203a0:1060_0: 438. Evaṃ me sutanti piṇḍapātapārisuddhisuttaṃ. Tattha paṭisallānāti phalasamāpattito.
atk-s0203a0:1061_1: Phalasamāpattito hi vuṭṭhitassa pañcahi pasādehi patiṭṭhitokāso vippasanno hoti,
atk-s0203a0:1061_6: Yena cāhaṃ maggenātiādīsu vihārato paṭṭhāya yāva gāmassa indakhīlā esa paviṭṭhamaggo nāma,
atk-s0203a0:1061_7: antogāmaṃ pavisitvā gehapaṭipāṭiyā caritvā yāva nagaradvārena nikkhamanā esa caritabbapadeso nāma,
atk-s0203a0:1061_8: bahi indakhīlato paṭṭhāya yāva vihārā esa paṭikkantamaggo nāma.
atk-s0203a0:1061_9: Paṭighaṃ vāpi cetasoti citte paṭihaññanakilesajātaṃ kiñci atthi natthīti.
atk-s0203a0:1062_1: Pahīnā nu kho me pañca kāmaguṇātiādīsu ekabhikkhussa paccavekkhaṇā nānā,
atk-s0203a0:1062_3: Eko hi bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā vivittokāse nisinno paccavekkhati “pahīnā nu kho me pañcakāmaguṇā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:1062_4: So “appahīnā”ti ñatvā vīriyaṃ paggayha anāgāmimaggena pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaṃ samugghāṭetvā maggānantaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:1062_5: phalaṃ phalānantaraṃ maggaṃ tato vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhanto “pahīnā”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0203a0:1062_9: Etāsu pana paccavekkhaṇāsu añño bhikkhu ekaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati,
atk-s0203a0:1062_10: añño ekanti evaṃ nānābhikkhūnaṃ nānāpaccavekkhaṇā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:1066_7: sotena saddaṃ na suṇātīti cakkhunā rūpaṃ na passitabbaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1066_8: sotena saddo na sotabboti evaṃ desetīti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0203a0:1067_0: Aññathā ariyassa vinayeti iminā bhagavā attano sāsane asadisāya indriyabhāvanāya kathanatthaṃ ālayaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1067_3: handāhaṃ imissaṃ parisati bhikkhusaṅghassa indriyabhāvanākathaṃ kāremī”ti satthāraṃ yācanto etassa bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:1067_4: Athassa bhagavā indriyabhāvanaṃ kathento tena hānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:1068_1: Tatha yadidaṃ upekkhāti yā esā vipassanupekkhā nāma,
atk-s0203a0:1068_4: Iti ayaṃ bhikkhu cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇampi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe manāpaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1068_7: tassa rajjituṃ vā dussituṃ vā muyhituṃ vā adatvāva pariggahetvā vipassanaṃ majjhatte ṭhapeti.
atk-s0203a0:1068_9: Cakkhābādhikassa hi uddhaṃ ummīlananimmīlanaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:1070_1: Paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññītiādīsu paṭikūle mettāpharaṇena vā dhātuso upasaṃhārena vā appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
atk-s0203a0:1070_2: Appaṭikūle asubhapharaṇena vā aniccato upasaṃhārena vā paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
atk-s0203a0:1070_4: Tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvāti majjhatto hutvā viharitukāmo kiṃ karotīti?
atk-s0203a0:1070_5: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu āpāthagatesu neva somanassiko na domanassiko hoti.
atk-s0203a0:1071_8: Kathaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
atk-s0203a0:1071_9: Aniṭṭhasmiñca iṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati,
atk-s0203a0:1071_11: Evaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
atk-s0203a0:1071_12: Kathaṃ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati?
atk-s0203a0:1071_13: Iṭṭhasmiñca aniṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṃ asubhāya vā pharati,
atk-s0203a0:1071_15: evaṃ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
atk-s0203a0:1071_16: Kathaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno?
atk-s0203a0:1071_17: Idha bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
atk-s0203a0:1071_19: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano,
atk-s0203a0:1071_21: Evaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno”ti.
atk-s0203a0:1072_0: Imesu ca tīsu nayesu paṭhamanaye manāpaṃ amanāpaṃ manāpāmanāpanti saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0203a0:1077_3: majjhe “suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedalla”nti vacanato majjhekalyāṇo,
atk-s0203a0:1077_4: sanniṭṭhāne “ariyo bhāvitindriyo”ti vacanato pariyosānakalyāṇoti tividhakalyāṇo majjhimanikāyo “mahāvipassanā nāmāya”nti vutto,
atk-s0203a0:1084_0: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā,
atk-s0203a0:1093_0: Yaṃ paññamupacitaṃ tena hotu loko sadā sukhitoti.
atk-s0203a0:1094_1: paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe satthu sāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvena
atk-s0203a0:1094_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-s0203a0:1094_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ papañcasūdanī nāma majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathā –
